title: Nhà xuất bản Giáo dục Việt Nam đạt doanh thu gần 2.000 tỷ đồng trong nửa đầu năm nay, tổng tài sản tăng gấp đôi lên gần 3.000 tỷ
creator: Theo Trí Đức
content: Nhà xuất bản Giáo dục Việt Nam (NXBGDVN) vừa công bố báo cáo tóm tắt chỉ tiêu tài chính cho 6 tháng đầu năm nay, cho thấy doanh thu bán hàng giảm xuống dưới 2.000 tỷ đồng, còn lợi nhuận gần như không đổi so với cùng kỳ năm 2024. Báo cáo cho thấy doanh thu bán hàng và cung cấp dịch vụ đạt 1.968 tỷ đồng trong nửa đầu năm nay, giảm khoảng 14% so với kết﻿ quả 2.281 tỷ đồng của nửa đầu năm 2024. Lợi nhuận gộp là 514 tỷ đồng, ít hơn con số 544 tỷ đồng của giai đoạn 6 tháng đầu năm 2024. Lợi nhuận trước thuế là 388 tỷ đồng và con số sau thuế là 352 tỷ đồng, giảm nhẹ so với kết quả của cùng kỳ năm trước. Đáng chú ý, trong nửa đầu năm nay, NXBGDVN có nhiều chỉ số thay đổi mạnh, bao gồm các khoản phải thu ngắn hạn tăng hơn 12 lần từ 134 tỷ đồng lên 1.671 tỷ đồng từ đầu năm 2025 đến giữa năm 2025. Trong cùng giai đoạn, nợ ngắn hạn tăng 5,5 lần từ 242 tỷ lên 1.337 tỷ đồng. 2 sự thay đổi này góp phần lớn vào tổng tài sản và tổng nguồn vốn của NXBGDVN tăng gần gấp đôi từ 1.601 tỷ đồng lên 2.924 tỷ đồng trong giai đoạn này. ﻿ Doanh thu của NXBGDVN tăng nhanh qua các năm ﻿Trong năm 2024, NXBGDVN ghi nhận tổng số lao động bình quân là 281,3 người. Mức lương trung bình là 27,3 triệu đồng/người/tháng, còn...

title: Do Suction Cups Really Work On Car Dents? Here's What You Should Know
creator: staff@slashgear.com (Marko Mikulic)
content: When it comes to the best DIY methods for removing dents from your car , suction cup dent pullers are some of the easiest methods to try on your own. Using these to repair dents is cheap, easy, and should not take a long time, but do suction cups work well on car dents? Sometimes using cup pullers can give great results, but in other cases, the results can be a bit mixed. The effectiveness of suction cup dent pullers depends on the size, the depth, the material, and the location of the dent. It also depends on whether the surface is smooth or creased. Furthermore, the cup needs enough surface to stick to in order to have a chance of succeeding. Either way, knowing the limitations of using suction cups to repair car dents might just save you the frustration and guide you toward the right repair approach for your car. Here is everything you need to know about suction cup dent repair, and whether you should try it yourself. To maximize the effect of using suction cups to fix car dents, it's best to first clean the surface on which the suction cup ought to be mounted. With the surface fully dried, be sure to press firmly with the suction cup so it sticks to the dent. Some cups require you to pump the suction to achieve the necessary vacuum, while others only require a firm push. It's also a good idea to have at least the essential home tool kit products , which will help you avoid getting stuck mid-repair. If you work with a smaller dent, place the suction cup directly in the...

title: ရှင်ရဲထွဋ် - ရေချိုးခန်းထဲကအော်သံများ
creator: noreply@blogger.com (k)
content: Art- KT# ရေချိုးခန်းထဲကအော်သံများ ရှင်ရဲထွဋ် (မိုးမခ)ဩဂုတ် ၃၁၊ ၂၀၂၅ မတော်တဆတွေကိုပြုံးပြုံးကြီးကြည့်တတ်တဲ့ လူ့ယဉ်ကျေးမှုဆိုတာကမ္ဘာပေါ်မှာမပေါ်ပေါက် သေးသ၍ နက်ခ်တိုင်ကိုလျှော့ပြီးသက်ပြင်းချရတဲ့အလုပ်တွေပိုနေဦးမှာပဲ၊ လူဆိုတာ နားရွက်ပြတ်သွားလည်း ပန်းချီကတော့ဆက်ဆွဲရဦးမှာပဲ၊ ကိုယ်မကြည့်လိုက်ရတဲ့ရုပ်ရှင်က လွမ်းခန်းတွေဟာကိုယ့်မျက်ရည်နဲ့မဆိုင်သလိုလည်းနေတတ်ဦးမှ၊ လက်သည်းဆိပ်မှလက်ထိပ်နာတတ်တဲ့ အကဲဆတ်မှုမှာ လေဒီဒိုင်ယာနာရဲ့သွေးစွန်းကုတ်အင်္ကျီဟာ ရင်တုန်ပန်းတုန်စရာမဖြစ်ခဲ့သလောက် ယုန်နဲ့အတူပြေးပြီးခွေးနဲ့အတူလိုက်ရင်း ရေတိမ်နစ်တဲ့ဇာတ်လမ်းကျမှ ကိုယ့်ကိုယ်ကိုပြန်ဆယ်တင်ဖို့အတင့်ရဲလာကြ၊ နောက်ကျောကဓားကိုကြည့်ပြီးငေါက်ခနဲ ထထိုင်၊ ကျည်စားသန်လွန်းတဲ့ဒေဝဒတ်ဟာ ဘယ်ချောင်ကထိုးထွက်လာ၊ နောက်ဆုံးတော့အိပ်မက်ဟာ ဧဝရက်တောင်ပေါ်ကပြုတ်ကျခန်းနဲ့သာ အဆုံးသတ်ခဲ့၊ သားသတ်ရုံဟာ လည်စင်းပေးမှသက်သာမယ့်သေခြင်းတရားလား၊ အစော်ကားခံ တောင်နံရံကပဲ့တင်ထပ်သလို၊ ရှေ့သွားတိုင်းကျောမလုံတဲ့ အလမ္ပါယ်ဆရာလက်ထဲကမြွေလို ဘယ်အချိန်အဆိပ်ထုတ်ခံရမလဲ၊ စံနစ်ကြီးမကောင်းတာကို မျက်မှန်စိမ်းတပ်ပြီးကာကွယ်လို့မရဘူး၊ တနင့်တပိုးကျဆုံးခန်းထဲသိမ်ငယ်လာတဲ့အခါ ရေချိုးခန်းကိုအလကားမထားပါနဲ့၊ ရေပန်းကိုအဆုံးထိဖွင့်လိုက်ပါ သီချင်းတပုဒ်ကိုအကျယ်ကြီးဆိုဖို့ဖြစ်ဖြစ် ဒါမှမဟုတ် အားရပါးရငိုကြွေးဖို့ပဲဖြစ်ဖြစ်၊ ၂၉ ဩဂုတ် ၂၀၂၄ - Join Us @ MoeMaKa Telegram t.me@moemaka Please show your support, donate with Zelle #MoeMaKaMedia #WhatsHappeningInMyanmar

title: 超速41km扣牌罰1.2萬!玩命駕駛撤單遭駁
creator: 陳弘逸
content: 記者陳弘逸/高雄報導 嘉義劉姓男子去年開車行經限速70公里的路段,卻高速行駛111公里,遭員警取締;因超速41公里,需繳1萬2000元罰鍰,扣汽牌6個月,並應參加道路交通安全講習;劉男不服提起上訴,但法官綜合相關證據,認為舉發程序並無違誤,應予以駁回,且須負擔訴300元訟費,可上訴。 判決指出,劉男2024年6月11日下午5時14分許,開車行經嘉義縣水上鄉台一線273.3公里往南路段,遭員警以移動式雷達測速儀器測得超速,認有「經雷達測速行速111公里,限速70公里,超速41公里」。 根據法規,因違反道路交通管理處罰條例第43條1項2款,行速超過41公里,予扣汽牌6個月並開立1萬2000元罰鍰,並應參加道路交通安全講習。 劉男認為,當時員警拍攝時間,距離超速取締時間,超過1個小時之久,且被拍的照片,地面完全沒有下雨痕跡,懷疑照片真實性;且警方未派員在「警52」標誌旁看顧,他車迴轉時,也會造成標誌擋住,無法看到,因此不服遭開罰,提起行政訴訟。 綜合相關證據,取締當天路上有部分水痕,因豔陽高照,加上氣溫炎熱,柏油路快乾性質,因此拍攝時,地面已無明顯水痕現場情境相符;此外,駕駛視線可動態前進,行經「警52」標誌擺放處前,仍可清楚、完整目撃該處標誌、標線一情。 此外,警方所持有的測速儀有通過檢定合格,取締當時也在效期內,因此,舉發程序,並無違誤之處;審理後,法官認劉男訴請撤銷原處分為無理由,應予以駁回,且須負擔訴300元訟費,可上訴。

title: "내 남편에게 성적 서비스 제공해 줘서 고맙다 친구야"..불륜녀 칭찬 현수막 내 건 女
creator: moon@fnnews.com 문영진
content: 자료사진. 게티이미지뱅크, SCMP] [파이낸셜뉴스] 가장 친한 친구가 자신의 남편과 바람을 피운 사실을 알게 된 한 여성이 ‘감사 인사’를 전하는 현수막을 통해 복수했다. 31일 홍콩사우스차이나모닝포스트(SCMP)에 따르면 중국 중부 후난성 창사의 한 주거 단지 울타리에 빨간 현수막이 걸렸다. 중국에서는 도움을 준 사람들에게 진심으로 감사의 뜻을 나타낼 때 빨간색을 사용한다. A씨는 현수막에 “B씨는 12년 동안 나의 가장 친한 친구였으며 5년 동안 내 남편에게 성적 서비스를 제공했다”는 내용을 써 넣었다. 이어 “B씨는 근무 시간 동안 가장 친한 친구의 남편과 함께 호텔에 갔다”고 적었다. 현수막은 얼마 지나지 않아 제거된 것으로 알려졌다. 현수막에는 B씨의 직장을 추정할 수 있는 문구도 있었던 것으로 전해졌다. 이에 B씨가 다니는 것으로 추측된 회사에서는 해당 문제에 대한 조사를 진행하고 있는 것으로 알려졌다. 한편, 중국에서는 현수막을 내거는 행위는 법적 처벌을 받을 수 있다. 벌금형에 처해지거나 심한 경우 최대 19일 동안 구금될 수 있다. 실제 2023년에 한 중국 남성이 전 여자친구를 모욕하는 현수막을 내걸고 다른 남성과 두 번 관계를 맺었다고 조롱한 혐의로 10일 동안 구금됐다. moon@fnnews.com 문영진 기자 #현수막 #불륜 #상간녀 ※ 저작권자 c 파이낸셜뉴스, 무단전재-재배포 금지

title: Baywatch-kaunotar kävi rintojen poistossa
creator: Alisa Valta
content: Baywatch-tähti Nicole Eggert paljasti Instagramissa käyneensä läpi rintojen poistossa eli mastektomiassa. Mastektomiassa rinnat poistetaan joko kokonaan tai osittain. Eggert on kertonut avoimesti taistelustaan syöpää vastaan. Hänellä diagnosoitiin rintasyöpä joulukuussa 2023, kertoo brittilehti Mirror . Nyt hän jakoi Instagramissa kuvan itsestään mustissa urheiluliiveissä ja kertoi käyneensä rintojen poistossa. – Minulle tehtiin mastektomia ja rekonstruktio torstaina. Miten sinun viikonloppusi on mennyt? Eggert kirjoitti kuvan yhteyteen. Eggert kertoi syöpähoitojensa toisen vaiheen päättymisestä viime vuonna. Tuolloin hän sanoi People-lehdelle , että pahinta syöpätaistelussa on ollut odotus hoitojen välisenä aikana. – Se on jotain, mitä en osannut odottaa, eikä kukaan oikein puhu siitä, Eggert sanoi. Mirrorin mukaan Eggert sairastaa harvinaista kribriformista rintasyöpää, joka etenee yleensä hitaasti. Eggert oli luullut rintasyöpäoireidensa olevan vaihdevuosioireita. Hän oli lihonnut yli kymmenen kiloa kolmessa kuukaudessa ja kärsi kovista kivuista vasemmassa rinnassaan. Pian Eggert kuitenkin löysi kyhmyn vasemmasta rinnastaan. Lääkärikäynti ja mammografia vahvistivat, että hänellä on syöpä. Eggert on kertonut, ettei matka ole ollut helppo. – Luen aina inspiroivia mietelauseita ja kliseisiä juttuja. Se auttaa minua selviytymään tästä, Eggert on sanonut keskellä syöpähoitoja. Elokuun 8. päivänä Eggert kertoi...

title: Crafty queen: The Brisbane creator turning roadside junk into home treasures
creator: Brittney Deguara
content: A former town planner, a mum-of-two, a DIY queen and a “kerbside collection addict”. Geneva Vanderzeil is a woman of many talents, and sitting in her Highgate Hill studio on Brisbane’s south is like sitting in a craft-lover’s dream. Renovated dollhouses sit on benches, a glass brick lamp is placed on the table, and paint splatters are plentiful. It’s a weekday morning, and we’ve come together to talk about her new book New Again – the third she’s released and an ode to her crafty nature. “ New Again is a masterclass in transforming and upcycling, and restoring your furniture and decor,” she explains. The book is a culmination of about 15 years of knowledge and a way for her fans – 1.3 million of them on Instagram and over 750,000 on TikTok – to glimpse her thought process for tackling projects. “People say, ‘I want to have your brain’, but it’s actually not my brain, it’s just a certain way of looking at things, like seeing the potential of what’s in front of you.” Her journey to becoming a household name in craft and DIY circles began in 2010 with the creation of her DIY fashion blog. As she dedicated more time and effort to her craft, she was able to leave her job as a town planner to pursue it full-time. Now she’s become a master of all things DIY – from turning a glass brick into a lamp, to turning a clock into a dollhouse. The latter, she admits, is one of her obsessions. “The dollhouse addiction has been a bit of a journey,” she says. She shares her studio with several...

title: Consterna muerte de joven arrastrada por auto frente al aeropuerto
creator: LA RED
content: Especial/ LA RED DE ALTAMIRA Tampico.- Los habitantes del sur de Tamaulipas quedaron sobresaltados por la muerte de una muchacha arrollada por un auto desconocido, la madrugada del sábado, que la arrastró varis metros por el bulevar López Mateos. De acuerdo con las autoridades, el percance ocurrió después de las 03:00 horas en el bulevar Adolfo López Mateos, frente al acceso principal de la Universidad Autónoma de Tamaulipas, donde el automóvil Nissan Tsuru color blanco con franja verde habilitado como taxi de sitio en la tienda Soriana Ejército Mexicano impactó a la moto color gris en la que viajaban un hombre y una mujer. Por el golpe en el sitio quedó herido el conductor de la motocicleta, mientras que presuntamente su acompañante trataba de auxiliarlo, en el instante en el que fue arrollada por otra unidad de la que se desconocen características. La arrastró a lo largo del bulevar hasta llegar a la altura del hotel Hampton Inn. El motociclista y el conductor del taxi resultaron heridos, siendo atendidos por brigadistas de la base Voluntarios Zona Sur y trasladados posteriormente a un hospital. La mujer no ha sido identificada y murió en el acto, con el cuerpo casi desmembrado por la abrasión. En redes sociales, la gente de Tampico, Altamira y Ciudad Madero ha exigido justicia.

title: General : King, Queen Grace 2025 National Day Celebration
creator: BERNAMA
content: PUTRAJAYA, Aug 31 (Bernama) -- His Majesty Sultan Ibrahim, King of Malaysia, and Her Majesty Raja Zarith Sofiah, Queen of Malaysia, today graced the 2025 National Day celebration at Dataran Putrajaya, here. Their surprise arrival at 8 am drew cheers and applause from the crowd, many of whom had gathered at the venue since the night before. His Majesty personally drove a blue Proton Satria Neo bearing the registration number WWW1, adding a unique and memorable touch to the event. The Proton Satria Neo, a compact hatchback produced by Proton between 2006 and 2015, is powered by a CamPro engine with a capacity of 1.3 to 1.6 litres. The higher-performance variants feature Cam Profile Switching (CPS) technology, offering enhanced power and responsiveness. The arrival of Their Majesties at the Royal Stage was welcomed by Communications Minister Datuk Fahmi Fadzil, who is the 2025 National Day and Malaysia Day main committee chairman, and his wife, Datin Azrina Puteri Mohamed Mahyuddin. The sound of trumpets echoed across Dataran Putrajaya, signalling the start of the ceremonial segment, before the Hormat Diraja and Negaraku were played by the Main Guard of Honour band. This was followed by a spectacular flyover featuring five helicopters, each proudly displaying the Jalur Gemilang along with the flags of the Malaysian Armed Forces (ATM), the Army (TDM), the Royal Malaysian Navy (RMN), and the Royal Malaysian Air Force (RMAF), soaring across the Putrajaya skyline. His Majesty then...

title: An ninh sân bay bất ngờ về chất bột trắng trong hành lý của nữ người mẫu
creator: Khánh An
content: Lực lượng an ninh kiểm tra hành lý của cô Madison ẢNH CHỤP MÀN HÌNH NEW YORK POST Tờ New York Post ngày 31.8 dẫn lời một phụ nữ tại New York (Mỹ) cho biết cô bị lực lượng an ninh sân bay chặn lại sau khi bột bôi trơn cô mang theo bị nhầm là chất cấm và có thể gây nguy hiểm. Hành khách Lana Madison (29 tuổi) cùng bạn trai mới đây đã bị thẩm vấn tại một sân bay ở Mexico City (Mexico), do lực lượng an ninh bị bối rối về "chất bột trắng" trong hành lý xách tay của cô. "Nhiều người trong số họ vây quanh, chụp hình và cố gắng tìm hiểu đó là gì và tại sao chúng tôi lại có nó. Họ hoàn toàn lúng túng", cô kể. "Họ giữ chúng tôi lại trong 30 phút. Tôi nghĩ họ đã phản ứng thái quá và cần bình tĩnh lại", theo cô Madison, một người mẫu . Dù cô Madison không nói tiếng Tây Ban Nha, bạn trai cô có thể dịch lại và buộc phải diễn tả cách dùng của chất bột trắng đó. "Điều hài hước là anh ấy thật sự dùng cử chỉ tay trong không khí để minh họa nó có thể được dùng như thế nào", cô kể. Cô Madison cho biết mình đã rút ra bài học sau sự việc ẢNH CHỤP MÀN HÌNH NEW YORK POST Sau đó, những nhân viên sân bay đỏ mặt khi nhận ra chất bột trắng trên không bị cấm, trong khi cô Madison không hề bối rối. "Đó là một loại...

title: Giá USD hôm nay 31.8.2025: Giảm ngược chiều euro, bảng Anh
creator: An Yến
content: Giá USD trong nước giảm mạnh trong tuần này. Hiện Ngân hàng Vietcombank mua chuyển khoản 26.162 đồng, tăng 2 đồng so với cuối tuần trước nhưng chiều bán ra giảm 18 đồng, xuống 26.502 đồng sau một tuần. Tương tự, ACB cũng tăng 10 đồng chiều mua vào sau một tuần, lên 26.180 đồng nhưng chiều bán ra giảm 20 đồng, xuống 26.500 đồng... Riêng giá USD tự do tăng 80 đồng sau một tuần khi mua vào lên 26.800 đồng và bán ra lên 26.710 đồng. Ngược chiều đồng USD, giá nhiều ngoại tệ khác ghi nhận một tuần đi lên. Cụ thể, giá euro tại Vietcombank tăng 213 đồng so với cuối tuần trước khi mua chuyển khoản lên 30.244 đồng, bán ra 31.544 đồng; bảng Anh tăng 148 đồng khi mua chuyển khoản 34.884 đồng, bán ra 36.029 đồng; yen Nhật cũng tăng 2 đồng, đưa giá mua lên 174,47 đồng và bán ra 183,83 đồng... Giá USD giảm trong khi nhiều ngoại tệ khác tăng ẢNH: NGỌC THẮNG Giá USD trong nước hạ nhiệt do đầu tuần, Ngân hàng Nhà nước thực hiện bán ngoại tệ kỳ hạn 180 ngày có hủy ngang vào ngày 25 - 26.8 cho các tổ chức tín dụng đang có trạng thái ngoại tệ âm. Mức tỷ giá bán được ấn định ở 26.550 đồng. Cơ chế bán kỳ hạn cho phép nhà điều hành phát đi tín hiệu mạnh mẽ rằng tỷ giá sẽ được kiểm soát ở biên độ nhất định, đồng thời...

title: Tổ công tác 5013 trở lại làm việc, xét cấp sổ hồng cho hàng loạt dự án
creator: Đình Sơn
content: Trong các dự án được gỡ vướng cấp sổ hồng lần này, có một số dự án trước đó từng được cơ quan thẩm quyền có quyết định thanh tra về thủ tục giao đất, tiền sử dụng đất, nguồn gốc sử dụng đất. Điển hình như khu nhà ở thấp tầng Khu II và Khu III (biệt thự Sala Đại Quang Minh) trong Khu đô thị mới Thủ Thiêm (phường An Khánh, TP.HCM) do Công ty cổ phần Đầu tư địa ốc Đại Quang Minh làm chủ đầu tư. Trong đó, khu biệt thự (khu II) có tổng 177 nền, đề nghị cấp sổ hồng cho người mua nhà 64/177 căn biệt thự. Khu nhà ở liên kế (khu III) có tổng 222 nền, đề nghị cấp sổ hồng cho người mua nhà 141/222 căn liên kế. Hai dự án trên được UBND TP.HCM thanh toán cho Công ty cổ phần Đầu tư địa ốc Đại Quang Minh theo hợp đồng BT dự án xây dựng 4 tuyến đường chính trong Khu đô thị mới Thủ Thiêm. Công trình đã được chủ đầu tư và đơn vị thi công nghiệm thu công trình xây dựng đưa vào sử dụng vào thời điểm năm 2018. Tuy nhiên, dự án đã bị thanh tra về thủ tục giao đất nên việc cấp sổ hồng cho người mua nhà bị dừng lại cho đến nay. Khu biệt thự Sala Đại Quang Minh được tháo gỡ cấp sổ hồng cho người mua nhà ẢNH: ĐÌNH SƠN Theo Phòng kinh tế đất (thuộc Sở Nông nghiệp và Môi trường) chủ đầu tư...

title: Nhàn đàm: Tôi nhìn thấy yêu thương trên đường
creator: Hoàng My
content: Người ta tranh thủ đi trốn cái nóng, xả hơi sau cả tuần cuộn mình trong lịch làm việc chật chội. Những chiếc xe bảng trắng bảng vàng lần lượt ghé lại ở các trạm nghỉ chân. Không chỉ giải quyết nhu cầu tạm thời, mà còn là vài khoảnh khắc thư thả ngắn ngủi, ngắm kẻ lại người qua. Chẳng hiểu sao, tôi thích quan sát ở những nơi như này. Mỗi người, mỗi gia đình dường như là một câu chuyện khác nhau. Và đôi khi, chỉ cần nhìn cách người ta dìu nhau xuống xe, tôi cũng hình dung được tình thân phía sau đó ấm lạnh chừng nào. Hôm nọ, là cụ bà ngồi xe lăn, nhưng đầu tóc quần áo gọn gàng. Một phụ nữ, có lẽ là con gái, nhẹ nhàng đẩy xe, cẩn thận hỏi han: "Mẹ muốn uống gì, nước mát hay trà nóng hả mẹ?". Họ không ồn ào, chỉ lặng lẽ đi qua, như một làn gió dịu dàng. Rồi phía sau là một bé gái, chừng mười tuổi, tay xách túi bánh, lon ton chạy tới giúi vào tay bà một bịch sữa nhỏ: "Cái này ngon lắm nè ngoại!". Tôi bỗng thấy tim mình như mềm ra. Một lần khác, tôi bắt gặp cả gia đình ba thế hệ đang ăn nhẹ bên chiếc bàn nhựa. Ông cụ ngồi đầu bàn, cha mẹ ở giữa, hai đứa con thiếu niên phía cuối. Không ai cắm cúi vào điện thoại. Họ đang chuyền nhau hộp xôi đậu, miếng chả lụa, túi trái cây...

title: Cách đơn giản giúp sử dụng FaceTime trên điện thoại Android
creator: Kiến Văn
content: Chỉ vài thao tác đơn giản với FaceTime , người dùng có thể thực hiện cuộc gọi video hoặc âm thanh với bạn bè và người thân. Ngoài các cuộc gọi một-một, FaceTime còn cung cấp nhiều tính năng hấp dẫn như gọi nhóm, mã hóa đầu cuối, chuyển cuộc gọi giữa các thiết bị Apple, tùy chỉnh hình nền ảo, phản hồi bằng biểu tượng cảm xúc, chia sẻ màn hình và SharePlay. Người dùng Android hoàn toàn có thể tham gia vào một cuộc gọi FaceTime ẢNH: ANDROID CENTRAL Thú vị hơn, người dùng Android cũng có thể tham gia vào các cuộc gọi FaceTime ngay cả khi không có ứng dụng chính thức trên Google Play Store. Tất cả nhờ vào khả năng người dùng thiết bị Apple có thể mời người dùng Android tham gia cuộc gọi thông qua một liên kết được tạo ra từ FaceTime. Sử dụng FaceTime trên Android Để thực hiện cuộc gọi FaceTime từ thiết bị Android, người dùng cần nhận liên kết cuộc gọi từ một người dùng iPhone, iPad hoặc Mac. Quy trình tạo liên kết rất đơn giản: người dùng thiết bị Apple chỉ cần mở ứng dụng FaceTime và nhấn vào nút "Tạo liên kết". Họ có thể tùy chọn đặt tên cho liên kết để dễ nhận diện bằng cách nhấn vào "Thêm tên". Sau khi nhấn vào "Sao chép", người dùng có thể chia sẻ liên kết đó qua các công cụ khác...

title: 두산에너빌리티, APEC 참가국 에너지 당국자 본사 방문 “경쟁력 입증”
creator: 김채빈
김채빈 (chaebi@etoday.co.kr)
content: 아시아태평양경제협력체(APEC) 에너지장관회의 참석을 위해 방한한 미국, 말레이시아, 필리핀, 네덜란드 등 각국 정부 에너지 정책 당국자들이 잇따라 두산에너빌리티 창원 본사를 방문했다. 전 세계적인 원자력 비중 확대로 두산에너빌리티에 대한 관심이 높아졌다는 평가다. 31일 두산에너빌리티는 미국 에너지부 토미 조이스 차관보를 비롯한 일행이 25일 경남 창원 본사를 방문해 정연인 부회장이 방문단을 맞이했다고 밝혔다. 이번 방문은 미국 에너지부가 두산에너빌리티의 원자력 사업 역량을 직접 확인하기 위해 마련됐다. 창원 본사에 도착한 에너지부 일행은 원자력 공장을 찾아 대형원전 및 소형모듈원자로(SMR) 기자재 제작 설비를 살펴봤다. 이후 두산에너빌리티 경영진과 면담을 갖고 원자력 사업 협력에 대해 논의했다. 미국 외에도 APEC 회의에 참석한 해외 정부 관계자들의 방문이 이어졌다. 27일에는 말레이시아 부총리 겸 에너지부 장관 일행과 네덜란드 기후녹색성장부 차관 일행, 28일은 프랑스, 잠비아, 오스트리아 정부관계자 일행, 29일 필리핀 에너지부 차관 일행이 두산에너빌리티 창원 본사를 방문해 원자력을 비롯한 에너지 사업역량을 살펴봤다. 두산에너빌리티는 미국 내 원자력 시장에서의 협력을 지속 확대하고 있다. 25일(현지시각) 미국 워싱턴 D.C에서 아마존·엑스-에너지·한국수력원자력과 SMR 사업협력을 위한 업무협약(MOU)을 체결했고, 미국 에너지 개발사업자 페르미 아메리카와도 원전 및 SMR...

title: Đường phố TP.HCM rực rỡ cờ Tổ quốc chào mừng 80 năm Quốc khánh 2-9
creator: NGỌC KHẢI
content: Ghi nhận của Tuổi Trẻ Online , tại khu vực ga metro Bến Thành, ga metro Ba Son... cùng nhiều tuyến đường tại TP.HCM rực rỡ cờ Tổ quốc chào mừng kỷ niệm 80 năm Ngày Quốc khánh nước Cộng hòa xã hội chủ nghĩa Việt Nam (2-9-1975 - 2-9-2025). Hòa chung không khí cả nước chào mừng kỷ niệm 80 năm Quốc khánh 2-9, nhiều địa phương đã tổ chức lễ khánh thành, lễ ra mắt đường cờ Tổ quốc. Trong đó, xã Thái Mỹ (TP.HCM, khu vực huyện Củ Chi trước đây) tổ chức lễ khánh thành công trình đường cờ Tổ quốc tuyến đường Phan Văn Khải (đoạn qua địa bàn xã Thái Mỹ). Đây cũng là công trình thiết thực chào mừng thành công Đại hội đại biểu Đảng bộ xã Thái Mỹ lần thứ I nhiệm kỳ 2025-2030, tiến tới Đại hội đại biểu Đảng bộ TP.HCM nhiệm kỳ 2025-2030 và Đại hội đại biểu toàn quốc lần thứ XIV của Đảng. Trong chuỗi hoạt động chào mừng kỷ niệm 80 năm Cách mạng Tháng Tám thành công và Quốc khánh, trước đó xã Bình Mỹ (khu vực huyện Củ Chi trước đây) đã tổ chức lễ ra mắt tuyến đường cờ Tổ quốc (đường Trung An) Ông Nguyễn Anh Tuấn - chủ tịch UBND xã Bình Mỹ - cho biết tuyến đường cờ Tổ quốc không chỉ góp phần làm đẹp mỹ quan đô thị, nông thôn, mà còn là biểu tượng sinh động thể hiện tinh thần...

title: Từ 'tập vở con nai' đến khát vọng mới
creator: BÙI HOÀI SƠN
content: Đây là dịp để cùng nhìn về tương lai, về một kỷ nguyên vươn mình mạnh mẽ, khẳng định bản lĩnh và vị thế của đất nước trên bản đồ thế giới. Trong hành trình ấy, xây dựng thương hiệu quốc gia trở thành một nhiệm vụ chiến lược - không chỉ là chuyện của vài doanh nghiệp hay một số ngành hàng, mà là hình ảnh, uy tín, giá trị cốt lõi mà cả dân tộc cùng nhau kiến tạo và gìn giữ. Với người Việt Nam, những hạt giống đầu tiên của niềm tin vào năng lực sáng tạo và sản xuất của chính mình được gieo từ rất sớm, ngay trong những năm tháng gian khó. Ở Khu công nghiệp Biên Hòa 1 - khu kỹ nghệ đầu tiên của đất nước hình thành từ năm 1963 - từng có biết bao thương hiệu đi vào ký ức của nhiều thế hệ, trở thành một phần bản sắc Việt Nam. Hình ảnh tập vở Cogido với biểu tượng con nai hồn hậu đã theo chân hàng triệu học sinh miền Nam, cả trước và sau ngày thống nhất đất nước, qua từng giờ học, trang viết. Cogido không chỉ sản xuất giấy, họ làm ra niềm tin rằng người Việt Nam hoàn toàn có thể làm chủ công nghệ, tự tạo ra sản phẩm đạt chuẩn quốc tế. Cùng thời ấy, thương hiệu đường Biên Hòa, bóng đèn Điện Quang, bình ắc quy Đồng Nai, cao su Casumina, thép Vicasa, sữa bột...

title: Ớn lạnh nhìn thép cuộn cả chục tấn trên xe đầu kéo rơi xuống đường
creator: A LỘC
content: Hai vụ rơi thép cuộn từ xe đầu kéo đều xảy ra tại vòng xoay đường Trần Phú - Bình Giã (còn gọi là vòng xoay Hắc Dịch), thuộc phường Tân Thành, TP.HCM (phường Hắc Dịch và xã Sông Xoài thuộc TP. Phú Mỹ, tỉnh Bà Rịa - Vũng Tàu trước đây). Theo báo cáo của Công an phường Tân Thành, trong thời gian 6 ngày (từ 22 đến 27-8), tại vòng xoay Hắc Dịch liên tiếp xảy ra hai vụ tai nạn do xe đầu kéo chở tôn cuộn gây ra. Cụ thể, vụ thứ nhất xảy ra sáng 22-8, xe đầu kéo biển số 72H-034.xx chở 3 cuộn thép. Khi đi vào vòng xoay, 2 cuộn thép trên xe rớt xuống đường lăn vào lề. Hậu quả, một xe máy bị hư hỏng nặng, mặt đường tại vòng xoay bị cuộn thép rơi tạo nhiều vết cà trên mặt đường. Tiếp đó, khoảng 10h10 ngày 27-8 cũng tại vòng xoay Hắc Dịch, xe đầu kéo biển số 72H-003.xx chở theo 6 cuộn thép. Khi xe đang đi trong giao lộ thì 2 cuộn thép trên xe rớt xuống đường. Nơi cuộn thép rơi tạo nhiều vết cà trên mặt đường. Nhìn hai cuộc thép nặng cả chục tấn rơi xuống đường, nhiều người dân không khỏi lo lắng và bức xúc. "Trời ơi, xem mà nổi da gà luôn. Gì đâu mà lao kinh khủng quá, hên là giờ này ít người qua lại. Vòng xoay bé xíu, xe đông mà các anh chạy như vầy là chết rồi", một người dân lên tiếng....

title: Bộ Nội vụ đề xuất trợ cấp 1 triệu đồng/tháng với thanh niên xung phong từ 1-12-2025
creator: THÀNH CHUNG
content: Bộ Tư pháp đang thẩm định dự thảo nghị định điều chỉnh chế độ trợ cấp hằng tháng đối với thanh niên xung phong đã hoàn thành nhiệm vụ trong kháng chiến và thanh niên xung phong cơ sở ở miền Nam tham gia kháng chiến giai đoạn 1965 - 1975. Dự thảo do Bộ Nội vụ xây dựng. Tại dự thảo, Bộ Nội vụ đề xuất quy định mức trợ cấp hằng tháng bằng 2 lần mức chuẩn trợ giúp xã hội thay vì quy định bằng mức tiền cụ thể như trước đây. Đồng thời gắn việc điều chỉnh trợ cấp hằng tháng đối với thanh niên xung phong theo sự điều chỉnh mức chuẩn trợ giúp xã hội. Việc này, nhằm đảm bảo trợ cấp đối với thanh niên xung phong được điều chỉnh tự động, kịp thời mỗi khi Chính phủ điều chỉnh mức chuẩn trợ giúp xã hội mà không cần phải ban hành Nghị định riêng về điều chỉnh trợ cấp đối với thanh niên xung phong. Như vậy, mức trợ cấp hàng tháng đối với thanh niên xung phong sẽ được điều chỉnh từ 540.000 đồng/tháng lên mức 1 triệu đồng/người/tháng (bằng 2 lần mức chuẩn trợ giúp xã hội) từ nguồn ngân sách địa phương. Theo đó, mỗi thanh niên xung phong sẽ được tăng thêm 460.000 đồng/người/tháng. Thời điểm hưởng trợ cấp hàng tháng đối với thanh niên xung phong từ ngày 1-12-2025. Theo thống...

title: Mách bạn cách ngồi để không bị béo bụng
creator: LINH HÂN
content: Theo bác sĩ Nguyễn Anh Tuấn - phó viện trường Viện Phẫu thuật tiêu hóa, Bệnh viện Trung ương Quân đội 108, ngồi nhiều là một trong những nguyên nhân chính gây ra tình trạng béo bụng . Nguyên nhân là do khi ngồi lâu, cơ thể tiêu hao ít năng lượng hơn so với đứng hoặc di chuyển, dẫn đến dư thừa calo, tích mỡ. Bên cạnh đó, nhiều người ngồi sai tư thế, ngồi cong lưng hoặc gập bụng khiến cơ bụng bị yếu đi, mỡ dễ tích tụ. Tư thế ngồi lệch hoặc nghiêng làm tăng áp lực lên cột sống và vùng eo. Đặc biệt, việc ăn uống không kiểm soát khi ngồi làm việc, thói quen ăn vặt hoặc uống nước ngọt trong lúc ngồi làm việc dẫn đến tích tụ calo dư thừa. Ngồi lâu giảm lưu thông máu và làm chậm quá trình trao đổi chất, gây tích tụ mỡ bụng. Theo bác sĩ Tuấn, việc ngồi lâu là một trong những nguyên nhân chính gây ra tình trạng tích tụ mỡ bụng. Tuy nhiên, bạn hoàn toàn có thể kiểm soát điều này bằng cách điều chỉnh tư thế ngồi và kết hợp với một lối sống lành mạnh. Duy trì tư thế "ngồi đứng" bằng cách: Ngồi thẳng lưng (lưng dựa nhẹ vào ghế, giữ thẳng nhưng không căng cứng); vai thư giãn (tránh nhô vai hoặc gù lưng); thắt lưng sát vào ghế (có thể đặt một chiếc gối nhỏ ở phần...

title: Côn Đảo sẽ chính thức hòa lưới điện quốc gia vào dịp Quốc khánh 2 9
creator: Diệu
content: Công tác chuẩn bị đang được gấp rút thực hiện Sự kiện không chỉ có ý nghĩa kỹ thuật - khi Việt Nam hoàn thành một trong những tuyến cáp ngầm biển dài nhất cả nước - mà còn mang tính chiến lược về an ninh năng lượng, kinh tế và xã hội. Khi không còn phụ thuộc vào dầu diesel, Côn Đảo sẽ có đủ điện để phát triển hạ tầng du lịch - dịch vụ, thu hút đầu tư, nâng cao đời sống cư dân và giảm gánh nặng bù lỗ cho Tập đoàn Điện lực Việt Nam (EVN). Chỉ riêng năm 2023, EVN đã phải bù 210 tỷ đồng do chi phí phát điện diesel cao, năm 2024 dự kiến hơn 230 tỷ đồng. Từ nay, Nhà máy diesel An Hội sẽ chuyển sang vai trò dự phòng. Dự án cấp điện từ lưới điện quốc gia cho huyện Côn Đảo (thuộc tỉnh Bà Rịa - Vũng Tàu cũ, nay là Đặc khu Côn Đảo, TP Hồ Chí Minh) có tổng mức đầu tư 4.923 tỷ đồng, trong đó hơn 2.500 tỷ đồng từ ngân sách trung ương, phần còn lại là vốn tự có của EVN. Công trình do Ban Quản lý dự án Điện 3 (EVNPMB3) đại diện chủ đầu tư. Quy mô dự án gồm mở rộng một ngăn lộ 110kV tại Trạm 220kV Vĩnh Châu, kéo 77,7 km cáp ngầm biển, gần 18 km đường dây trên không từ đất liền ra điểm chuyển tiếp, thêm 8,5 km cáp ngầm trên đảo, và đặc biệt là xây dựng mới Trạm biến áp 110kV GIS Côn Đảo...

title: Trio of injured men's players retire from US Open
creator: ESPN
content: NEW YORK -- Three players retired from their US Open men's singles matches Saturday, making it seven who have bowed out of the field at the Grand Slam tournament because of injury. , and exited mid-match in the third round a day after American decided he . and called it in the first round, and fifth-seeded in the second. Hours after Shelton retired, to beat on Friday night and, at 38, become the oldest man to reach the fourth round of the US Open since Jimmy Connors was the same age in 1991. Cobolli said Saturday he felt something in his right arm while facing fellow Italian . "I knew at the beginning of the match that I was at my limit, and I played a lot of hours in those few days and I didn't recover like I wanted," Cobolli said. "I think it's going to be worse if I continued in that match." Cobolli added in Italian he couldn't serve the way he wanted to because he was worried but didn't think it was a serious injury. Musetti said he thought Cobolli going through a couple of five-set matches in the first two rounds made his countryman tired and called winning that way "a bitter end." "I didn't want to finish like that," Musetti said. "I wish him to be healthy again soon." There were five retirements on the men's side at Wimbledon, six plus two walkovers at the French Open and nine at the Australian Open. At the US Open, there have also been two retirements on the women's side: in the first round and in the second.

title: ആനക്കാംപൊയില്‍-കള്ളാടി-മേപ്പാടി തുരങ്കപാത; നിർമാണോദ്ഘാടനം ഇന്ന് മുഖ്യമന്ത്രി നിർവഹിക്കും
creator: അന്വേഷണം ലേഖകൻ
content: കോഴിക്കോട്: ആനക്കാംപൊയില്‍-കള്ളാടി-മേപ്പാടി തുരങ്കപാത നിര്‍മാണ പ്രവൃത്തിയ്ക്ക് ഇന്ന് ഔദ്യോഗികമായി തുടക്കം കുറിക്കും. പ്രവൃത്തി ഉദ്ഘാടനം ഇന്ന് വൈകീട്ട് നാല് മണിക്ക് കോഴിക്കോട് ജില്ലയിലെ ആനക്കാംപൊയില്‍ സെന്റ് മേരീസ് സ്‌കൂള്‍ ഗ്രൗണ്ടില്‍ മുഖ്യമന്ത്രി പിണറായി വിജയന്‍ നിര്‍വഹിക്കും. തുരങ്ക പാതയുടെ നിർമാണം ആരംഭിക്കുന്നതോടെ നാളുകൾ നീണ്ട യാത്രാ ദുരിതത്തിനാണ് പരിഹാരമാകുന്നത്. വലിയ പ്രതീക്ഷയോടെയാണ് ജനങ്ങൾ പദ്ധതിയെ ഉറ്റുനോക്കുന്നത്.മറിപ്പുഴ (കോഴിക്കോട്) മുതല്‍ മീനാക്ഷി പാലം (വയനാട്, കള്ളാടി) വരെ അപ്രോച്ച് റോഡ് ഉള്‍പ്പെടെ 8.735 കിലോമീറ്റര്‍ ദൈര്‍ഘ്യമുള്ള തുരങ്കപാതയുടെ 8.11 കിലോമീറ്റര്‍ ദൂരം ഇരട്ട തുരങ്കങ്ങളാണ്. പദ്ധതിയില്‍ ഇരുവഴിഞ്ഞി പുഴക്ക് കുറുകെ രണ്ട് പ്രധാന പാലങ്ങളും മറ്റ് മൂന്ന് ചെറുപാലങ്ങളും ഉള്‍പ്പെടും. ആറ് വളവുകളുള്ള റൂട്ടില്‍ ഓരോ 300 മീറ്ററിലും ഇരട്ട തുരങ്കങ്ങളെ തമ്മില്‍ ബന്ധിപ്പിക്കുന്ന പാതയും (ക്രോസ്സ് പാസ്സേജ്) ഉണ്ടാവും. പദ്ധതിയുടെ ആകെ ചെലവ് 2134.50 കോടി രൂപയാണ്.നിലവിൽ കച്ചവട ആവശ്യങ്ങൾക്കും മറ്റും വയനാട്ടിലേക്ക് പോകാൻ കിലോമീറ്ററുകൾ താണ്ടണം. മണിക്കൂറുകൾ ഗതാഗത കുരുക്കിൽ കിടക്കണം. തുരങ്ക പാത യാഥാർഥ്യമായാൽ ഇതിനൊക്കെ പരിഹാരമാകുമെന്നാണ് ജനങ്ങൾ പ്രതീക്ഷിക്കുന്നത്. ആനക്കാംപൊയിലിൻ്റെയും സമീപ പ്രദേശങ്ങളുടെയും വികസന കുതിപ്പിന് കൂടി തുരങ്ക പാത വഴിത്തുറക്കും. പദ്ധതി പൂര്‍ത്തിയായാല്‍ കോഴിക്കോട്‌വയനാട് ഗതാഗതം സുഗമമാവും. യാത്രാസമയം കുറയുകയും വിനോദസഞ്ചാര-വ്യാപാര മേഖലകള്‍ക്ക് വന്‍ ഉണര്‍വ് ലഭിക്കുകയും ചെയ്യുമെന്നാണ് പ്രതീക്ഷ.പ്രവൃത്തി ഉദ്ഘാടന ചടങ്ങില്‍ പൊതുമരാമത്ത് വിനോദസഞ്ചാര വകുപ്പ് മന്ത്രി പി എ മുഹമ്മദ് റിയാസ് അധ്യക്ഷനാവും. ധനകാര്യ മന്ത്രി കെ എന്‍ ബാലഗോപാല്‍,...

title: អាមេរិកគ្រោង​ដាក់ពន្ធប្រឆាំងការលក់បង្ខូចតម្លៃលើដែកថែបវៀតណាម
creator: Huon Dina
content: ក្រសួងពាណិជ្ជកម្មសហរដ្ឋអាមេរិកកាលពីពេលថ្មីៗនេះ បានប្រកាសថា ខ្លួននឹងដាក់ពន្ធប្រឆាំងការលក់បង្ខូចតម្លៃលើការនាំចូលដែកថែបធន់នឹងច្រែះ (CORE) ពីប្រទេសចំនួន ១០ រួមទាំងប្រទេសវៀតណាមផងដែរ ក្រោយ​ពីរកឃើញថាដែកថែបនាំចូលទាំងនោះដាក់តម្លៃថោកៗ ឬទទួល​បាន​ការឧបត្ថម្ភធនពីរដ្ឋ។ ក្រសួងបាន​និយាយយ៉ាងដូច្នេះថា៖ «ក្រសួង​ពាណិជ្ជកម្មបានកំណត់ជាចុងក្រោយ​ថា CORE ដែល​បាន​នាំចូល​មកសហរដ្ឋអាមេរិកពីដៃគូពាណិជ្ជកម្មចំនួន ១០ ត្រូវបាន​លក់បង្ខូចតម្លៃ និង/ឬទទួលបាន​ការឧបត្ថម្ភធន»។ ការកំណត់នេះប៉ះពាល់លើ​ផលិតផល CORE ដែលមានសារៈសំខាន់ផលិតកម្ម​រថយន្ត គ្រឿងប្រើប្រាស់ និងសំណង់អាគារ ក្នុងតម្លៃសរុប ២,៩ ប៊ីលាន​ដុល្លារអាមេរិក ដែលនាំចូលពីវៀតណាំម អូស្ត្រាលី ប្រេស៊ីល កាណាដា ម៉ិកស៊ិក ហូឡង់ អាហ្រ្វិកខាងត្បូង តៃវ៉ាន់ តួកគី និងអារ៉ាប់រួម។ សម្រាប់​វៀតណាម ពន្ធ​បង្ក​ការ​គំរាម​កំហែង​ទ្វេ​ដង។ សហរដ្ឋអាមេរិកគឺជាទីផ្សារដែកថែបដ៏សំខាន់ ដូច្នេះការដាក់ពន្ធអាចធ្វើឱ្យ​ការប្រកួតប្រជែងតម្លៃចុះខ្សោយ កាត់បន្ថយការបញ្ជាទិញ និងជំរុញក្រុមហ៊ុនឱ្យស្វែងរកអ្នកទិញថ្មី។ ទន្ទឹមនឹងនេះ សេចក្តីសម្រេចបានឆ្លុះបញ្ចាំងពីកំណើនគោលនយោបាយការពារនិយមជាសាកល ដែលធ្វើ​ឱ្យវិស័យដែកថែបវៀតណាម​ងាយរងគ្រោះទៅនឹង​ការស៊ើបអង្កេត​ប្រឆាំងនឹងការលក់បង្ខូចតម្លៃ៕ The post អាមេរិកគ្រោង​ដាក់ពន្ធប្រឆាំងការលក់បង្ខូចតម្លៃលើដែកថែបវៀតណាម appeared first on Kampuchea Thmey Daily.

title: 롯데백화점, 잠실 롯데월드몰에 국내 최대 '하고하우스' 열어
creator: 홍승완
content: 롯데백화점이 지난 29일 하고하우스 국내 최대 매장을 잠실 롯데월드몰 지하 1층에 선보였다고 31일 밝혔다. 하고하우스는 전도 유망한 디자이너 브랜드를 발굴해 소개하고 유통하는 패션 편집 매장이다. 앞서 롯데백화점은 동탄점을 시작으로 전국 각지 주요 점포에 총 13개 매장을 잇달아 열었다. 롯데월드몰 하고하우스는 지난 2022년 문을 연 전국 매출 1위 매장이다. 롯데백화점은 이번 새단장을 통해 디지털 기반의 새로운 콘셉트를 국내 최초로 적용했다. 인테리어에서부터 상품 운영, 브랜드 구성까지 매장 전반을 전면 개편하고, 매장 규모도 기존 대비 40% 가량 키웠다. 100평대에 이르는 매장에는 마뗑킴을 비롯해 드파운드, 유니폼브릿지, 뮈뮈에르 등 K패션을 이끄는 19개 브랜드가 자리 잡았다. 매장에는 ‘하고 서울 익스클루시브 존’을 마련해 롯데월드몰에서만 만나볼 수 있는 단독 상품을 선보인다. 마뗑킴, 유니폼 브릿지, 마가린핑거스, 랭앤루 등 브랜드에서 티셔츠, 모자, 키링, 파우치, 크로스백, 토트백 등 80여종의 특별 한정판 제품을 선보인다. 롯데백화점은 리뉴얼 오픈을 기념해 이달 31일까지 매장 방문 고객에게 마뗑킴의 코스메틱 브랜드인 마지두마뗑의 마스크 팩을 증정한다. 또 10만원 이상 구매부터 구매 금액에 따라 마뗑킴의 마틴 미니체인 키링, 스트링 백팩, 럭키 박스 등을 선착순 제공한다. 롯데백화점 영디자이너팀 치프바이어는 "앞으로도 젊은 세대들의 트렌드, 취향 등을 선도할 다양한 매장을 선보일...

content: San Nicolás de los Garza.- Por encima de los 35 grados Celsius, no hubo golpe de calor que detuviera a la constelación de estrellas rumbo al Juego de Leyendas que se protagonizará este domingo en la cancha del estadio Universitario entre Tigres y Barcelona.TE PODRÍA INTERESAR: Todo listo para el juego de leyendas entre Tigres y Barcelona en el VolcánLos años y el retiro deportivo tampoco fueron impedimento para que cada una de las viejas glorias de ambos clubes entrenara y trabajara como en sus mejores años futbolísticos. title: 吵架男遭推落沸水沙井活活燙死 撈起時內臟已煮熟
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 美國一名前法醫揭露她職業生涯中最令人心碎、噩夢連連的一宗死亡案件:一名男子被朋友毆打後,活生生推落曼哈頓一口滿佈沸水的地熱井,在高達攝氏148度的高溫下「像龍蝦般被蒸熟」,全程清醒,歷時數小時才死亡,慘況堪稱「世上最恐怖的死法之一」。 這宗悲劇發生在2022年聖誕假期期間,死者為紐約市一名酒吧調酒師西恩・道爾(Sean Doyle),當時43歲。根據《紐約郵報》報道,資深法醫茱蒂・梅林尼克(Dr. Judy Melinek)披露,這宗案件是她兩年任職紐約市首席法醫辦公室期間,唯一讓她「連續數晚發噩夢」的死亡個案。 當時,道爾與一名男性友人及其女友在外喝酒,回家途中發生爭執,對方懷疑道爾調戲其伴侶,盛怒下毆打他,並將他推落一個未蓋上的地下井蓋。井深18呎(約5.5米),本已驚險,但更悲劇的是,井底不是空氣或水泥地,而是滾燙的蒸汽管道,來自破裂的主熱水管,溫度高達攝氏148度。 儘管道爾當場重摔至井底,他卻未立即死亡,亦無頭部創傷或骨折,意味著他全程保持清醒。在地底蒸汽籠罩的密閉空間,他慘叫求救,但由於高溫與濃煙,消防員與急救人員無法即時下井營救,只能聽著他的呼喊,卻無能為力。 四小時後,當救援人員終於撈起道爾遺體時,其體溫仍高達攝氏51度,實際恐怕更高,只是溫度計已達上限。根據茱蒂的驗屍報告,道爾皮膚已大面積脫落,內臟被「煮熟」,彷彿遭蒸氣長時間蒸煮的龍蝦。 「他是完全清醒地,被慢慢蒸死,沒有失去意識,這正是最可怕之處。」茱蒂說。 涉事的朋友其後被控二級謀殺罪。

title: «¿Qué estamos haciendo? ¡Esto es un papelón!»: Mirtha Legrand impactada en El Trece por lo que sucedió con una de sus invitadas
creator: Damián Aloi
content: Siempre sincera, directa y sin pelos en la lengua. De esta manera es como se muestra una de las figuras más importantes del mundo del espectáculo de nuestro país, como es el caso de Mirtha Legrand, quien se ha convertido en una verdadera leyenda, como ella misma lo afirma. Esta vez, fue noticia nuevamente por lo que sucedió en su programa que lleva adelante a través de la pantalla de Canal Trece, La Noche de Mirtha, y donde con todo su ingenio sacó las declaraciones más jugosas de una mesa cargada de figuras. En este caso, estuvieron presentes la reconocida periodista Jésica Bossi, la actriz y conductora Claribel Medina, la bailarina Vanina Escudero, el humorista y actor Fredy Villarreal, y el también comunicador Diego Cabot, quienes se sinceraron como nunca antes. Fue en pleno programa donde se habló sobre lo difícil que es conservar una pareja cuando los dos son del medio. Sin tapujos, Claribel Medina contó lo que vivieron con Pablo Alarcón, con quien estuvo distanciada durante años, luego de terminar su vínculo amoroso. «Nosotros tuvimos una circunstancia con una de nuestras hijas que nos hizo bajar los decibeles a los dos. Bajar el resentimiento. Agostina tuvo un tema de salud bastante serio... nos miramos en la clínica a los ojos y dijimos ‘¿Qué estamos haciendo? ¿Qué es este papelón? ¡Esto es un papelón!», lanzó la actriz delante de Mirtha Legrand , quien se quedó impactad con el relato. «Nos fuimos a hablar y dijimos ‘Esto tiene que terminar,...

title: Three brothers set new record for 9,000-mile Pacific row
creator: NEWS WIRE
content: EDINBURGH - Three brothers from Edinburgh have claimed a new record for rowing non-stop and unsupported across the Pacific Ocean after almost 140 days at sea. Jamie, Ewan and Lachlan Maclean endured violent tropical storms, which forced them into making lengthy detours on their 9,000-mile (14,484km) journey from Peru to Australia. During one storm, Lachlan was swept overboard by a large wave before being pulled back into the boat. The brothers, who have been reunited with their family and friends in Cairns, in eastern Australia, said they were looking forward to pizza - and a decent night’s sleep. Ewan told BBC Breakfast: “It’s still slightly surreal - it’s going to take a wee while for our feet to touch the ground, but what an amazing reception we’ve had in Cairns.” Jamie said the crossing had been physically and mentally “relentless”, but added: “Together we form a pretty good team, and together we’ve overcome this massive challenge.” The Scottish trio have beaten the previous record of 162 days for the fastest full, unassisted, non-stop Pacific row, set by Russian solo rower Fyodor Konyukhov in 2014. Their final time was 139 days, five hours and 52 minutes. The Macleans did much of their training in the sea near a croft they have in Assynt in the north west Highlands. Their carbon fibre boat is called Rose Emily, in memory of their sister who died in 1996, six-and-a-half months into the pregnancy following complications. title: Wayanad Tunnel Road: കേരളം ഇനി കുതിക്കും; വയനാട് തുരങ്കപാതയ്ക്ക് മുഖ്യമന്ത്രി ഇന്ന് തറക്കല്ലിടും
creator: Sarika KP
content: കോഴിക്കോട്: സംസ്ഥാനത്തിന്റെ വ്യവസായിക വികസനത്തിന് കുതിപ്പേകാൻ വയനാട് തുരങ്കപാതയ്ക്ക് മുഖ്യമന്ത്രി പിണറായി വിജയന്‍ ഇന്ന് തറക്കല്ലിടും. ഇന്ന് വൈകിട്ട് നാല് മണിക്ക് കോഴിക്കോട് ജില്ലയിലെ ആനക്കാംപൊയിലെ സെന്റ് മേരീസ് സ്കൂള്‍ ഗ്രൗണ്ടില്‍ വച്ചാണ് തുരങ്കപാതയുടെ ഉദ്ഘാടന ചടങ്ങ് നിർവ്വ​ഹിക്കുക.. മന്ത്രിമാരായ മുഹമ്മദ് റിയാസ്, കെഎന്‍ ബാലഗോപാല്‍ തുടങ്ങിയവര്‍ ചടങ്ങിൽ പങ്കെടുക്കും.ഇതോടെ കേരളം സ്വപ്ന കണ്ട ഏറ്റവും വലിയ പദ്ധതിയായ ആനക്കാംപൊയിൽ - കള്ളാടി – മേപ്പാടി തുരങ്കപാത നിർമാണ പ്രവൃത്തിക്ക് ഔദ്യോഗികമായി തുടക്കം കുറിക്കും. വയനാട് ജില്ലയിൽ 5.58 കിലോമീറ്ററും കോഴിക്കോട് ജില്ലയിൽ 3.15 കിലോമീറ്ററും നീളം വരുന്ന (ആകെ 8.735 കിലോമീറ്റർ). 2134 കോടിയാണ് നിര്‍മാണ ചെലവ്.Also Read:മഴ മാറി മാനം തെളിഞ്ഞു! രണ്ടിന് വീണ്ടും ന്യൂനമര്‍ദം?ഇത് പൂർത്തിയാകുന്നതോടെ താമരശ്ശേരി ചുരം ഒഴിവാക്കി എളുപ്പത്തിൽ വയനാട്ടിലെത്താം. മേപ്പാടിയിലേക്ക് 8.2 കിലോമീറ്ററിന്റേയും സുല്‍ത്താന്‍ ബത്തേരിയിലേക്ക് ഒരു കിലോമീറ്ററിന്റേയും കുറവാണുണ്ടാകുന്നത്. എന്നാൽ ജില്ലാ ആസ്ഥാനമായ കല്‍പറ്റയിലേക്ക് 7 കിലോമീറ്ററും മാനന്തവാടിയിലേക്ക് 12 കിലോമീറ്ററും അധികം സഞ്ചരിക്കേണ്ടി വരും. പക്ഷെ ഹെയര്‍പിന്‍ വളവുകളൊന്നുമില്ലാത്തതുകൊണ്ട് നിലവിൽ എടുക്കുന്നതിനെക്കാൾ പകുതി സമയമേ വേണ്ടിവരൂമെന്നാണ് വിവരം.ഊട്ടി, മൈസുരു, ബെംഗളൂരു തുടങ്ങിയ സ്ഥലങ്ങളിലേക്കുള്ള യാത്രയും സുഗമമാകും. സംസ്ഥാനത്തെ ഏറ്റവും വലിയ തുരങ്കപാതയാകും ആനക്കാംപോയിലേത്.കോഴിക്കോട് മറിപ്പുഴ മുതൽ വയനാട്, കള്ളാടി മീനാക്ഷി പാലം വരെ അപ്രോച്ച് റോഡ്‌ ഉൾപ്പെടെ 8.735 കിലോമീറ്റർ ദൈർഘ്യമുള്ള തുരങ്കപാതയുടെ 8.11 കിലോമീറ്റർ ദൂരം ഇരട്ട തുരങ്കങ്ങളാണ്. പദ്ധതിയിൽ ഇരുവഴിഞ്ഞി പുഴക്ക് കുറുകെ രണ്ട്...

title: Xe chiến đấu bộ binh XCB-01 do Việt Nam sản xuất có gì đặc biệt?
creator: Theo Minh Chiến
content: Xe chiến đấu bộ binh XCB-01, sản phẩm do Việt Nam tự nghiên cứu và chế tạo được trưng bày tại Triển lãm Thành tựu Đất nước với chủ đề "80 năm hành trình Độc lập - Tự do - Hạnh phúc" tại Trung tâm Triển lãm Quốc gia (xã Đông Anh, Hà Nội). Xe chiến đấu bộ binh bọc thép XCB-01 do Việt Nam chế tạo có gì đặc biệt? Video: Minh Chiến Đây là xe chiến đấu bộ binh bọc thép bánh xích đầu tiên do Tổng cục Công nghiệp Quốc phòng Việt Nam nghiên cứu, thiết kế và chế tạo trong nước. Xe có kíp lái 3 người, sử dụng hệ thống bánh xích, cho khả năng cơ động tốt trên nhiều loại địa hình phức tạp. Thiết kế tổng thể chịu ảnh hưởng từ BMP-1 do Liên Xô sản xuất nhưng có cải tiến để phù hợp hơn với điều kiện huấn luyện, tác chiến tại Việt Nam. Xe XCB-01 tham gia tổng hợp luyện A80. Ảnh: Minh Chiến Xe có kíp lái 3 người, sử dụng hệ thống bánh xích, cho khả năng cơ động tốt trên nhiều loại địa hình phức tạp. Cửa ra vào chính nằm phía sau, cho phép bộ binh đổ quân an toàn trong điều kiện chiến đấu. Bên trong, khoang chở quân có thể chứa 8 chiến sĩ cùng trang bị cá nhân, kèm theo lỗ châu mai để bắn từ trong xe. Xe cũng được tích hợp hệ thống bảo hộ trước nguy cơ vũ khí sinh hóa và hạt nhân....

title: Giá cà phê hôm nay 31-8: Phân tích thị trường của "ông trùm cà phê"
creator: Theo Ngọc Ánh, đồ họa: AN NA
content: Hôm nay, 31-8, thị trường không có giá tham chiếu trên các sàn giao dịch của thế giới, giá trong nước 122.400 đồng/kg, giảm so với cuối tuần trước đến 1.500 đồng/kg trong khi giá thế giới lên 4.815 USD/tấn (kỳ hạn giao tháng 11-2025), cao hơn cuối tuần trước 165 USD/tấn. Ông Đỗ Hà Nam Trao đổi với , ông Đỗ Hà Nam, Phó Chủ tịch Hiệp hội Cà phê – Ca cao Việt Nam (VICOFA), người đứng đầu Tập đoàn Intimex, thường gọi là "ông trùm cà phê" đã có những lý giải về thị trường. Ông Nam nhận định giá cà phê trên sàn gần đây tăng nóng, đạt mức đỉnh so với vài tháng gần đây nhưng có thể chỉ là nhất thời. Giá cà phê Robusta giao tháng 11-2025 trên sàn London tuần qua Nguyên nhân, có sự thiếu hụt một phần nguồn cung do Brazil bán ra chậm, Indonesia đã hết vụ thu hoạch, còn Việt Nam chưa vào vụ. Nguồn hàng từ sàn London không nhiều, dẫn đến tình trạng sàn thiếu hàng và làm cho thị trường biến động theo hướng đi lên. Chưa kể, các nhà đầu cơ cũng tranh thủ "tạo sóng" để kiếm lợi nhuận. Về việc giá cà phê trong nước và trên sàn không đi song hành cùng nhau, "ông trùm cà phê" giải thích điều đó thể hiện vai trò tham gia điều tiết thị trường của nông dân Việt Nam khi kinh tế khá giả. "Khi nông dân không hài...

title: 조정석 '좀비딸' 흥행, 8월 영화시장 매출액 1300억 원⋯연중 최고치
creator: 송석주 (ssp@etoday.co.kr)
송석주
content: 8월 영화시장 매출액이 약 1300억 원으로 집계됐다. 이는 올해 월별 최대 매출액이다. 조정석 주연의 '좀비딸'을 비롯해 '극장판 귀멸의 칼날: 무한성편', 'F1 더 무비' 등 애니메이션과 외화 블록버스터가 고른 흥행을 거둔 덕분이다. 31일 본지가 영화진흥위원회 영화관입장권통합전산망 수치를 살펴본 결과, 8월 영화시장 매출액은 약 1300억 원으로 확인됐다. 이는 연중 최고치로 직전 달인 7월 매출액(1147억 원)보다 200억 원 가까이 증가했다. 지난해 8월 영화시장 매출액은 1167억 원이었다. 조정석 주연의 '파일럿'이 376억 원의 매출로 8월 전체 흥행 1위를 차지하며 극장가를 견인했다. 올해에도 조정석 주연의 '좀비딸'이 약 440억 원의 매출을 올리며 1위를 기록했다. 이 같은 성과는 조정석이라는 스타 배우의 활약과 함께 '국민 영화관람 활성화 지원 사업'의 영향이 크다. 지난달 25일 문화체육관광부는 영화관 입장권 6000원 할인권 총 450만 장을 선착순으로 배포한 바 있다. 배포 시작 3일 만에 전량 발급이 완료됐다. 실제 사용률 또한 50%를 넘겼다. 전날 CGV영등포에서 영화 '좀비딸'을 관람한 김영수 문체부 차관은 "발급된 영화 할인권은 9월 2일까지 사용할 수 있어 국민들이 기한 내 영화관을 찾아주길 바란다"라며 영화 관람을 독려했다. '좀비딸'은 개봉 26일 만에 500만 관객을 돌파하며 올해 역대 최고 흥행 성적을 기록했다. 영화는 좀비가 된 딸을 지키기 위해 극비 훈련에 돌입한...

title: Istanbul’s ferries, a beloved link between two continents
creator: NEWS WIRE
content: ISTANBUL - For nearly two centuries, the white ferries gliding over the Bosphorus Strait have provided an iconic link for countless passengers travelling between Istanbul’s European shores and its Asian side. Despite the increasingly congested waters and competition from the Turkish megacity’s bridges and undersea metro line, the ferries remain very popular. The main operator Sehir Hatlari carries at least 40 million passengers a year. “Any view of Istanbul must include Maiden’s Tower, a ferry and a seagull,” smiled Adil Bali, a specialist on the history of Istanbul’s ferries, referring to a tiny rocky outcrop at the southern entrance to the Bosphorus. “It is one of the few cities in the world that can be crossed by sea, so the ferries are indispensable here.” Their arrival in 1843 transformed the simple fishing villages lining the shores of the Bosphorus into popular holiday destinations where wooden palaces were later built overlooking the water, boosting trade. Until the first Bosphorus bridge was opened in 1973, the only way to cross between Istanbul’s Asian and European sides was by boat and today, the experience remains an essential part of the city’s charm. At the helm of the Pasabahce, the flagship of Sehir Hatlari’s 30 vessels, Captain Ekrem Ozcelik said the waters had become increasingly crowded. “There’s a lot more traffic on the water,” he said of the tankers, containers and cargo ships that pass through the strait linking the Black Sea to the Aegean via the Sea...

title: Supremo de Brasil ordena endurecer vigilancia policial en residencia de Bolsonaro
creator: Betania Boadas
content: La Corte Suprema de Brasil ordenó endurecer la vigilancia policial frente a la residencia del expresidente Jair Bolsonaro, con el fin de evitar que se fugue, decisión tomada en vísperas del inicio de la fase final de su juicio por intento de golpe de Estado.Supremo de Brasil ordena endurecer vigilancia policial en residencia de BolsonaroEl magistrado Alexandre de Moraes, instructor del caso, dispuso que los agentes de la Policía Penal de Brasilia registren todos los vehículos que salen de la residencia del ex mandatario y le informen sobre los conductores y los pasajeros.Además, instruyó el monitoreo del área externa de la residencia, donde el ex presidente (2019-2022) cumple prisión preventiva desde inicios de agosto.Según el auto del magistrado, estas medidas buscan conciliar “la privacidad” de los demás ocupantes de la casa, donde Bolsonaro vive con su esposa y su hija, con la “necesaria garantía de la ley penal” y así impedir “cualquier posibilidad de fuga”.De Moraes, en coincidencia con la opinión de la Fiscalía, descartó ordenar la vigilancia de los movimientos del ex mandatario dentro de la vivienda, como había sugerido la Policía Federal.Un grupo de agentes ya vigilaba los alrededores de la residencia, pero el inicio de la fase final del proceso previsto para este martes llevó al magistrado a reforzar las medidas de control.Además de la reclusión domiciliaria, el ex mandatario lleva una tobillera electrónica y tiene prohibido el uso de redes...

title: El mierense Javier Carballo, nuevo prior provincial de los dominicos en España
creator: X. F.
content: El fraile dominico Javier Carballo (Bustiello, Mieres , 1966), ha sido nombrado nuevo prior de los dominicos de la Provincia de Hispania, que comprende el territorio nacional y varios países de América del Sur. Carballo, profesor de Filosofía y Teología en la facultad de San Vicente Ferrer, en Valencia, sustituye en el cargo al también asturiano Jesús Díaz Sariego, nacido en Riosa, que fue prior desde la formación jurídica de la orden, en 2016. Suscríbete para seguir leyendo TEMAS Carballo España Díaz Jesús

title: El pintor ovetense que pone el foco sobre Gaza a través de su arte: aquí puedes ver su obra (hecha con intención)
creator: Covadonga del Couz
content: Las exposiciones suelen invitar a la contemplación respetuosa de las obras, pero la nueva propuesta artística de Toño Velasco rompe con esa lógica desde un primer momento. Para acceder a la muestra que se inaugura este jueves en su estudio de Los Pilares, los visitantes deberán caminar sobre un cuadro en el que aparecen retratados niños gazatíes en un paisaje devastado. El gesto, lejos de ser accidental, funciona como punto de partida de una reflexión sobre la manera en que la vida cotidiana de Occidente convive con la tragedia en Gaza. "La idea se me ocurre un día cualquiera, viendo los informativos y dándome cuenta de un gesto que hacemos la gran mayoría al ver desgracias humanas como las que actualmente acontecen en Gaza: cambiar de canal o incluso apagar el televisor", reconoce Toño Velasco. El artista ovetense, cansado de mirar hacia otro lado y de sentirse impotente ante la situación que asuela Palestina, comenzó a pintar un cuadro como forma de desahogo, sin imaginar que, poco después, se transformaría en un ejercicio de denuncia social. "Empecé pintando a una niña gazatí, inspirado por las imágenes que veía en los medios, y cuando me quise dar cuenta había creado un cuadro entero cubriendo un bombardeo", explica. Durante el periodo vacacional, Velasco aprovechó para observar la sociedad que le rodeaba y advirtió un fuerte paralelismo entre la vida cotidiana en Occidente y la dura realidad palestina. Fue entonces cuando se planteó unir ambas...

title: Lisardo Argüelles, la leyenda grupista de vitalidad envidiable que fue gran tirador olímpico
creator: Nico Martínez
content: La vida de Lisardo Argüelles Rodríguez-San Pedro va unida indisolublemente a la historia del Real Grupo de Cultura Covadonga. En la entidad gijonesa, lleva a cabo las labores de presidente de la Asociación de Veteranos y ahora acababa de ser reconocido como "Grupista ejemplar" por su extensa trayectoria. Extensa trayectoria que, a sus 94 años, sigue agrandando con una vitalidad envidiable. No hay, eso sí, galardón que pudiera igualar la ilusión que le genera a Argüelles esta distinción del Grupo, que considera su otra "gran familia". La recogerá el lunes 8 de septiembre. El Día de Asturias. Y día también, claro, del Grupo Covadonga. Todavía restaban siete años para la fundación del Grupo cuando nació Lisardo Argüelles Rodríguez-San Pedro. El 28 de mayo de 1931 se convirtió en el noveno hijo de la familia que formaron Manuel Argüelles y María Visitación Rodríguez-San Pedro, quienes vivían en pleno centro de la ciudad. Concretamente, su vivienda se encontraba en la zona del paseo de Begoña, en un bloque de viviendas en el que también residía Jesús Revuelta, una figura sin la que la historia del Grupo no se entendería como es hoy. De su infancia y adolescencia, Lisardo Argüelles guarda recuerdos imborrables. Entre ellos, aparecen aquellos veranos en Niza, donde contaban con una segunda vivienda que les permitía disfrutar de la Costa Azul en vacaciones. No obstante, gran parte de su rutina durante esos años transcurrió en el colegio de la...

title: 절대평가라로 우습게 봤는데...“대학 합격? 결국 수능 영어가 좌우한다” [입시 완전정복]
creator: 매일경제
content: 상대평가인 국어·수학·탐구영역과 달리 영어는 수능에서 절대평가 과목입니다. 등급으로만 표시돼 100점 만점에 90점 이상은 1등급, 80점 이상은 2등급인 식입니다. 절대평가인데도 ‘수능영어’가 대학 합격을 좌지우지하는 이유가 뭘까요. 학부모의 궁금증을 남윤곤 메가스터디교육 입시전략연구소장이 시원하게 답했습니다. 대부분의 학생들이 수능에서 영어를 2등급 이상 받을 것으로 기대합니다. 하지만 2025학년도 수능에서 1~2등급 비율은 22.57%에 그쳤습니다. 2024학년도엔 22.88%였습니다. 이는 수능에서 영어 점수가 79점 이하인 3등급 이하를 받는 학생이 약 75%에 달한다는 의미입니다. 결국, 절대평가임에도 영어 1~2등급을 만만하게 볼 수 없다는 겁니다. 수능최저학력 기준이 있는 전형이나 학과에서 영어영역 때문에 의외의 결과가 발생하는 것도 이 때문입니다. 사실상 수능최저학력 기준은 대학에서 해당 학과나 전형에 합격하려면 반드시 넘어야 하는 기준으로 이해해야 합니다. 여기서 수능영어의 중요성이 부각되는데요. 예를 들어 ‘국어·수학·영어·탐구영역 중 3개 영역의 합이 6등급 이상’이란 수능최저학력 기준이 있다고 가정해 보겠습니다. 수학에서 6등급을 받더라도 국어·영어·탐구영역에서 각 2등급을 받는다면 조건을 충족하게 됩니다. 게다가 절대평가인 영어에서 1등급을 받는다면 수능최저학력 기준을 넘는 것이 더 쉬워집니다. 영어영역의 힘이 대단한 겁니다. 전문가들은 영어영역의 1등급 적정...

title: Путин прибыл в Китай
creator: РИА Новости
content: ТЯНЬЦЗИНЬ (Китай), 31 авг - РИА Новости. Президент России Владимир Путин прибыл в Китай по приглашению лидера КНР Си Цзиньпина, первым городом посещения главы российского государства стал Тяньцзинь, где состоится саммит ШОС, передаёт корреспондент РИА Новости. Визит российского лидера продлится четыре дня - с 31 августа по 3 сентября. В рамках визита в КНР Путин примет участие в саммите ШОС и проведет двусторонние встречи с иностранными лидерами. В программе значится и посещение Пекина , где запланирована трехсторонняя встреча с лидерами Монголии и Китая, а также отдельные переговоры с Си Цзиньпином и главами других государств. Кроме этого, президент России будет присутствовать в качестве главного гостя на торжественных мероприятиях в Пекине, приуроченных к 80-й годовщине победы над милитаристской Японией и окончания Второй мировой войны.

title: Mariana Botas estalla contra Elaine Haro tras enterarse de que siempre quiso ser cuarto noche: “Alta traición”
creator: Jazmín González
content: La Casa de los Famosos México tomó un giro diferente cuando Elaine Haro consiguió la moneda del destino, y con ella, la oportunidad de hacer un intercambio de habitantes entre los cuartos. La más joven de la casa tomó la decisión de mudarse al cuarto noche en lugar de El ‘Guanna’, quien pasó a ser ‘Team Día’. Su decisión modificó por completo la dinámica de la casa y las estrategias. El comediante de Me Caigo de Risa rápidamente tomó la decisión de unirse a sus compañeros de habitación, mientras que Elaine se dio unos días para pensar y nominar de la manera que consideraba “justa” antes de ser completamente ‘Team Noche’. Mariana Botas asegura que Elaine Haro cometió “alta traición” Entre dimes y diretes sobre la decisión de la actriz y cantante, los días transcurrieron con normalidad hasta la fiesta temática del pasado viernes, cuando Haro comenzó a platicar con Aarón Mercury sobre los planes del ‘cuarto noche’. “Oye, pero ya no entiendo, ¿no que los de Noche no la íbamos a amanecer y no sé qué?“, cuestionó. El comentario rápidamente fue escuchado por Mariana Botas, quien le pidió que parara, pues sabía que desde antes quería ser ‘Team Noche’. “Les voy a decir que sí sentí feo, en la cena dijo Elaine: ‘ay, yo antes de entrar quise ser Noche pero pues me tocó Día, pero ahora estoy en Noche’“, reveló Botas. Elaine Haro se sorprendió al escuchar el comentario, pues no recordaba haber dicho eso, pero una vez más su compañera insistió....

title: Iga Swiatek sai de buraco, salva set points e passa às oitavas do US Open
creator: Alexandre Cossenza
content: A primeira aparição de Iga Swiatek em uma sessão noturna neste US Open não foi exatamente memorável. A polonesa, atual número 2 do mundo, cometeu 33 erros não forçados e teve seu saque quebrado quatro vezes, mas encontrou uma maneira de avançar às oitavas de final. Após estar perdendo o primeiro set por 5/1 e salvar quatro set points, Iga conseguiu uma bela virada e derrubou a russa Anna Kalinskaya (26 anos, #29 do mundo) por 7/6(2) e 6/4. O resultado mantém Iga com chances de sair de Nova York como número 1 do mundo. Para que isto aconteça, contudo, ela precisa conquistar o título e torcer para que Aryna Sabalenka, atual líder do ranking, não passe das oitavas. A próxima adversária de Swiatek no US Open será a também russa Ekaterina Alexandrova (#12), que avançou ao aplicar 6/0 e 6/1 em cima da alemã Laura Siegemund (#52). Como aconteceu O primeiro set foi cheio, erros não forçados (23 de Swiatek e 20 de Kalinskaya) duplas faltas (sete da russa, três da polonesa) e alternâncias. Iga começou falhando demais, o que permitiu a Kalinskaya abrir uma enorme vantagem de 5/1. A russa sacou duas vezes para fechar o set e teve quatro set points, mas Iga reagiu, devolvendo as duas quebras e igualando o placar em 5/5. Quando tudo apontava para uma virada da polonesa, ela cometeu três erros não forçados e perdeu seu serviço mais uma vez. Kalinskaya, contudo, voltou a falhar quando sacou para o set. Assim, após seis quebras de saque, o jogo foi decidido...

title: 옥천서 장인 흉기로 찌른 30대 구속..."잘 기억 안 나"
creator: 서주영 기자
content: [옥천=뉴시스] 서주영 기자 = 충북 옥천에서 장인에게 흉기를 휘두른 30대 남성이 경찰에 붙잡혔다. 옥천경찰서는 존속살인미수, 공무집행방해 혐의로 A(30대)씨를 구속했다고 31일 밝혔다. A씨는 지난 27일 오전 7시께 옥천군 청성면의 장인 B(60대)씨의 집에서 흉기로 B씨를 여러 차례 찌른 혐의를 받고 있다. B씨는 얼굴과 가슴 등을 크게 다쳐 병원에서 치료 중이다. 생명에는 지장이 없는 것으로 확인됐다. 정신질환이 있는 A씨는 B씨 앞에서 화를 내며 주먹으로 벽을 수차례 내려쳤고, B씨가 이를 말리자 주방에서 흉기를 가져와 범행한 것으로 조사됐다. B씨는 신고를 받고 출동한 경찰관에게도 주먹을 휘두르다가 현행범 체포됐다. A씨는 경찰에서 "잘 기억이 안 난다"는 등 진술을 거부하고 있는 것으로 알려졌다. B씨는 경찰에 A씨에 대한 처벌 불원 의사를 밝힌 것으로 전해졌다. 경찰은 피해자 조사를 끝내는 대로 사건을 검찰에 넘길 예정이다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: Nueve miembros de Cártel de Jalisco Nueva Generación son detenidos en distintos puntos de México
creator: Europa Press Internacional
content: MADRID 31 Ago. (EUROPA PRESS) - Las fuerzas federales de México han detenido a nueve integrantes de la célula M4, vinculada al Cártel de Jalisco Nueva Generación, a los que acusan de delitos como homicidio, secuestro y extorsión en varios municipios del país. Las operaciones han contado con la participación conjunta del Ejército, la Marina, la Secretaría de Seguridad y Protección Ciudadana (SSPC) y la Fiscalía General de la República (FGR). En el municipio de Nicolás Romero, próximo a la capital mexicana, han capturado a seis supuestos narcotraficantes que fueron sorprendidos encañonando con un arma a un trabajador de la empresa pública de transporte, según informa el diario 'El Universal'. Asimismo, gracias a la información recavada por las autoridades mexicanas han detenido a uno de los líderes de la célula, Erik N, a quien se le buscaba además por su participación en la extorsión al dueño de un negocio en la localidad mencionada. Por otro lado, otras dos detenciones relacionadas con este grupo han tenido lugar en distintos puntos del país latinoamericano, ambos involucrados en asaltos que habrían resultado en el fallecimiento de personas. Estas nuevas detenciones se producen en medio de la tensión generada entre Estados Unidos y México por la seguridad en territorio mexicano, que ha llevado a las autoridades estadounidenses a proponer el despliegue de sus tropas para atajar el problema de inseguridad, llegando a acusar al país vecino de no...

title: Pulso corporativo sostenible: camino sólido y competitivo para los reportes en México
creator: Dra. Joaquina Niembro, Universidad Panamericana
content: Un retrato de los ISos en MéxicoEl reporte Pulso Corporativo Sostenible 2025, es el resultado de un trabajo de investigación conjunto entre la consultora Roland Berger y la Universidad Panamericana.En Pulso, se mostró que las principales empresas mexicanas avanzan en la publicación de Informes de Sostenibilidad (ISos) y encontró como áreas de oportunidad el fortalecer la transparencia, profundidad y compromiso frente a estándares internacionales.Los ISos son plataformas de comunicación mediante las cuales las empresas comparten de manera estructurada sus avances, compromisos y retos en los temas ambientales, sociales y financieros. Muestran un autorretrato de cómo las compañías gestionan riesgos, generan valor y construyen confianza con sus stakeholders. Su importancia radica en que no solo muestran lo que una organización hace hoy, sino que también muestran el esbozo de la ruta hacia el futuro en términos de estrategia y competitividad.Avances importantes, pero con espacio para crecerPulso Corporativo Sostenible 2025 analizó los ISos de las 100 empresas con mayor volumen de ventas en México y reveló avances importantes. El 84% de ellas ya publica informes en esta materia, lo que representa el inicio de un camino sólido sobre el cual seguir construyendo prácticas más robustas en el país.Sin embargo, el alcance de la información aún tiene espacio para crecer: en promedio, los ISos cubren solo el 48% de los temas relevantes identificados en la...

title: 「朝の眼鏡の志尊淳のビジュにビビる」
creator: デイリースポーツ online
content: 日本テレビ「24時間テレビ48」が30日、スタート。31日早朝の映像にSNSが沸いている。 チャリティーパートナーの俳優・志尊淳(30)が早朝時間帯、黒いセルフレームのメガネをかけて出演。テンプルの部分もおしゃれなデザインで、ツヤツヤの透明美白肌は一夜明けても健在。ネット上では「朝のメガネの志尊淳のビジュが良すぎてビビりまくってました!」「起きたらワイプの志尊淳くんが眼鏡かけててばりかっこええ」「志尊淳のメガネ姿が尊い」「メガネの志尊淳しぬイケメンすぎだろ」「志尊淳に癒された朝」「テレビ久々見たけど志尊は女子アナより可愛い」「メガネ志尊だ」「イケメンって24時間ビジュイイんだすごい」「朝から 志尊淳の爽やかイケメン映って ため息でる(美しい」「志尊淳かっこよすぎてメロい」「スタイル良すぎ脚長すぎ顔国宝すぎ」など反響が続々。 その後、メガネを外しており、「メガネ外したんだね でも相変わらず美しいな」「メガネ外しちゃったかー」「コンタクトに切り替わってた」などと、メガネを外したことすら話題になっていた。

title: 埼玉県大野知事 治安悪化で警察署新設
creator: デイリースポーツ online
content: 埼玉県の大野元裕知事がフジテレビ系「日曜報道 THE PRIME」に出演し、外務省にトルコ国籍者への短期滞在者ビザ免除を一時停止してほしいと求めたことについて語った。 埼玉県は東京、大阪についで外国人が多く、川口市民の24年度の治安意識調査では49%が治安が悪いと感じていることを取り上げた。 大野氏は「令和5年を境に多くの県民から不安の声が寄せられています」とし、「治安の不安に対処するために警察に対して治安措置を強化するよう求めたり。22年ぶりに川口北警察署を新設する予算を組みました」と警察署を新設するほどであることを明かした。 大幅な警察官の人員拡充も求め、大野氏は「全体で476名の増員に対して埼玉県は175人。可能な限りやってきました」と語った。「わがまち防衛隊」という市民による自主的防犯活動も生まれたという。治安悪化の背景について大野氏は「蕨や戸田については難民申請を繰り返す外国人、特にトルコ人が多い。他の県で問題なくても埼玉で問題があるのはトルコ人全体の半分以上が特定活動というんですが、これは難民申請だけではないですがその方々が半分以上いる。ぜひ対処してほしい」と求めた。 大野氏はまた「入国のときにトルコ人はビザがいらない。これは国と国とでプラスだからやるという特別な措置です。これを他の国の国民と同じように査証をもらってください。査証経伺といって日本で一度判断する。スクリーニングをしないままずっと難民申請で入れますから。スクリーニングをやってください。トルコ人だけをターゲットにしているのではない。トルコ人が優遇されているので他の国民と同じようにしてほしいと、段階を踏んでやらせていただいている」と治安を回復したい意図を語った。

title: '최악 가뭄' 강릉 저수율 15% 무너졌다...계량기 75% 잠금
creator: newsservice@sbs.co.kr(SBS)
content: c SBS & SBS i / RSS 피드는 개인 리더 이용 목적으로 허용 되어 있습니다. 피드를 이용한 게시 등의 무단 복제는 금지 되어 있습니다.▶ SBS 뉴스 앱 다운로드▶ 뉴스에 지식을 담다 - 스브스프리미엄 앱 다운로드c SBS & SBS i : 무단복제 및 재배포 금지▲ 전례 없는 최악의 가뭄을 겪는 중인 강릉. 강원 강릉시가 전례 없는 최악 가뭄에 시달리는 가운데 생활용수의 87%를 공급하는 오봉저수지의 저수율이 물을 더 공급하기 어려울 정도로 떨어졌습니다. 한국농어촌공사 농촌용수종합정보시스템에 따르면 이날 오전 7시 40분께 오봉저수지 저수율은 14.9%로, 전날 15.3%에서 0.4% 포인트 떨어졌습니다. 식수 공급의 마지노선으로 여겨진 저수율 15% 선이 무너지면서 강릉시는 수도 계량기 75%를 잠그는 제한 급수를 본격적으로 시행합니다. 앞서 시는 저수율이 25% 이하로 떨어진 지난 20일부터 아파트를 비롯해 5만 3천48 5가구의 계량기 50%를 잠금 하는 제한 급수로 절수 조치를 시행해 왔습니다. 저수지가 점점 메말라감에 따라 시는 전날부터 오봉저수지의 농업용수 공급도 중단했습니다. 이전까지는 '3일 공급·7일 제한' 방식으로 농업용수를 공급, 원래대로라면 23∼29일 공급 제한 기간이 끝나고 30일부터 공급이 재개됐어야 하지만 저수율이 15% 가까이 떨어짐에 따라 농업용수를 공급하지 않기로 했습니다. 다만 오봉저수지 외에도 농업용수를 공급하는 저수지가 10곳이 있습니다. 정부는 전날 강릉에 재난 사태를 선포했습니다. 자연 재난으로는...

title: Təhlükəli xərçəng növünün inkişafını belə dayandırmaq olar
India to become third largest economy soon, says RBI Guv; hails Jan Dhan Yojana
creator: Press Trust Of India
content: Indore: Reserve Bank of India (RBI) Governor Sanjay Malhotra on Saturday said India will become the world’s third largest economy soon, and credited the Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana for boosting the country’s growth. His remark came at a time when India’s GDP grew 7.8 per cent in the April-June quarter of the current fiscal, the highest in five quarters before the imposition of heavy tariff on the country by the United States.Addressing ‘Santripti Shivir’, a financial inclusion campaign by government banks, at Rangwasa village here, Malhotra said the Union government and the RBI had launched the Jan Dhan Yojana in collaboration with banks 11 years ago, leading to development across the nation. “Today, India is counted among the five most developed countries in the world and very soon the country will become the third largest economy,” he said.The RBI governor said 55 crore accounts have been opened under the scheme to ensure participation of people from all sections in the country’s growth journey, providing them with savings, pension, insurance, credit and other services. He underlined the need for Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana account holders to update their details under the ‘Know Your Customer (KYC)’ process within the stipulated time to prevent possible misuse of accounts and to ascertain whether they have turned into ‘mule accounts’.A ‘mule account’ is a bank account that criminals use, sometimes without the knowledge of the account holder or occasionally with their...

title: Do not take independence, unity for granted, says PM
creator: qirana nabilla mohd rashidi
content: SERDANG: Prime Minister Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim has reminded Malaysians not to take independence for granted, stressing that the nation’s strength lies in unity and the shared sacrifices of its people. Speaking at the Amanat Perdana Hari Kebangsaan 2025 ceremony yesterday, he said while independence came at a high price, with lives and property lost, it was achieved through the collective contributions of all communities. “History shows that no nation can achieve independence without the spirit of cooperation and renewal. “The contributions of all communities cannot be denied. It is true that the Malays and the Bumiputera were the backbone of this strength but independence was made possible with the support and participation of other communities too, including the Indians, Chinese and others.” Anwar cautioned against divisive rhetoric that pits races, tribes or states against one another, describing it as a betrayal of Malaysia’s founding spirit. “No country can survive if it gives in to incitement and hatred. Our strength today, as in the past, lies in consensus.” Anwar acknowledged his pride in the Malay language and culture but stressed that national unity requires respecting and safeguarding the heritage of all communities. He said many nations had collapsed due to racial, linguistic or religious divisions. “Defend the Malay language but never use it as a weapon to sideline others. Islam must be lived deeply but not at the expense of other religions. He said Malaysia’s...

title: Top Headlines Today ട്രംപ് ഉറ്റുനോക്കുന്നു, സുപ്രധാനമായ മോദി - ഷീ ചർച്ച ഇന്ന്; തുരങ്ക പാത നിർമാണത്തിന് ഇന്ന് തുടക്കം, പ്രധാന വാർത്തകൾ
creator: Bibin Babu
content: യുഎസ് ഉയര്‍ത്തുന്ന താരിഫ് വെല്ലുവിളികൾക്കിടയിൽ പ്രധാനമന്ത്രി നരേന്ദ്ര മോദിയും ചൈനീസ് പ്രസിഡൻറ് ഷി ജിൻപിങും തമ്മില്‍ നടക്കുന്ന ചര്‍ച്ചയാണ് ഇന്നത്തെ പ്രധാന സംഭവം. ഒപ്പം നരേന്ദ്ര മോദിയുടെ മൻ കി ബാത്തും ഇന്നാണ്. കൂടാതെ വയനാടിന്‍റെ യാത്രാദുരിതം പരിഹരിക്കാനുള്ള തുരങ്ക പാത നിർമാണത്തിന് ഇന്ന് മുഖ്യമന്ത്രി തുടക്കമിടുന്നുണ്ട്. ട്രംപിനെ വീർപ്പുമുട്ടിക്കുന്ന 45 മിനിറ്റ്! പ്രധാനമന്ത്രി നരേന്ദ്ര മോദിയും ചൈനീസ് പ്രസിഡന്‍റ് ഷി ജിൻപിങും തമ്മിലുള്ള ചർച്ച ഇന്ന്. ഇന്ത്യൻ സമയം രാവിലെ ഒമ്പതരയ്ക്കാണ് ഇരു നേതാക്കളും തമ്മിലുള്ള ചർച്ച നിശ്ചയിച്ചിരിക്കുന്നത്. കഴിഞ്ഞ വർഷം റഷ്യയിലെ കസാനിൽ പരസ്പര ബന്ധം മെച്ചപ്പെടുത്താൻ കൈക്കൊണ്ട തീരുമാനങ്ങളുടെ പുരോഗതി മോദിയും ഷീയും വിലയിരുത്തും മൻ കി ബാത്ത് ഇന്ന് പ്രധാനമന്ത്രി നരേന്ദ്രമോദിയുടെ മൻ കി ബാത്ത് ഇന്ന്. യുഎസ് തീരുവ പ്രാബല്യത്തിൽ വന്ന ശേഷമുള്ള ആദ്യ മൻ കി ബാത്തിൽ അതിനെ കുറിച്ചുള്ള പരാമർശങ്ങൾ ഉണ്ടായേക്കും. തുരങ്കപാത വരുന്നു വയനാടിന്‍റെ യാത്രാദുരിതം പരിഹരിക്കാനുള്ള തുരങ്ക പാത നിർമാണത്തിന് ഇന്ന് തുടക്കം. കോഴിക്കോട് വയനാട് ജില്ലകളെ ബന്ധിപ്പിച്ച് നിര്‍മിക്കുന്ന ആനക്കാംപൊയില്‍ - കളളാടി തുരങ്കപ്പാതയുടെ നിർമാണ ഉദ്ഘാടനം ഇന്ന് മുഖ്യമന്ത്രി പിണറായി വിജയൻ നിര്‍വഹിക്കും വോട്ട് അധികാർ യാത്ര നാളെ അവസാനിക്കും ബിഹാറിൽ രാഹുൽ ഗാന്ധിയുടെ വോട്ട് അധികാർ യാത്ര നാളെ അവസാനിക്കും. നാളെ ഗാന്ധി മൈതാനത്ത് നിന്നുംഅംബേദ്കർ പ്രതിമ വരെയാണ് പദയാത്ര. പരമാവധി ഇന്ത്യ സഖ്യ നേതാക്കളെ ചടങ്ങിൽ പങ്കെടുപ്പിക്കാൻ ആണ് കോൺഗ്രസ് ശ്രമം അനു മാലിക്കിനെ ഇന്ന് കോടതിയിൽ ഹാജരാക്കും കണ്ണൂർ കണ്ണപുരം സ്ഫോടന കേസ് പ്രതി അനു മാലിക്കിനെ ഇന്ന് കോടതിയിൽ ഹാജരാക്കും. സ്ഫോടനം നടന്ന വീട്ടിൽ തെളിവെടുപ്പിന്...

title: Cap on bank deposit guarantee to be hiked to W100m this week
creator: The Korea Herald
content: The maximum amount of bank deposits protected by the state will be doubled to 100 million won ($71,919) starting this week, as the financial sector braces for a possible overheating of competition to attract more deposits, industry sources said Sunday. The increase in the ceiling from the current 50 million won to 100 million won is set to take effect Monday, marking the first hike since 2001. Under the revised regulation, passed by the National Assembly late last year, deposits of up to 100 million won will be protected in the event of contingencies, including the bank itself going bankrupt. Separately, it will also cover up to 100 million won in retirement pensions, pension savings and insurance payouts. The hike is expected to help ensure the safety of deposits, and also boost convenience for those who previously deposited their savings in separate accounts for protection. However, the increase has also raised concerns over the possible mass transfer of deposits to the secondary financial sector, such as savings banks and insurance firms that generally offer a higher interest rate than commercial banks, though no such indications have been monitored yet, according to officials. (Yonhap)

title: AP News Summary at 9:30 p.m. EDT
creator: AP
content: Court finds Trump's tariffs an illegal use of emergency power, but leaves them in place for now WASHINGTON (AP) — A federal appeals court has ruled President Donald Trump illegally used emergency powers to impose sweeping tariffs but left them in place for now. The U.S. Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit ruled Friday that Trump wasn’t legally allowed to declare national emergencies and impose import taxes on almost every country on earth, largely upholding a May decision by a specialized federal trade court in New York. But the court tossed out a part of that ruling, striking down the tariffs immediately and allowed his administration time to appeal to the Supreme Court.

title: 曼聯│加拿祖終離隊加盟車路士 轉會費4000萬鎊 「急不及待展開新生活!」
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 曼聯在周六雙喜臨門,除了收錄新球季首勝外,已徹底被棄用的鋒將阿歷真度加拿祖終於離隊加盟車路士,據報轉會費為4000萬鎊,還有10%下次轉會分成。這名阿根廷翼鋒上「車」後立即矢言,自己身處在世界上最好的球隊,並急不及待想展開新生活。 車路士周六宣布從曼聯簽入加拿祖,雙方簽約7年,據報此子的轉會費為4000萬鎊,還有10%的下次轉會分成。這名21歲阿根廷翼鋒去季尾與曼聯領隊魯賓艾摩廉鬧翻後,已不在後者今季的計劃內,期間有多支國外球隊希望簽入他,但此子堅持非車路士不去,一度陷入膠著,直到周六交易終於落實,而4000萬鎊的轉會費亦比傳聞高。 加拿祖周六已急不及待到車路士主場觀看新東家的比賽,並見證球隊2:0擊敗富咸,英超收錄2連勝。他加盟後立即賣口乖直言車路士是世界上最好的球隊:「對於我和家人來說,能夠加入這家偉大的球會,是不可思議的時刻。我急不及待想要開始新生活,我觀看了世冠盃,能夠加入這支世界冠軍球隊,感覺很特別。這是世界上最好的球隊,能夠來到這裡,真的非常高興。」

title: ರಾಜಕಾರಣಿಗಳು ಏನು ಬೇಕಾದರೂ ಹೇಳಲಿ, ಚಾಮುಂಡಿ ಬೆಟ್ಟ ಹಿಂದೂಗಳಿಗೆ ಸೇರಿದ್ದು: ಪ್ರಮೋದಾದೇವಿ
creator: Kannadaprabha News
content: ಮೈಸೂರು (ಆ.31): ಚಾಮುಂಡಿಬೆಟ್ಟ ಹಿಂದೂಗಳಿಗೆ ಸೇರಿದ್ದು, ಅಲ್ಲಿರುವುದು ಹಿಂದೂ ದೇವರು. ರಾಜಕಾರಣಿಗಳು ಏನೂ ಬೇಕಾದರು ಹೇಳಲಿ, ಕರೆಯುವವರು ಏನಾದರೂ ಕರೆಯಲಿ. ಅವರು ಹೇಳಿದಂತೆ ಆಗುವುದಿಲ್ಲ ಎಂದು ರಾಜವಂಶಸ್ಥೆ ಪ್ರಮೋದಾದೇವಿ ಒಡೆಯರ್ ಹೇಳಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ನಗರದಲ್ಲಿ ಶನಿವಾರ ಸುದ್ದಿಗಾರರೊಂದಿಗೆ ಮಾತನಾಡಿ, ಚಾಮುಂಡೇಶ್ವರಿ ದೇವಿ ಯದುವಂಶದ ಮನೆ ದೇವರು, ಕುಲದೇವಿ. ಯದುವಂಶಕ್ಕೆ ಚಾಮುಂಡಿ ದೇವಿ ಧಾರ್ಮಿಕ ತಾಯಿ ಇದ್ದಂತೆ. ಆ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನದಲ್ಲಿ ಹಿಂದೂ ಧಾರ್ಮಿಕ ವಿಧಿ ವಿಧಾನದಿಂದ ಪೂಜೆ ನಡೆಯುತ್ತದೆ. ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನ ವಿಚಾರದಲ್ಲಿ ನಮ್ಮ ಮನೆತನ 70 ವರ್ಷಗಳಿಂದ ನ್ಯಾಯಾಲಯದಲ್ಲಿ ಹೋರಾಟ ಮಾಡುತ್ತಿದೆ. ಚಾಮುಂಡೇಶ್ವರಿ ಪ್ರಾಧಿಕಾರ ರಚನೆ ಆದರೂ ಅದು ಅಧಿಕೃತ ಅಲ್ಲ. ನ್ಯಾಯಾಲಯದ ಆದೇಶ ಬಂದ ಮೇಲೆ ಎಲ್ಲವೂ ಸ್ಪಷ್ಟ ಆಗುತ್ತದೆ ಎಂದರು. ಇದನ್ನೂ ಓದಿ: ಧರ್ಮಸ್ಥಳ ಪ್ರಕರಣದಲ್ಲಿ ಮೌನಮುರಿದ ಪಂಚಪೀಠ ಶ್ರೀಗಳು, ಕಾಣದ 'ಕೈ'ಗಳ ಪಿತೂರಿ, ತಪ್ಪಿತಸ್ಥರಿಗೆ ಕಠಿಣ ಶಿಕ್ಷೆಗೆ ಆಗ್ರಹ ಸರ್ಕಾರದ ದಸರಾ ನಮ್ಮ ಪರಂಪರೆ ಭಾಗವಲ್ಲ ಚಾಮುಂಡೇಶ್ವರಿ ದೇವಸ್ಥಾನವನ್ನು ರಾಜಕೀಯಕ್ಕೆ ಬಳಸಿಕೊಂಡಿದ್ದಕ್ಕೆ ನನಗೆ ಬೇಸರವಿದೆ. ದಸರಾ ಉದ್ಘಾಟಕರ ವಿಚಾರದಲ್ಲಿ ನನ್ನ ಅಭಿಪ್ರಾಯ ಇಲ್ಲ. ಕರೆದವರು, ಕರೆಸಿಕೊಂಡವರಿಗಷ್ಟೆ ಅದು ಗೊತ್ತು. ಸರ್ಕಾರದ ದಸರಾ ನಮ್ಮ ಪರಂಪರೆಯ ಭಾಗವಲ್ಲ. ನಮ್ಮ ದಸರಾ ಖಾಸಗಿಯಾಗಿಯೇ ನಡೆಯುತ್ತದೆ. ಸರ್ಕಾರ ಅವರಿಗೆ ಬೇಕಾದ ರೀತಿ ದಸರಾ ಮಾಡುತ್ತಾರೆ. ಅದಕ್ಕೂ ನಮಗೂ ಸಂಬಂಧ ಇಲ್ಲ ಎಂದು ಪ್ರಮೋದಾದೇವಿ ಒಡೆಯರ್ ಸ್ಪಷ್ಟಪಡಿಸಿದರು. ಇದನ್ನೂ ಓದಿ: ಬಾನು ಮುಷ್ತಾಕ್ ಹಣೆಗೆ ಅರಿಶಿಣ, ಕುಂಕುಮ ಹಚ್ಚಿ ದಸರಾ ಉದ್ಘಾಟಿಸಿದರೆ ನಮಗೆ ಅಭ್ಯಂತರವಿಲ್ಲ: ಪ್ರತಾಪ್ ಸಿಂಹ ಜಂಬೂಸವಾರಿ ದಿನ‌ ನಾನು ಅಲ್ಲಿಗೆ ಹೋಗಲ್ಲ. ನಮ್ಮ ಮನೆಯವರು ಒಬ್ಬರು ಹೋಗುತ್ತಾರೆ ಅಷ್ಟೆ. ದಸರಾ ವಿಚಾರದಲ್ಲಿ ಇಲ್ಲಿಯವರೆಗೆ ಆಗಿರುವ ರಾಜಕೀಯವೇ ಸಾಕು. ಆ ವಿಚಾರ ಇನ್ನೂ ಮುಂದುವರಿಸುವುದು ಬೇಡ ಎಂದರು.

title: Ohne Nebel und Hollerbach: Mainz zu Gast in Wolfsburg
Fußball-Bundesliga: Ohne Nebel und Hollerbach: Mainz zu Gast in Wolfsburg
content: Nach dem Jubelrausch in der Conference League geht es für den FSV Mainz 05 mit dem Bundesliga-Alltag weiter. Beim VfL Wolfsburg muss Trainer Bo Henriksen auf zwei wichtige Spieler verzichten.Der FSV Mainz 05 will den Schwung aus dem Einzug in die Ligaphase der Conference League in die Fußball-Bundesliga mitnehmen. Die Rheinhessen sind heute (15.30 Uhr/DAZN) zu Gast beim VfL Wolfsburg. Während der VfL mit einem Auswärtssieg beim 1. FC Heidenheim erfolgreich in die Spielzeit gestartet war, verloren die Mainzer beim 1. FC Köln 0:1.In Wolfsburg muss Coach Bo Henriksen auf Neu-Nationalspieler Paul Nebel wegen einer Rotsperre sowie auf Stürmer Benedict Hollerbach wegen einer Oberschenkelverletzung verzichten. Für Hollerbach dürfte wie schon beim 4:1 im Playoff-Rückspiel der Conference League gegen Rosenborg Trondheim am Donnerstag Nelson Weiper in der Startelf stehen.
