title: CON 1 MILLÓN DE PLANTAS, ESTADO REFORESTARÁ SIERRA DE SAN MIGUELITO
creator: Redacción
content: • Supervisa Segam, dependencias estatales y federales el plan de introducción de un millón de especies en la Sierra de San Miguelito. La Secretaría de Ecología y Gestión Ambiental (Segam), realizó una reunión de trabajo para la estrategia de reforestación con variedades nativas, donde se presentó el plan de introducción de un millón de especies en la Sierra de San a Miguelito, con el fin de fortalecer la cobertura vegetal y preservar la biodiversidad de este ecosistema. En cumplimiento al compromiso del Gobernador del Estado Ricardo Gallardo Cardona, la titular de Segam, Sonia Mendoza Díaz dio a conocer que acordaron trabajar de manera conjunta para asegurar que las especies a introducir sean propias de la Sierra, con características de bajo requerimiento hídrico, así como llevar un seguimiento del proceso para consolidar resultados. En el encuentro se subrayó la necesidad de impulsar la restauración de suelos como parte integral del proyecto de reforestación, diversificando las especies a sembrar y generando mejores condiciones ambientales. En el encuentro participaron la Secretaría de Desarrollo Agropecuario y Recursos Hidráulicos (Sedarh), así como representantes de la Comisión Nacional Forestal (Conafor), la Comisión Nacional de Áreas Naturales Protegidas (Conanp) y la Secretaría de Medio Ambiente y Recursos Naturales (Semarnat).

title: सीवर टैंक बना कालकूप: बचाव में भी जंग...संकरे रास्ते से निकाले मजदूर, मां बोली- छोटे-छोटे बच्चे...इनका क्या होगा
content: कानपुर देहात में निर्माणाधीन मकान में करीब दस फीट गहरे भूमिगत टैंक में रेस्क्यू के लिए संकरा खुला हिस्सा अड़चन बना। सीसी (कंक्रीट) पटान तोड़ने का प्रयास सफल नहीं हुआ तो संकरे रास्ते से ही टैंक के अंदर जाकर बचावकर्मी ने रेस्क्यू शुरू किया। घटना की जानकारी मिलते की अबकरपुर थाना प्रभारी सतीश सिंह व उनके साथ ही फायर ब्रिगेड की टीम पहुंच गई। लीडिंग फायरमैन अंजनी कुमार ब्रीदिंग ऑपरेटस पहनकर टैंक में उतरे। एक-एक कर उन्होंने बेहोश युवकों के रस्सी बांधी। ऊपर मौजूद दमकल की रेस्क्यू टीम ने युवकों को टैंक से बाहर खींचा। मुख्य अग्निशमन अधिकारी प्रतीक श्रीवास्तव ने बताया कि दस फीट गहरे भूमिगत टैंक में करीब ढाई फीट पानी भरा है। एक-एक कर युवक टैंक में उतरे। एंबुलेंस से मेडिकल कॉलेज भेजा अंदर ऑक्सीजन न होने की वजह से युवक बेहोश होते गए। दोपहर करीब 2:55 बजे माती फायर स्टेशन पर सूचना मिली। अग्निमशन अधिकारी कपिल फायर कर्मियों के साथ करीब 3:05 बजे मौके पर पहुंच गए। तत्काल फायर रेस्क्यू टीम ने बचाव कार्य शुरू कर दिया। टैंक से तीन युवक बेहोशी की हालत में बाहर निकाले गए जबकि एक युवक होश में था। सभी को एंबुलेंस से मेडिकल कॉलेज भेजा गया। बदहवाश परिजन शव से लिपट बिलखते रहे, अफसरों ने बंधाया ढांढस शटरिंग खोलने के दौरान हुए हादसे में तीन युवकों की मौत की जानकारी पर अस्पताल पहुंचे परिजन का हाल बेहाल रहा। परिजन एक दूसरे के शवों से लिपट कर बिलखते रहे। वहीं, मौजूद अधिकारी पीड़ित परिवारों को ढांढस बंधाते रहे। कन्हैयानगर में हुए हादसे में अमन, सर्वेश, मुबीन की मौत की जानकारी मिलते ही एसपी अरविंद मिश्रा, सीएमओ डॉ. एके सिंह व अन्य अधिकारी पहुंच गए। शवों का पोस्टमार्टम कराया गया इधर एक-एक कर मृतकों के परिजन भी...

title: Pobladores bloquean la autopista México-Puebla por detenciones en Texmelucan
creator: Milenio
content: San Martín Texmelucan, Puebla.– Habitantes de Santa Catarina Hueyatzacoalco, en el municipio de San Martín Texmelucan, bloquearon por completo la autopista México-Puebla para exigir la liberación de cuatro personas, que según ellos, fueron detenidas de manera injusta durante un cateo de la Fiscalía General del Estado (FGE) de Puebla.El cierre de la vía comenzó alrededor de las 17:00 horas del sábado, a la altura del kilómetro 89. Los manifestantes, que sumaban al menos 30 personas, colocaron llantas y se instalaron en la carretera, impidiendo el paso de vehículos en ambos sentidos.El grupo alega que la FGE busca trasladar a los detenidos a la ciudad de Puebla, en lugar de presentarlos en la sede de San Martín Texmelucan. Los manifestantes aseguran que las cuatro personas son inocentes y no están vinculadas a las actividades delictivas que se les imputan.Autoridades dialogan; Capufe pide tomar vías alternasCaminos y Puentes Federales (Capufe) confirmó el cierre de la autopista y recomendó a los conductores tomar rutas alternas. Personal de la Guardia Nacional y de la Secretaría de Gobernación de Puebla acudieron al lugar para iniciar un diálogo con los inconformes y lograr la liberación de la vialidad.Capufe sugirió a los viajeros que se dirigen a Puebla desviarse a la altura del kilómetro 83, en Río Frío, Estado de México, mientras que quienes se dirigen a la Ciudad de México o a Veracruz tomen la salida hacia el Arco Norte, en el kilómetro 93.La...

title: 普京率團抵達天津 出席上合峰會
creator: 香港01
content: 2025年上合組織峰會8月31日揭幕,俄羅斯總統普京(Vladimir Putin,又譯普丁或蒲亭)當日早上乘坐專機抵達天津,準備出席峰會。 央視報道,今次是普京自去年5月國事訪問中國後,再一次訪華。他除了在天津出席上合峰會,之後會轉到北京,出席中國人民抗日戰爭暨世界反法西斯戰爭勝利80周年紀念活動。 莫斯科方面,普京率領一個由三位副總理、十多位部長以及各大企業代表組成的「規模龐大、意義重大」的代表團來華。

title: Activan despliegue de Protección Civil ante lluvias en Nueva Esparta
creator: Betania Boadas
content: Tras las fuertes lluvias registradas este viernes 29 de agosto en la zona noroeste de Nueva Esparta, Protección Civil activó un despliegue de monitoreo en municipios vulnerables para prevenir riesgos.Activan despliegue de Protección Civil ante lluvias en Nueva EspartaLa gobernadora Marisel Velásquez instruyó el despliegue de supervisión y monitoreo a cargo de la Dirección de Protección Civil del estado Nueva Esparta, tras las precipitaciones que generaron preocupación en horas de la mañana.El comandante Kowalsky Vásquez, director estadal de Protección Civil y responsable de la Región Estratégica Marítima Insular, informó que según reportes del Inameh, la nubosidad y lluvias persistirán hasta el mediodía de este viernes.Municipios bajo observaciónEl monitoreo se concentró en los municipios Gómez, Antolín del Campo, Marcano y Arismendi, donde hasta el momento no se han registrado afectaciones ni daños.Vásquez destacó que el despliegue se mantiene en las zonas vulnerables, con base en los mapas de riesgo y sitios susceptibles a inundaciones por acumulación de agua de lluvia.Llamado a la calma y canales de atenciónEl funcionario pidió calma a la población e instó a utilizar el servicio de emergencias VEN 911, disponible las 24 horas del día, los 365 días del año, para reportar cualquier eventualidad.Asimismo, subrayó que los trabajos de mantenimiento y limpieza de ríos y cauces adelantados por la gobernación han permitido la correcta fluidez...

title: 【台風情報】熱帯低気圧=台風のたまごが発生見込み...本州南岸を東へ進み、東日本〜⻄日本へ影響か【雨と風の最新シミュレーション】(あいテレビ)
Julia Roberts says we’re losing the art of conversation
creator: NEWS WIRE
content: LOS ANGELES - US actress Julia Roberts has said “we’re losing the art of conversation in humanity”, as she premiered a new film about assault which is likely to divide audiences. After The Hunt, which has just launched at the Venice Film Festival, follows a student at Yale University who accuses a college professor for abuse. Neither the student’s nor teacher’s version of events is presented as entirely credible, and the film casts doubt on both sides. Roberts acknowledged the movie would provoke debate, commenting: “We are challenging people to have conversation and to be excited by that or to be infuriated by that, it’s up to you.” She added: “There’s a lot of old arguments that get rejuvenated in this movie in a way that does create conversation.” Roberts plays college professor Alma, who is caught between a star pupil named Maggie (Ayo Edebiri), and one of her fellow teachers and friends, Hank (Andrew Garfield). When told that several female journalists came out of the press screening questioning the morals of the film, Roberts replied: “That’s how we wanted it to feel. “Everyone comes out with these different feelings, emotions and points of view. And you realise what you believe in strongly and what your convictions are, because we stir it all up for you.” After The Hunt is likely to prompt similar discourse when it is released by Amazon later this year, and it could be seen as controversial for the ambiguity surrounding the student’s testimony. The film does not take...

title: मोदी-जिनपिंग की मुलाकात पर टिकी दुनिया की नजरें, 7 साल बाद चीन दौरे पर पीएम मोदी, आज से शुरू होगा SCO सम्मेलन
creator: Swati Kumari
content: PM Modi China Visit 2025: प्रधानमंत्री नरेंद्र मोदी शनिवार को चीन पहुंचे हैं। वे शंचीन के तियानजिन में आज से दो दिवसीय SCO सम्मेलन शुरू हो रहा है। इस मंच पर पीएम मोदी, चीनी राष्ट्रपति शी चिनफिंग और रूस के राष्ट्रपति पुतिन एक साथ नजर आएंगे। Modi Xi Jinping Meeting: प्रधानमंत्री नरेंद्र मोदी शनिवार को सात साल बाद चीन पहुंचे हैं। यह यात्रा कूटनीतिक लिहाज से काफी अहम मानी जा रही है। हाल के दिनों में भारत-अमेरिका के बीच व्यापार को लेकर तनाव बढ़ा है, ऐसे में चीन का यह दौरा और भी खास हो गया है। प्रधानमंत्री मोदी चीन के तियानजिन शहर पहुंचे हैं, जहां वे SCO के वार्षिक सम्मेलन में हिस्सा लेंगे। रविवार को प्रधानमंत्री मोदी और चीन के राष्ट्रपति शी जिनपिंग की अहम मुलाकात होगी। इस बैठक पर भारत और चीन के साथ-साथ पूरी दुनिया की निगाहें टिकी हुई हैं।यह सम्मेलन 31 अगस्त और 1 सितंबर को आयोजित होगा। प्रधानमंत्री मोदी आखिरी बार जून 2018 में चीन के दौरे पर गए थे। ऐसे में सात साल बाद होने वाली यह मुलाकात भारत-चीन रिश्तों की नई दिशा तय करने वाली साबित हो सकती है। आज से शुरू होगा दो दिवसीय एससीओ सम्मेलन बता दें कि 2020 में पूर्वी लद्दाख के गलवान घाटी में भारत और चीन के सैनिकों के बीच झड़प हुई थी जिससे दोनों देशों के रिश्तों में तनाव पैदा हो गया था। अब दोनों देश उस तनाव को कम करने की कोशिश कर रहे हैं। इस बैठक में सीमा पर शांति बनाए रखने, व्यापार बढ़ाने और भारत-चीन के बीच सीधी उड़ानों को फिर से शुरू करने जैसे अहम मुद्दों पर बात हो सकती है। चीनी राष्ट्रपति शी जिनपिंग अक्टूबर 2019 में भारत आ चुके हैं, लेकिन जून 2020 की गलवान झड़प के बाद दोनों देशों के संबंधों में खटास आ गई थी। इसे सुधारने के लिए हाल ही...

title: Sujetos armados ingresan a hospitales de Culiacán y asesinan a dos pacientes: van 5 muertos y 3 heridos en ataques
creator: Ale Huitron
content: En menos de 24 horas se han registrado tres ataques armados en distintos hospitales ubicados en Culiacán, Sinaloa, que han dejado como saldo cinco personas muertas y tres lesionadas. Los hechos comenzaron la noche de este viernes en el Hospital Civil de la capital sinaloense , donde sujetos armados arribaron a las instalaciones y abrieron fuego contra las personas que se encontraban fuera del área de urgencias. Los hechos se registraron alrededor de las 19:30 horas y dejó como saldo tres personas muertas y tres heridas . De acuerdo con el medio Noroeste , las víctimas fueron identificadas como Rubén de 61 años de edad; Jorge Armando de 32 y José Ramón de 38, en tanto, los lesionados fueron Víctor Antonio de 47 años; Brianna Amairany de 13 y Heldia Milena de 47. *Información en desarrollo...

title: Florida WR early leader for college football's catch of the year
creator: Joe Cox
content: Great catches are always welcome, and Florida 's Vernell Brown III chose his spot late in the first half of Florida's opener against Long Island to deliver one to remember. Of course, it's also Brown's first college football game, and a start like this boggles the mind as to the future possibilities. The Catch On 2nd and 6 from the Long Island 49 yard line just before halftime, Brown went deep down the right sideline. Florida QB DJ Lagway scrambled around the pocket and saw Brown outflank his coverage near the sideline. Still on the run, Lagway threw deep just as Brown turned around, potentially ready to alter his route by returning on a path toward the QB. This left Brown in an awkward position, stuck running away from Lagway while still facing him. No matter. Brown stretched vertically around the 12 yard line. Lagway's pass seemed too tall, but Brown reached up with a large right paw and snagged the ball. The exertion of the reach caused his momentum to send his body sprawling to the ground. Again, no problem. Falling to the ground, Brown pulled in the one-handed snag on his backside, facing back toward Lagway. ESPN analyst Rocky Boiman made the immediate NFL connection, noting, "That is Odell Beckham Jr.-like." The player As noted, Brown is in his first collegiate game. He showed the form of the five-star recruit that he was in the 2025 class for UF per both On3 and Rivals. Rivals placed Brown as the No. 3 wide receiver recruit in the nation and the No. 24 overall player...

title: Woman Arrested on Suspicion of DUI After Picking Up Children from School in Hesperia
creator: Victor Valley News Group
content: HESPERIA, Calif. (VVNG.com) — A woman was arrested on suspicion of driving under the influence after allegedly picking up her children from school while intoxicated. The incident occurred on August 26, 2025, when Deputy J. Deberg was contacted by school police who reported that a mother appeared to be under the influence during routine student pickup. According to a written statement from the Hesperia Police Station, Deputy Deberg located the woman in her vehicle. Authorities said she failed to yield when first contacted and continued driving approximately 1,700 feet to her residence with her 10- and 8-year-old children inside the vehicle. Following contact at the residence, Deputy Deberg impounded the vehicle, contacted Child Protective Services, and arrested the suspect on suspicion of DUI. The woman’s identity has not been released. No injuries were reported. This incident remains under investigation by the Hesperia Police Department.

title: Chưa hết 2025, Rosé (BLACKPINK) đã kiếm hơn 200 tỷ từ YouTube
creator: Gia Linh
content: Mới đây, trang Forbes Korea đã gây chú ý khi hé lộ bảng xếp hạng "Những Youtuber hàng đầu Hàn Quốc năm 2025". Trong đó, Rosé - thành viên nhóm nhạc nữ đình đám BLACKPINK đã chiếm ngôi đầu bảng với mức doanh thu đáng kinh ngạc, hơn 11,2 tỷ won (209 tỷ đồng). Được biết, trang cá nhân của "nữ hoàng Youtube" có 18,1 triệu người đăng ký và đã thu được con số cực khủng 3,6 tỷ lượt xem trên tổng số 86 video. Để đạt được thành tích cực khủng này, không thể không thể tới ca khúc Apartment (viết tắt là APT. ) do Rosé và Bruno Mars hợp tác sản xuất đã làm mưa làm gió trên toàn cầu năm ngoái. Đây là ca khúc Kpop đạt mốc 100 triệu lượt xem nhanh nhất trong năm 2024 và mang về kỷ lục Perfect All-Kill tại Hàn, cho thấy con đường solo thành công rực rỡ của cô gái nhà BLACKPINK. Hiện APT. đã đạt tới hơn 1,9 tỉ lượt xem trên YouTube trong thời gian thần tốc chỉ sau những siêu hit toàn cầu như Despacito (Luis Fonsi), Shape of You (Ed Sheeran) và Girls Like You (Maroon 5 ft. Cardi B). Đây cũng là 1 kỷ lục vô tiền khoáng hậu cho ngôi sao solo Kpop. Không chỉ vậy, tại Mỹ, APT. đã lọt vào vị trí thứ 3 trên bảng xếp hạng Billboard HOT 100 và duy trì thứ hạng này suốt 41 tuần liên tiếp. Có thể nói Rosé đã phá vỡ mọi giới hạn, trở thành nữ nghệ...

title: ¡En video! Con líneas de expresión y canas: Daniela Alvarado se muestra al natural
content: La actriz venezolana Daniela Alvarado se dejó ver al natural, con canas y líneas de expresión, en sus redes sociales.A través de su cuenta en TikTok, Alvarado difundió un video en el que se muestra totalmente sin maquillaje ni retoques.Daniela Alvarado al naturalLa reconocida actriz difundió un video que hizo mientras se preparaba para interpretar el personaje de Rosita, en su obra teatral 'Doña Rosita, la soltera'.Durante el video, Alvarado se dejó ver a sus casi 44 años con las líneas de expresión en su frente y exhibió las pecas de su rostro antes de maquillarse para el personaje.Alvarado responde a comentarios sobre su edadAl inicio del video, la actriz responde a comentarios sobre publicaciones anteriores donde usó diferentes filtros que le aumentaban la edad "como viejtia".Tras las publicaciones de Alvarado, los internautas comentaron que ella se quita la edad y tiene más edad de la que afirma tener.Sin embargo, Daniela respondió con claridad sobre su fecha de nacimiento, ya que fue un hecho notorio y público cuando su madre, Carmen Julia Álvarez salió embarazada de ella.Relata que la primera actriz, Carmen Julia Álvarez, tuvo problemas para tener hijos y sufrió pérdidas, durante su primer matrimonio con el fallecido actor Eduardo Serrano.Agregó Alvarado que cuando Álvarez finalmente salió embarazada de su entonces esposo, Daniel Alvarado, fue una noticia en el mundo del espectáculo ya que era una actriz muy querida por el público...

title: 제약사연합, 바이오벤처 투자·육성 힘 보탠다
creator: 노상우 (nswreal@etoday.co.kr)
노상우
content: 재단법인 한국혁신의약품컨소시엄(KIMCo재단)이 제약사들과 오픈이노베이션 펀드를 조성, 제약·바이오 투자 시장에 상생형 성장 전략을 제시한다. 31일 한국제약바이오협회에 따르면 최근 KIMCo재단은 유안타인베스트먼트와 공동으로 한국벤처투자가 주관하는 ‘2025년 스타트업 코리아 펀드’ 최종 운용사(GP)로 선정됐다. 총 157억 원 규모로 결성되는 벤처투자조합은 15개 국내 제약사와 한국제약바이오협회가 민간 출자자로 참여한 국내 최초의 제약사연합 출자 기반 바이오 특화 펀드다. 모태펀드가 특별출자자로 참여하면서 민관 협력 구조를 갖췄다. 이 펀드는 투자 경색에 어려움을 겪는 바이오벤처 지원을 위해 제약사들이 주도적으로 초기 바이오벤처를 발굴·육성하겠다는 산업계 의지에서 출발했다. 단순 자금 지원을 넘어 참여 제약사들과의 전략적 협업 및 연계를 통해 유망 기술의 사업화 가능성을 높여 바이오 생태계의 혁신을 실질적으로 이끌고자 조성됐다. 공동 운용사로 선정된 KIMCo재단과 유안타인베스트먼트는 각각 제약산업에 대한 전문성과 다양한 협력 네트워크, 벤처 투자 및 펀드 운용 역량을 결합해 바이오벤처가 기술사업화의 난관을 돌파하고 글로벌 시장으로 도약할 수 있도록 전략적 투자와 지원에 나선다. 두 운용사는 성공적인 펀드 운용을 위해 제약사들의 기술 수요에 부합하는 유망 바이오벤처를 발굴하고 오픈이노베이션 기반의 산업 밀착형 육성 전략을 통해 기업의 성장 단계별 맞춤형...

title: 군 간부 명예전역 지원자 2500명 ‘역대 최대’...부사관 3배 급증
creator: 동아일보
content: 최근 5년간 지원자 2배↑...부사관 명예전역 609명→1720명 서울 용산구 전쟁기념관 국방부 깃발. 2021.6.4. 뉴스1 지난해 명예전역을 신청한 군 간부가 2500여 명으로 집계돼 역대 최대 규모인 것으로 나타났다. 31일 국방부가 국회에 제출한 자료에 따르면 지난해 명예전역 지원자는 장교 782명, 부사관 1720명 등 총 2502명으로, 국방부가 명예전역수당 지급을 위해 추산한 예상 인원(1363명)의 두 배에 달했다. 이 가운데 심사를 통과해 명예전역자로 최종 선발된 인원은 장교 720명, 부사관 1216명 등 총 1936명이었으며, 나머지 566명은 탈락했다. 지난해 명예전역수당으로는 총 1360억 원이 지급됐다. 명예전역은 20년 이상 복무한 군인이 정년 전에 스스로 전역을 선택하는 제도로, 정년까지 남은 기간에 따라 명예전역수당을 추가로 받을 수 있다. 최근 5년간 명예전역 지원자는 △2020년 1176명 △2021년 1241명 △2022년 1743명 △2023년 2364명 △2024년 2502명으로 매년 가파르게 증가했다. 특히 부사관 명예전역 지원자는 같은 기간 609명에서 1720명으로 약 3배 급증했다. 올해 8월 기준으로 접수된 명예전역 지원자는 장교 738명, 부사관 1563명 등 총 2301명으로, 지난해와 비슷한 추이를 보이고 있다. 국방부 관계자는 “중견 간부 조기 이탈에 대한 정확한 원인 분석을 위한 연구를 진행 중”이라면서 “그 결과를 바탕으로 대책을 수립하고 추진할 예정”이라고 밝혔다. 그러면서 “부사관 복무 여건 개선을 위한 상성 복무태스크포스(TF)...

title: 지민-송다은 '결별한 사이'..."과거 영상 올리는 이유 몰라"
creator: 이미나
content: 그룹 방탄소년단(BTS) 지민과 배우 송다은이 교제하다 결별한 사이라는 지인의 발언이 나왔다. 31일 머니투데이에 따르면 지민은 입대 전후로 송다은과 짧은 만난 후 결별했으며 최근 SNS에 올라온 영상은 교제 당시 찍었다. 이런 내용을 밝힌 관계자는 "지민과 송다은은 과거 짧게 만났다. 송다은이 SNS에 올린 사진과 영상도 대부분 과거에 촬영해둔 것"이라고 전했다. 또 다른 관계자도 "둘이 만난 시점은 불명확하지만, 현재는 사귀고 있지 않다. 송다은이 주기적으로 과거 사진과 영상을 올리는 이유는 모르겠다"고 말한 것으로 전해졌다. 앞서 2022년부터 지민과 송다은은 뒤늦게 열애설에 휩싸였다. 송다은이 그해 6월 자신의 SNS에 'DAEUN(다은)'과 'jimin(지민)'이라고 적힌 이어폰 케이스 사진을 올리면서다. 이후에도 송다은은 BTS 웹 예능 '달려라 방탄'에서 지민으로 추정되는 남성을 모자이크해 공유하는가 하면, BTS 굿즈인 티셔츠를 입고 찍은 사진을 올리는 등 지민과 열애를 암시했다. 이어 지난 27일 송다은이 틱톡에 올린 영상이 화제가 됐다. 해당 영상에서 송다은은 아파트 엘리베이터에서 누군가를 기다리다 뒤이어 열린 문으로 지민 등장하자 놀라게 해 준다. 송다은을 마주한 지민은 "아 깜짝이야. 나 들어오는 거 알았어? 내가 일부러 말 안 하고 온 건데"라고 했다. 해당 아파트는 지민이 거주 중인 서울 용산구 한남동 나인원한남으로 알려졌다. 송다은은 지난 2022년 6월 라이브 방송에서 "네가 좋아하는 아이돌이 날 사랑한다고...

title: Ketika Rumah Ahmad Sahroni Dijarah: Arogansi, Pengabaian, dan Amarah yang Terpendam
ВСУ применяют запрещенные пули, вызывающие катастрофические повреждения органов
creator: Фото: Геннадий Черкасов
content: По информации, полученной от командира медицинской роты группировки войск «Днепр» с позывным «Питер», Вооруженные силы Украины применяют запрещенные Женевской конвенцией боеприпасы. Речь идет о самораскрывающихся пулях, специально спроектированных для нанесения максимальных повреждений внутренним органам и тканям. Как сообщил РИА Новости военный хирург, такие пули имеют характерные насечки, благодаря которым они раскрываются внутри тела подобно цветку, вызывая обширные повреждения глубоких структур, разрывы тканей и сосудов. Это приводит не только к критическим физическим травмам, но и к сильнейшему болевому шоку. Несмотря на тяжесть ранений, медикам удалось спасти жизнь пострадавшего бойца и эвакуировать его для дальнейшего лечения. Отвечая на вопрос о происхождении запрещенных боеприпасов, офицер отметил, что они не обязательно являются продукцией NATO. Существует вероятность их кустарного производства непосредственно военнослужащими ВСУ, которые могут самостоятельно изготавливать подобные пули, используя доступные патроны. Ранее сообщалось, что стали известны новые методы охоты на мужчин при мобилизации на Украине. Ваша надежная лента новостей — МК в MAX .

title: Así lucía Mar Contreras en La que no podía amar y otras novelas en las que actuó
creator: Martha Díaz
content: Mar Contreras , actual participante de La Casa de los Famosos México 3 , es una actriz y cantante originaria de Culiacán, Sinaloa. Con más de 20 años de trayectoria , ha destacado en telenovelas mexicanas y películas , luego de su debut en el mundo del entretenimiento con su participación en el reality Operación Triunfo en 2002. La carrera de Mar destaca por su versatilidad como intérprete, pues ha participado en producciones de distintos géneros. En la telenovela La que no podía amar (2011–2012), producida por José Alberto Castro , la actriz originaria se Sinaloa, Mar Contreras , interpretó a Vanessa Galván Villaseñor , una villana que busca retener a su amor del pasado y provoca enfrentamientos entre los protagonistas. Otras telenovelas en las que actuó fueron: Este es un video de Mar en Teresa. Así lucía Mar en la telenovela La que no podía amar (2011–2012), donde participó como protagonista la actriz mexicana Ana Brenda Contreras . Además, Mar Contreras fue parte del elenco de novelas como Muchachitas como tú (2007) donde aparece como Lorena , Tormenta en el paraíso (2008) como la Dra. Penélope Montalbán. También participó en programas de televisión como Como dice el dicho , Esta historia me suena, así como en Se vale. Este es un fragmento de la película ¿Qué le dijiste a Dios? donde Mar Contreras demuestra su capacidad vocal y actoral.

title: Cajamarca: INPE informó que reos organizaron motín y tomaron dos rehenes
creator: Redacción El Comercio Perú
content: Jaén: delincuentes disfrazados de censistas roban 100 mil soles en tienda de café y cacao“Estoy amenazado de muerte”: Mario Urbina y el hallazgo de un ave de 20 millones de años que evidencia la amenaza sobre OcucajeLos reclusos del penal de Huacariz, en Cajamarca, protagonizaron un violento motín tras un enfrentamiento con personal del Instituto Nacional Penitenciario (INPE). Luego de estos hechos, la institución confirmó que lograron controlar la situación y se descartó la existencia de fugas, fallecidos o rehenes dentro del centro penitenciario. Sin embargo, la situación generó alarma entre familiares de los internos y vecinos de la zona.El comunicado oficial del INPE señala que este sábado 30 de agosto, los internos del pabellón N° 5 tomaron de rehenes a dos agentes de seguridad.“Los internos realizaron el motín como medida de protesta ante una revisión ordinaria de ambientes por tenencia de objetos prohibidos, armas punzocortantes y licor”, señala el pronunciamiento.LEE: La Libertad: recién nacida es rescatada tras ser secuestrada en hospitalSin embargo, medios locales señalan que los reclusos habrían reaccionado con dicha violencia luego de denunciar presuntos abusos cometidos por agentes penitenciarios, en relación a la muerte del interno Santiago Acosta, de 27 años, quien falleció tras recibir una herida de arma punzocortante. Otra versión señala que el interno fue atacado por otros reos el último 28 de agosto.Este cumplía condena por 12...

title: When does Luke Littler play on Day 3 of the 2025 Flanders Darts Trophy?
creator: Alex Walsh
content: The 2025 European Tour is currently in Antwerp, Belgium, as the Flanders Darts Trophy is in progress. Luke Littler was among the 48 players competing in the tournament this weekend. A win on Saturday advanced him to the final day of action. When does Luke Littler play? After a 6-0 win against Dylan Slevin, Littler will play in the third round of action on Sunday. He'll face off against #16 seed Ryan Searle, in hopes of another defeat against 'Heavy Metal', after beating him in July at the World Matchplay. MORE: 2025 Flanders Darts Trophy: Draw, schedule, prize money and format explained Littler will play Searle in the third round on Sunday, August 31, at approximately 4:30 p.m. local time. The match will take place at 3:30 p.m. BST and 10:30 a.m. EST. His game against Searle is the final game of an eight-game slate during Sunday's afternoon session. If Littler comes away with a win in his match against Searle, he will play the winner of Damon Heta/Ryan Joyce in the quarterfinals. title: На Западе рассказали, зачем Зеленский выпрашивает встречу с Путиным
creator: РИА Новости
content: МОСКВА, 31 авг — РИА Новости. Владимиру Зеленскому необходима встреча с президентом России Владимиром Путиным, чтобы создать видимость своей легитимности и обернуть результаты встречи против Москвы,заявил британский геополитический аналитик Александр Меркурис в эфире YouTube-канала Дэниела Дэвиса . “Я думаю, что в этом (в требованиях личной встречи Зеленского и Путина . — Прим. ред.) есть сильный элемент блефа. Мне кажется, что он хочет устроить шоу, показать, что русские воспринимают его серьезно. Так что это, по сути, театр, который, однако, также служит цели избежать переговоров по существу”, — сказал он. Как считает Меркурис , Зеленский, вероятно, с помощью своих уловок рассчитывает выставить Путина тем самым, кто мешает прогрессу переговоров. Ранее глава МИД Сергей Лавров заявил, что президент России готов к встрече с главой киевского режима при условии, что на ней действительно будет президентская повестка дня, но встречаться с Зеленским просто так нецелесообразно.

title: Польские пограничники сообщили о выдворении 15 украинских граждан
creator: Юрий Ходырев
content: Власти Польши выдворили на родину 15 граждан Украины, признанных виновными в различных преступлениях и правонарушениях, сообщила Польская пограничная охрана. Их доставили к границе и передали украинской стороне. Ведомство также перечислило статьи, которые были инкриминированы указанным лицам. «Это, среди прочего, хранение наркотических и психотропных средств, кражи, разбои, подделки документов, вождение в нетрезвом состоянии, а также организация незаконного пересечения польской границы», — отметила пограничная охрана. Кроме того, уточняется, что выдворенные граждане были включены в список лиц, пребывание которых в Польше нежелательно. Они не смогут въехать на польскую территорию на срок от 5 до 10 лет. Напомним, в феврале портал RMF24 сообщал, что граждане Украины лидерами по количеству преступлений в Польше среди иностранцев. По данным СМИ, в 2024 году они совершили 9,7 тысячи правонарушений.

title: Teyana Taylor Says $70,000 Divorce Settlement to Ex Iman Shumpert was Best Money She 'Ever Spent'
creator: Just Jared
content: Teyana Taylor is ready to finally put her divorce from Iman Shumpert behind her.If you didn’t know, the 34-year-old Straw actress and rapper was married to the 35-year-old former pro basketball player from 2016 until 2023 and their divorce was finalized in June 2024. They share daughters Junie, 9, and Rue, 4.Teyana was recently ordered to pay Iman $70,000 after violating the terms of their divorce by speaking out publicly about it, according to Us Weekly.During an appearance on The Breakfast Club on August 27, Teyana said the $70K was the best money she’s “ever spent.”Keep reading to find out more...“If it’s gonna give me my peace and we can be done with this for good, I sent that wire so fast,” Teyana said. “I sent that wire so f–king fast.”She went on to refer to the sum as “the best lil’ coin I ever spent in my life,” noting that she’ll “never have to deal with this again.”Teyana also shared that the public still talks about her divorce, even though it was finalized over a year ago.“Every single time something amazing is going on in my life, it’s something about this divorce,” Teyana shared. “It don’t be nothing else. I’m never in nothing.”In another recent interview, Teyana shared some rare comments about her relationship with Aaron Pierre!

title: 롯데百, '하고하우스' 잠실 롯데월드몰점 리뉴얼 오픈...국내 최대 규모
creator: 강성전
content: 롯데백화점은 지난 29일 '하고하우스(HAGO:HAUS)'의 국내 최대 매장을 잠실 롯데월드몰 지하 1층에 선보였다고 31일 밝혔다. 하고하우스는 전도 유망한 디자이너 브랜드를 선제적으로 발굴해 소개하고, 유통하는 패션 편집 매장이다. 지난 2021년 롯데백화점 동탄점을 시작으로 전국 각지의 주요 점포에 총 13개 매장을 잇달아 열었다. 롯데월드몰 하고하우스는 지난 2022년 오픈한 전국 매출 1위 매장이다. 이번 리뉴얼을 통해 디지털 기반의 '신 콘셉트'를 국내 최초로 적용했다. 인테리어에서부터 상품 운영, 브랜드 구성까지 매장 전반을 전면 개편하고, 매장 규모도 기존 대비 40% 가량 키워 국내 최대 하고하우스 매장을 완성했다. 매장 공간은 '인공지능(AI) 아티스트'와 협업해 미래 지향적인 분위기를 연출했다. 이번에 협업한 '김정수' 작가는 국내를 대표하는 AI 아티스트로 디지털 아트에 각 입점 브랜드의 로고를 투영해 브랜드 경험을 확장했다. 또한 마네킹 없이 3D 홀로그램으로 재현된 제품의 입체감 있는 영상을 통해 역동감 넘치고 환상적인 비주얼 경험을 선사한다. 100평대에 이르는 매장에는 하고하우스만의 정체성을 담은 'K패션 브랜드'를 총망라한다. 글로벌 K패션 브랜드로 자리매김한 마뗑킴을 비롯 드파운드, 유니폼브릿지, 뮈뮈에르, 오아이오아이 컬렉션 등 K패션 트렌드를 이끄는 총 19개 브랜드가 포진됐다. 매장의 중심에는 '하고 서울 익스클루시브 존'을 마련해 롯데월드몰에서만 만나볼 수 있는 단독 상품을...

title: Cardi B is bringing her unfiltered self to court
creator: NEWS WIRE
content: LOS ANGELES - “Ten different looks and my looks all kill,” Cardi B raps on her song, “Money.” By swapping wigs and serving candor, the Grammy-winning artist seems to have done just that during her testimony this week in a civil trial in Los Angeles County. The case stems from a 2018 incident involving plaintiff Emani Ellis, a former building security guard who has sued Cardi B for alleged assault during an interaction between the women in the hallway of a medical office where Ellis was employed. The artist, who was pregnant at the time and on her way to see her obstetrician, has denied the allegation. Ellis is seeking punitive and other damages that include medical expenses for a scratch on her face. Cardi B’s courtroom testimony, which has been live-streamed by Court TV and recirculated across social media, has brought new attention to the 7-year-old case. Fans of Cardi B are far from surprised, as she’s known to be slick with her words both on and off the microphone. Here are three exchanges during the trial that have caught attention online. While being questioned about their interaction, Cardi B was asked to testify about the language she directed toward Ellis, in particular “the F-word.” She didn’t hesitate to recall what she said. “You want me to say it to her face?” Cardi B responded. Her attorney raised an objection to that request, which was sustained by the judge. Her attorney raised an objection to that request, which was sustained by the judge.

title: Audrey Jacob's 100yo 'murder' on the dance floor brought back to life
creator: Emma Wynne
content: A century ago, a young woman shot her former fiancé dead in the middle of a crowded Perth ballroom but was acquitted of murder by a jury. Now, a stage play is re-telling the story of . The play, Arthur Haynes and the Smoking Gun, will be performed in Government House Ballroom, the very same ballroom where Audrey Jacob shot her former fiancé Cyril Gidley dead in front of hundreds of revellers on August 27, 1925. The case and subsequent trial were a huge sensation in Perth at the time and a rich story for playwright Jenny Davis, who scripted the play for Perth theatre company Theatre180. Audrey Jacob shot her former fiancé in front of hundreds of witnesses. A few months later, a jury found her not guilty. How did she get away with it? "We have all the transcripts of the trial, all the police transcripts of the interviews and of course all the press that was happening at the time," Davis told Mark Gibson on ABC Radio Perth. "This was a real trial by media. "The Mirror [newspaper] was feeding out all these stories before the trial about the characters of both the accused and the victim, and there can't be any doubt that this swayed the jury." Extraordinary defence Jacob's energetic barrister Arthur Haynes successfully convinced the jury to find Jacob not guilty by making the case that she was in a state of distress after Gidley ended their engagement. Jacob told the court she had the gun with her because, heartbroken, she intended to end her life, and the gun had gone off...

title: 日月潭花火嘉年華 3場音樂會9/20起登場
creator: 張協昇
content: 〔記者張協昇/南投報導〕日月潭年度秋季限定大型活動-Come!BikeDa花火音樂嘉年華,將於9月20日至11月15日陸續登場,首場由九天民俗技藝團帶來的「九天威震響明潭」打頭陣,緊接下來的2場則為台灣大哥大日月潭花火音樂會及NTSO台灣管樂團花火音樂會,分別演出流行交響樂與膾炙人口的電影經典配樂,讓民眾在秋日浪漫的湖畔,於星光、煙火相伴下,享受高水準的音樂饗宴。 日月潭國家風景區管理處表示,2025日月潭花火音樂嘉年華,首場9月20日(星期六)晚間於伊達邵碼頭登場,由九天民俗技藝團攜手董事長樂團與伊達邵國小,以「搖滾尬陣頭」為核心,進行融合傳統、搖滾與原民文化的跨界演出。 請繼續往下閱讀... 11月1日(星期六)晚間於水社中興停車場舉行的台灣大哥大日月潭花火音樂會,則再度邀請華語歌壇新生代美聲歌手艾薇、實力派唱將卓義峯等人,以及江靖波指揮率領的75人編制樂興之時管絃樂團,共同演出包括五月天的《任性》、張惠妹的《開門見山》、動力火車的《當》等逾20首曲目,是一場在古典交響的架構中,注入流行節奏與科技元素的演出。 最終場11月15日(星期六)晚間於向山遊客中心登場,將由國立台灣交響樂團擔綱演出膾炙人口的電影經典配樂,並安排王裕文的薩克斯風獨奏,演出曲目包括《獅子王》組曲、《蝙蝠》選粹、《遠離家園》交響組曲等。詳情請上日管處活動官網查詢。 不用抽 不用搶 現在用APP看新聞 保證天天中獎 點我下載APP 按我看活動辦法

title: 建造及飲食業散工流動性高 冀明年加入積金易 劉麥嘉軒坦言極具挑戰
creator: 星島頭條網
content: 強積金計劃中有專為建造及飲食業散工而設的行業計劃,就行業計劃加入「積金易」平台的安排,積金局主席劉麥嘉軒坦言,這是整個積金易項目中極具挑戰的一環,事關兩個行業的工友流動性高,僱主及工友在應用科技方面需較多支援,因此該局會預留更多時間部署,多做宣傳、教育,以及協助登記等支援工作,期望行業計劃可於明年上半年上台。 劉麥嘉軒表示,參與行業計劃的工友流動性高,僱主供款方式等行政安排亦有別一般的強積金計劃。鑑於有工會及商會反映擔心建造及飲食業工友和僱主對數碼系統的接觸較少,普遍需要支援和更多時間適應,希望積金局特別策劃行業計劃的上台安排,確保能夠順利使用積金易,所以積金局將預留更多時間部署,並推出特別支援措施以確保兩個行業的僱主和工友有充足時間適應使用積金易。 支援措施包括聯同兩個行業計劃受託人,預早為僱主及工友註冊積金易;為僱主舉辦簡介及試用會,協助他們熟習平台操作,以及聯同工會和商會舉行外展活動,安排流動登記車走訪這兩個行業的工作場所,例如建築地盤、食肆等,協助工友註冊積金易。 她指出,將爭取行業計劃盡快上台,期望上半年可成事,具體時間將適時公布。 相關文章: 積金易減費成效超預期 料行政費可降65% 4大強積金受託人9月起加入

title: अमेरिकी डरलको मूल्य स्थिर, अरू मुद्राको कति छ विनिमयदर?
creator: सेतोपाटी संवाददाता
content: नेपाल राष्ट्र बैंकले आइतबारका लागि विदेशी मुद्राको विनिमयदर निर्धारण गरेको छ। राष्ट्र बैंकका अनुसार अमेरिकी डलर एकको खरिदर १४० रुपैयाँ ८२ पैसा र बिक्रीदर १४१ रुपैयाँ ४२ पैसा कायम भएको छ। युरोपियन युरो एकको खरिदर १६४ रुपैयाँ २४ पैसा र बिक्रीदर १६४ रुपैयाँ ९४ पैसा, युके पाउन्ड स्ट्रलिङ एकको खरिदर १८९ रुपैयाँ ४९ पैसा र बिक्रीदर १९० रुपैयाँ २९ पैसा, स्वीस फ्र्यांक एकको खरिददर १७५ रुपैयाँ ५१ पैसा र बिक्रीदर १७६ रुपैयाँ २६ पैसा कायम गरिएको छ। अष्ट्रेलियन डलर एकको खरिददर ९१ रुपैयाँ ९३ पैसा र बिक्रीदर ९२ रुपैयाँ ३२ पैसा, क्यानेडियन डलर एकको खरिदर १०२ रुपैयाँ ४२ पैसा र बिक्रीदर १०२ रुपैयाँ ८५ पैसा, सिङ्गापुर डलर एकको खरिददर १०९ रुपैयाँ ५६ पैसा र बिक्रीदर ११० रुपैयाँ ०२ पैसा निर्धारण गरिएको छ। जापानी येन १० को खरिदर नौ रुपैयाँ ५७ पैसा र बिक्रीदर नौ रुपैयाँ ६१ पैसा, चिनियाँ युआन एकको खरिदर १९ रुपैयाँ ७४ पैसा र बिक्रीदर १९ रुपैयाँ ८३ पैसा, साउदी अरेबियन रियाल एकको खरिददर ३७ रुपैयाँ ५३ पैसा र बिक्रीदर ३७ रुपैयाँ ६९ पैसा, कतारी रियाल एकको खरिददर ३८ रुपैयाँ ६३ पैसा र बिक्रीदर ३८ रुपैयाँ ७९ पैसा कायम भएको छ। केन्द्रीय बैंकका अनुसार थाई भाट एकको खरिददर चार रुपैयाँ ३४ पैसा र बिक्रीदर चार रुपैयाँ ३६ पैसा, युएई दिराम एकको खरिददर ३८ रुपैयाँ ३४ पैसा र बिक्रीदर ३८ रुपैयाँ ५० पैसा, मलेसियन रिङ्गेट एकको खरिददर ३३ रुपैयाँ ३३ पैसा र बिक्रीदर ३३ रुपैयाँ ४७ पैसा, साउथ कोरियन वन एक सयको खरिददर १० रुपैयाँ १२ पैसा र बिक्रीदर १० रुपैयाँ १६ पैसा, स्वीडिस क्रोनर एकको खरिददर १४ रुपैयाँ ८७ पैसा र बिक्रीदर १४ रुपैयाँ ९३ पैसा र डेनिस क्रोनर एकको खरिददर २२ रुपैयाँ र बिक्रीदर २२ रुपैयाँ १० पैसा तोकिएको छ।राष्ट्र...

title: Chamba News: तेलका के मंडलई में मकान ध्वस्त, चितराड़ से 10 परिवार किए शिफ्ट
content: तेलका/सलूणी (चंबा)। भारी बारिश और भूस्खलन के कारण उप-तहसील तेलका और ग्राम पंचायत सलूणी के चितराड़ गांव में भारी नुकसान हुआ है। तेलका के गांव मंडलई में हरी चंद का पक्का मकान पूरी तरह से ध्वस्त हो गया, जबकि चितराड़ में भूस्खलन से 10 परिवार खतरे की जद में आ गए। चितराड़ के 10 परिवारों को सुरक्षित जगह शिफ्ट कर दिया गया है।तेलका उप-तहसील के ग्राम पंचायत सेरी के गांव मंडलई में हरी चंद का पक्का मकान बीती बारिश की वजह से ध्वस्त हो गया। लगातार बारिश के कारण भूमि खिसकने से मकान की नींव कमजोर हो गई और दीवारें गिरने लगीं। घटना के दौरान हरी चंद और उनका परिवार घर में था, लेकिन पड़ोसियों ने समय रहते सभी को सुरक्षित बाहर निकाल लिया, जिससे एक बड़ा हादसा टल गया। मकान के पूरी तरह क्षतिग्रस्त हो जाने के बाद हरी चंद और उनका परिवार अस्थायी रूप से पड़ोसी के घर में शरण लिए हुए हैं। प्रशासन से अब तक कोई मदद नहीं मिली है, जिससे स्थानीय लोग परेशान हैं। नायब तहसीलदार कुशल सिंह ने बताया कि राजस्व विभाग की टीम को मौके पर भेजा जाएगा और नुकसान का आकलन कर जल्द रिपोर्ट तैयार की जाएगी ताकि पीड़ित परिवार को शीघ्र राहत दी जा सके।सलूणी क्षेत्र में 44 घरों और गोशालाओं को नुकसानग्राम पंचायत सलूणी के चितराड़ गांव में भूस्खलन के बाद दस परिवार खतरे में आ गए थे। प्रशासन ने तुरंत कार्रवाई करते हुए प्रभावित परिवारों को प्राथमिक विद्यालय नरोई में शिफ्ट कर दिया। नायब तहसीलदार डीसी राणा ने मौके पर पहुंचकर स्थिति का जायजा लिया और रिपोर्ट एसडीएम सलूणी को सौंपी। वहीं, सलूणी के तहत आने वाले गांवों में भूस्खलन से 44 घरों और गोशालाओं को नुकसान पहुंचा है।

title: Vụ xác minh người đàn ông lái thử xe máy rồi phóng mất, bỏ lại bạn gái: Bất ngờ nơi tìm thấy chiếc xe
creator: Lam Giang (tổng hợp)
content: Liên quan đến đoạn clip một người đàn ông dẫn người yêu đi mua xe máy, sau đó lên xe đi thử rồi phóng mất, để lại bạn gái bơ vơ tại cửa hàng gây xôn xao mạng xã hội, ngày 30/8, anh Phạm Bá Quang (sinh năm 1995, chủ cửa hàng xe máy) cho biết đã tìm thấy chiếc xe. Trao đổi với báo Tuổi Trẻ Online vào trưa ngày 30/8, anh Quang cho biết, chiếc xe máy bị người đàn ông lái đi đã được tìm thấy ở địa phận TP.Cần Thơ, cách Nghệ An hơn 1.500km. Theo anh Quang, chiếc xe đã bị tháo lớp tem màu xanh và được ký gửi trong một xe giường nằm. Hiện anh Quang đang chờ chuyển xe về Nghệ An, còn tung tích người đàn ông chạy xe thì vẫn chưa được tìm thấy. Công an phường Vinh Lộc cũng xác nhận đã nhận được đơn trình báo của anh Quang và đang xác minh, làm rõ vụ việc. Chiếc xe được tìm thấy ở TP.Cần Thơ. (Ảnh: Tuổi Trẻ Online) Trước đó, anh Quang trình báo Công an phường Vinh Lộc (Nghệ An) về sự việc có một người đàn ông đến cửa hàng của anh, lái thử xe rồi bất ngờ phóng đi mất. Theo trình báo của anh Quang, khoảng 9 giờ sáng 27/8, có một đôi nam nữ đến xem xe. Trước đó một ngày, cặp đôi này cũng đã ghé cửa hàng và liên lạc với nhân viên cửa hàng qua Zalo. Cả 2 lần đến cửa hàng, 2 người này đều xưng hô...

title: Sức hút của du lịch Việt Nam từ những chiến trường xưa
creator: Vi Nguyễn
content: Nhiều người trong số họ nhớ về Việt Nam qua các tít báo về chiến tranh trong những năm 1960 và 1970 của thế kỷ trước, số khác qua phim ảnh và sách lịch sử sau này. Ngày nay, các chiến trường xưa ở Việt Nam là nơi hành hương của những cựu chiến binh từ cả hai phía đã từng đối đầu ở đó, và của cả những du khách muốn tận mắt chứng kiến nơi từng một thời khói lửa đạn bom. "Nơi này từng là chiến trường khi tôi còn ở đây," cựu chiến binh quân đội Mỹ Paul Hazelton hồi tưởng với AP khi ông cùng vợ đi dạo quanh khuôn viên Bảo tàng Chứng tích Chiến tranh ở TP.HCM. Cờ đỏ sao vàng tung bay trên cầu Hiền Lương, với đài tưởng niệm ở phía xa ẢNH: AP Chuyến đi của Hazelton, ngay trước sinh nhật lần thứ 80, đã đưa ông trở lại Việt Nam khi còn là một anh lính trẻ tuổi, bao gồm Huế, căn cứ Phú Bài cũ ở ngoại ô thành phố, và Đà Nẵng, một căn cứ quan trọng khác của quân đội Mỹ. "Bất cứ nơi nào tôi đến, bạn biết đấy, đó đều là vùng đất bị quân đội Mỹ chiếm đóng, và giờ đây tôi chỉ thấy sự hối hả, nhộn nhịp và công nghiệp. Thật đáng kinh ngạc", ông nói và chia sẻ rằng rất vui vì bây giờ hai bên đang giao thương, hữu nghị với nhau và cùng được hưởng lợi từ sự hợp tác đó. Theo...

title: Во Владивостоке очередной автомобиль протаранил здание под номером "13"
creator: Андрей Пушкарев
content: После дорожно-транспортного происшествия на место оперативно прибыли сотрудники ГАИ, а после автомобиль убрал эвакуатор. Причины потери контроля водителем выясняются. Известно, что это здание под номером "13" на центральной улице приморской столицы с печальной регулярностью таранят автомобили. Причем, практически в одно и то же место. А в 90-е годы прошлого века в него врезался даже сошедший с рельсов трамвай.

title: Putin llega a China en su visita "sin precedentes" (EN VIVO)
creator: RT en Español
content: El presidente de Rusia, Vladímir Putin, ha llegado este domingo a China en su visita de trabajo que durará cuatro días. Según detallaron previamente desde el Kremlin, durante su estancia en el país asiático, el mandatario ruso participará en la 25.a cumbre de la Organización de Cooperación de Shanghái ( OCS ), que tendrá lugar del 31 de agosto al 1 de septiembre en la ciudad de Tianjin. El asesor presidencial, Yuri Ushakov, precisó que se prevén diez reuniones bilaterales de Putin con líderes y jefes de Gobierno extranjeros al margen de la cumbre de la OCS, además de algunas reuniones adicionales que se negociarán más adelante . Si quiere saber más sobre la Organización de Cooperación de Shanghái (OCS), lea este artículo Luego, el presidente partirá a Pekín, donde se reunirá con su homólogo chino, Xi Jinping, y participará en los eventos conmemorativos por el 80. ° aniversario de la victoria en la guerra de resistencia contra la agresión japonesa y contra el fascismo en el marco del desfile militar el 3 de septiembre. Putin: Rusia y China condenan intentos de hacer héroes a nazis y difamar a soldados libertadores Además, el líder ruso mantendrá una serie de reuniones bilaterales. El 2 de septiembre, en Pekín, tendrá lugar una reunión trilateral entre los jefes del Estado de Rusia, China y Mongolia, durante la cual Vladímir Putin, Xi Jinping y Ukhnaagiin Khurelsukh intercambiarán opiniones sobre las principales áreas de trabajo en...

title: FENAPO 2025: RECONOCIMIENTO A LA GRANDEZA ARTESANAL DE SAN LUIS POTOSÍ
creator: Redacción
content: * Las funcionarias federales Sonya Santos Garza y Josefina Rodríguez Zamora visitaron el Pabellón Artesanal de la Feria Nacional Potosina, destacando la riqueza cultural y las oportunidades económicas del estado En el marco de la Feria Nacional Potosina (Fenapo) 2025, la directora general del Fondo Nacional para el Fomento de las Artesanías (Fonart), Sonya Santos Garza, y la Secretaria de Turismo federal, Josefina Rodríguez Zamora, visitaron en días distintos el Pabellón Artesanal, donde destacaron la riqueza cultural y productiva de San Luis Potosí. Durante su recorrido, Santos Garza calificó al Pabellón como “el corazón de la Fenapo” y anunció la compra de artesanías por un valor cercano a los 100 mil pesos, lo que beneficiará directamente a los artesanos potosinos. En particular, destacó el bordado tének como una expresión única en México. Por su parte, Rodríguez Zamora participó en un ritual tradicional de bienvenida, recibió un rebozo de Santa María del Río y resaltó su l trabajo del Gobernador Ricardo Gallardo de preservar y promover la identidad textil de San Luis Potosí. Ambas funcionarias coincidieron en la necesidad de fortalecer la colaboración institucional para generar más oportunidades económicas y turísticas para la región.

title: Jagdeep Dhankhar Applies for Pension as Former Rajasthan MLA After Quitting Vice President Post
creator: Ananya Varma
content: Former vice president Jagdeep Dhankhar, who resigned earlier this year from the post due to "health reasons" has applied for a pension as an ex-legislator in Rajasthan. According to officials, he applied afresh to the Rajasthan Assembly secretariat on Thursday seeking the resumption of his pension as a former MLA. "We received the application two days ago. If elected to any ministerial, gubernatorial, or presidential post, an MLA’s pension gets suspended by the state assembly secretariat. Now, after stepping down from the vice president’s post on July 21, Dhankhar has re-applied for the pension for his previous legislative term in Rajasthan’s Kishangarh from 1993 to 1998," a spokesperson of the Rajasthan assembly secretariat said, TOI reported. Notably, Dhankhar represented the Kishangarh assembly constituency as a Congress MLA and received a pension as a former legislator until July 2019. It was discontinued after he was appointed the governor of West Bengal on July 20, 2019. The secretariat has initiated the process, according to the official, and the pension will be applicable from the date his resignation as vice president was accepted. "The pension for a former MLA in Rajasthan starts at ₹35,000 per month for a single term and increases with additional terms and age. Those above 70 receive a 20% hike. Dhankhar, now 74, is therefore entitled to ₹42,000 per month as a former legislator," he added. Also Read: Why Did Jagdeep Dhankhar Resign As Vice President? Congress...

title: 익산 장애인펜싱 세계선수권, 9월 2일 막 오른다
creator: 고석중 기자
content: [익산=뉴시스]고석중 기자 = 장애인펜싱 세계 최강자들이 전북자치도 익산에 모인다. 패럴림픽 바로 다음으로 높은 랭킹 포인트가 걸린 세계 최고 권위의 대회다. 익산시는 '2025 익산 장애인펜싱 세계선수권대회'가 다음 달 2일부터 7일까지 엿새간 익산시 실내체육관에서 열린다고 31일 밝혔다. 이번 대회는 국제장애인스포츠연맹(World Abilitysport) 주최로, 대한장애인펜싱협회와 익산시장애인체육회가 공동 주관한다. 33개국에서 500여 명의 선수단이 참가할 예정이다. 대회는 2026 아이치·나고야 아시아패러게임 출전권이 걸려 있어, 전 세계 장애인펜싱 선수들에게는 놓칠 수 없는 승부처다. 패럴림픽 다음으로 높은 랭킹 포인트가 주어지는 만큼 세계 장애인스포츠계의 이목이 쏠리고 있다. 경기는 2일 에페와 사브르 종목으로 시작되며, 3일 오후 6시 공식 개회식을 통해 본격적인 열전에 돌입한다. 이후 남녀 플뢰레·사브르·에페 등 종목별 예선과 본선이 이어지고, 7일 단체전을 끝으로 대단원의 막을 내린다. 이번 대회는 익산이 국제 장애인 스포츠 중심 도시로 도약하는 전환점이 될 것으로 기대된다. 지역의 스포츠 인프라와 시민들의 자발적인 참여, 포용적인 환대 문화가 더해지며 세계에 익산의 이름을 각인시킬 기회로 평가된다. 김완길 대한장애인펜싱협회장은 "어려운 여건 속에서도 대회를 유치하고 준비한 모든 관계자들께 깊이 감사드린다. 선수들이 자신감을 갖고 세계 무대에서 최고의 실력을 펼치길 응원하겠다"고 전했다....

title: [中전승절 D-3] 북중러 정상, 톈안먼 망루에 나란히...열병식 첨단무기 '주목'
creator: 차병섭
content: 다음 달 3일(현지시간) 중국의 '중국인민 항일전쟁 및 세계 반파시스트 전쟁(제2차 세계대전) 승리 80주년' 열병식을 앞두고 세계의 시선이 중국 베이징으로 쏠리고 있다. 중국이 이번 열병식에서 차세대 무기를 집중적으로 공개하겠다고 공언해온 데다, 김정은 북한 국무위원장의 참석으로 북중러 정상이 톈안먼 광장 망루에 함께 오를 것으로 예고되면서 국제정치적·군사적 파장이 예상된다. ◇ 북중러 정상 처음으로 한자리에...中 '다자주의 수호' 자처할 수도 앞서 훙레이 중국 외교부 부장조리(차관보)는 28일 기자회견에서 "외국 국가 원수 및 정부 수뇌 26명이 기념행사에 참석한다"면서 블라디미르 푸틴 러시아 대통령에 이어 두 번째로 김정은 북한 국무위원장을 소개했다. 김 위원장의 중국 방문은 2019년 이후 6년여 만이며 북중러 지도자가 한자리에 모이는 것은 탈냉전 이후 처음이다. 그런 만큼 이번 열병식을 통해 북중러 대 한미일 구도가 심해질 수 있다는 관측이 나온다. 특히 러시아 크렘린궁 관계자는 열병식이 진행되는 동안 시 주석의 오른쪽에 푸틴 대통령이, 왼쪽에 김 위원장이 앉을 예정이라고 설명했다. 북중러 정상이 톈안먼 광장 망루에 나란히 앉은 장면이 전 세계에 생중계될 경우 이는 신냉전의 시작을 알리는 상징적 장면이 될 수 있다는 관측까지 나온다. 사상 첫 북중러 3자 회담이 성사될 경우 이는 2023년 한미일의 캠프 데이비드 정상회의에 비견될 것이라는 평가도 있다. 이번 열병식이 일본...

title: Lynx clinch home court for playoffs with record 31st win, 94-70 over Sun
creator: The Canadian Press
content: UNCASVILLE, Conn. (AP) — Alanna Smith and reserve DiJonai Carrington scored 18 points apiece and the Minnesota Lynx clinched the regular-season title with a 94-70 win over the Connecticut Sun on Saturday night. Minnesota (31-8) also set a franchise record for wins. The Lynx won 30 games last season in a 40-game schedule — four fewer than this year. Napheesa Collier added 17 points and nine rebounds for the Lynx, Courtney Williams had 15 points and eight boards and Kayla McBride had 15 points and six assists. Minnesota was 15 for 28 on 3-pointers with McBride hitting five and Smith four. The Lynx had 27 assists on 34 baskets with 10 different players getting at least one. Tina Charles and Marina Mabrey had 14 points apiece for the Sun (10-28) and Aaliyah Edwards 11. Natisha Hiedemann hit a jumper to give the Lynx a 21-19 lead after one quarter and they dominated the second quarter to take a 42-29 lead at the half. Williams reached 4,000 career points as she had 11 in the half, hitting all three of her 3s. Minnesota got off to a 9-2 start in the second half, taking a 51-31 lead on Collier's layup. The Sun kept battling back, the closest was 11 when Lindsay Allen found Edwards alone under the basket to cut it to 61-50. Then Carrington drained a buzzer-beating 3 and the Lynx were up 66-54 entering the fourth quarter. The Sun never got closer than 12 and the Lynx hit four 3s to pull away down the stretch. ___ AP WNBA: https://apnews.com/hub/wnba-basketball The Associated Press

title: Switzer scores game-winning touchdown, Presbyterian beats Mercer 15-10
creator: The Canadian Press
content: MACON, Ga. (AP) — Zach Switzer capped an 80-yard drive with a 16-yard run with 56 seconds remaining to send Presbyterian past Mercer 15-10 on Saturday. Switzer only managed 33 rushing yards on nine carries, but none were more important than his go-ahead burst that gave Presbyterian its first season-opening win since 2021 and avenged a 63-10 loss to Mercer in last season's opener. Collin Hurst was 25 for 38 with 303 yards and one touchdown for the Blue Hose and Dominic Kibby had 9 receptions for 114 yards. BJ Atkins reeled in six catches for 57 yards. The Blue Hose were 3 for 5 on fourth downs, and had possession for almost 36 minutes. The Blue Hose defense held Mercer to 241 yards of total offense, and 4 for 13 on third down. The Bears reached the Presbyterian 28-yard line but had two incomplete passes before time ran out. Presbyterian snapped a three-game losing streak in the all-time series against Mercer, which the Bears lead 11-6 since 1927. ___ Get poll alerts and updates on the AP Top 25 throughout the season. title: Death of ‘soul of South African storytelling’ sparks grief and anger
creator: NEWS WIRE
content: CAPE TOWN - The death of a much-loved star is normally followed by an outpouring of grief, but in South Africa last week’s loss of 75-year-old actress Nandi Nyembe also came with an outpouring of anger. People were distressed that in the last months of her life an obviously sick woman was reduced to appearing on videos appealing for financial help. Sitting in a wheelchair, with thin, grey hair, wearing a loose T-shirt and fleece pyjama trousers, she said she did not like people feeling pity for her, but she needed money to cover the basics. Her biggest plea was for more work so she could support herself. This was a far cry from her more famous screen appearances. As the lead in some major television series over recent decades, her face was beamed into the homes of South Africans and she became a familiar weekly presence. Respectfully known as mam’Nandi, her passing, for some, felt like losing a close relative. A tribute jointly released by her family and the government hailed her as the “very soul of South African storytelling”. She was “far more than an actress” but also a teacher and guide who “broke barriers” and “inspired young actors in villages and townships to dream beyond their circumstances”. Given that status, the way she appeared late in life was all the more shocking. Her death, after a long illness, has reignited the debate about the lack of support available to South African artists who are unable to work and has shone a spotlight on the struggle many face...

title: “Ánimas de día claro”: el clásico chileno que mezcla teatro y circo llega al Maule
creator: Fabiola Fuhrop
content: La reconocida obra chilena Ánimas de día claro volverá a presentarse en el Maule, ofreciendo al público una experiencia que mezcla el teatro con la magia del circo.La propuesta invita a vivir la historia de cinco hermanas que, tras su muerte, permanecen atadas al mundo de los vivos por deseos no cumplidos. Se trata de un relato que combina fantasía, humor y emoción. Las funciones se llevarán a cabo en distintas localidades durante septiembre. El 6 a las 16:00 horas en la Plaza de Parral; el 11 a las 12:30 horas en el Liceo de Pencahue; el 13 a las 16:00 horas en la Plaza Las Heras; y el 14 a las 17:00 horas en la Plaza de Molina. La invitación está abierta a toda la familia y amigos.En detalle, el argumento de la obra de Alejandro Sieveking se centra en las cinco hermanas, cuyos espíritus aún habitan la antigua casona donde vivieron. Con la llegada de Eulogio, un joven del pueblo con la intención de comprar la casa, cada una logra cumplir sus anhelos pendientes. Excepto Bertina, quien deseaba dar un beso a un enamorado. Finalmente, al concretar su deseo, se enamora y desea quedarse en la tierra, mostrando cómo los deseos pueden ser tan poderosos como para trascender la vida misma. La iniciativa de presentar la obra Ánimas de día claro cuenta con financiamiento del Ministerio de las Culturas, las Artes y el Patrimonio. Esto a través del Fondo de las Artes Escénicas, apoyando la creación y producción de montajes escénicos locales.The post “Ánimas de día...

title: Aliansi Jogja Memanggil Menilai Wajar Rakyat Marah, Ini Alasannya
Pembuktian 3 Gelar Diborong Pebulu Tangkis Indonesia di Lagos
creator: Andryanto Wisnuwidodo
content: LAGOS - Pemain bulu tangkis Indonesia memborong tiga gelar juara dari turnamen Lagos International Classics 2025. Tunggal putra, ganda putri dan ganda campuran Indonesia naik podium turnamen BWF yang berakhir Sabtu(30/8/2025) kemarin. Dari tunggal putra, Prahdiska Bagas Shujiwo kembali naik podium setelah mengalahkan pemain Jepang, Minoru Koga. Prahdiska yang menjadi unggulan ketiga mampu memenangi final dengan skor 21-17, 21-18. Baca Juga: Janice Tjen, Aldila Sutjiadi, dan Inspirasi Eks Ratu Tenis Ashleigh Barty Dalam laga lainnya, duet Isyana Syahira Meida/Rinjani Kwinnara Nastine naik podium tertinggi dengan menaklukkan Uni Emirat Arab (UEA). Duet Isyana/Rinjani yang menjadi unggulan pertama mampu menang dua gim atas Aleena Qathun/Sreeyuktha Sreejith Parol dengan skor 21-18, 21-7. Sebelumnya, ganda campuran Bimo Prasetyo/Arlya Nabila Thesya Munggaran juga mengharumkan Indonesia. Pasangan Bimo/Arlya membungkam pemain India, Dhruv Rawat/Maneesha K dalam dua gim 21-15, 21-17. Keberhasilan pemain muda Indonesia membawa tiga gelar dari Lagos melanjutkan sukses sebelumnya di Cameroon International Challenge 2025. Empat gelar dibawa pulang pebulu tangkis Indonesia dari turnamen Cameroon International Challenge 2025. Gelar tunggal putra, tunggal putri, ganda putri dan campuran diborong pemain muda Indonesia dari turnamen yang menyediakan hadiah USD20.000. Duet ganda campuran M Nawaf Khoiriyansyah/Nahya Muhyifa, tunggal putra Prahdiska Bagas Shujiwo, tunggal putri tunggal putri...

title: Tập đoàn Geleximco, Sun Group, BRG và loạt doanh nghiệp lớn nhận bằng khen của Thủ tướng Chính phủ
creator: Theo Ngọc Đẹp
content: Chiều 30/8, Thủ tướng Chính phủ Phạm Minh Chính chủ trì Hội nghị gặp mặt doanh nghiệp với chủ đề "80 năm doanh nghiệp đồng hành cùng đất nước" . Buổi gặp mặt này có sự tham gia của đại diện 60 tập đoàn, tổng công ty nhà nước, 141 doanh nghiệp tư nhân và 50 doanh nghiệp FDI. Thứ trưởng Bộ Tài chính Nguyễn Đức Tâm phát biểu tại Hội nghị - Ảnh: VGP/Nhật Bắc Tại Hội nghị, Bộ Tài chính cho biết, đầu những năm 1990, cả nước chỉ có hơn 5.000 doanh nghiệp. Đến nay con số đã vượt 970 nghìn, cùng khoảng 30 nghìn hợp tác xã và hơn 5 triệu hộ kinh doanh. Trong 8 tháng đầu năm 2025, kinh tế Việt Nam tiếp tục khởi sắc nhờ quyết tâm và nỗ lực của cả hệ thống chính trị, nhân dân và cộng đồng doanh nghiệp. GDP 6 tháng đầu năm đạt mức 7,52%, cao nhất trong gần 20 năm qua, đưa Việt Nam trở thành nước tăng trưởng hàng đầu ASEAN và thuộc nhóm cao nhất thế giới. Thu ngân sách 7 tháng đạt hơn 80% dự toán (tăng gần 27,8% so với cùng kỳ). Xuất khẩu 7 tháng đạt 262,4 tỷ USD, xuất siêu ước đạt 10,2 tỷ USD. Tổng vốn FDI đăng ký đạt gần 24,1 tỷ USD, vốn thực hiện khoảng 13,6 tỷ USD. Trong 8 tháng đầu năm, cả nước có gần 128,2 nghìn doanh nghiệp và 73.855 hộ kinh doanh thành lập mới, 80.800 doanh nghiệp quay trở...

title: Dev’ion Reynolds’ 96-yard kickoff return for TD changes NIU’s fortunes in opener against Holy Cross
creator: Eddie Carifio
content: NIU’s season opener sure seemed headed toward a defeat at the hands of an FCS team. At least until Dev’ion Reynolds turned the tide in just 13 seconds. The offense was struggling, especially after starting quarterback Josh Holst left the game in the second half Saturday against Holy Cross in an eventual 19-17 Huskies victory. Special teams wasn’t performing much better with some costly miscues. And the defense, as sharp as it had been all game, just gave up the game’s first touchdown on a 77-yard drive that took just 1:27 off the clock and gave the Crusaders their first lead, 10-6. Reynolds made sure the lead was short-lived. He already had a 54-yard kickoff return. Turns out that was just the appetizer. Reynolds went 96 yards for a touchdown, putting the Huskies ahead 12-10. “That drive before, we kind of had a mental lapse,” safety Muhammed Jammeh said. “We gave up a lot of plays. ... When Dev made that play he made up for a couple of the plays on defense. You just feel the confidence through the whole team. the whole stadium, everything.” It revitalized everything for the Huskies at that point. Holy Cross went three and out on its next drive and only managed 9 yards for the rest of the game. When the offense got the ball back, it pulled out its first touchdown of the game, pushing the lead to 19-10. NIU was 3 for 13 on third down before that drive. The Huskies went 2 for 2 on the scoring drive, letting Chavon Wright take a direct snap and score on a 2-yard run. He...

title: 국민카드, 민생쿠폰 대상 소상공인 이자비용 대신 낸다
creator: 매일경제
content: KB국민카드가 경기 침체와 소비심리 위축 등으로 어려움을 겪고 있는 소상공인을 지원하기 위한 포용금융 프로그램을 시행한다고 31일 밝혔다. 우선 KB국민카드는 소비자에게 무이자 2~3개월 할부를 제공한다. 대상은 연 매출 30억원 이하 소상공인 가맹점이다. 민생회복소비쿠폰 사용 대상 모든 가맹점이 해단된다. 이자 비용은 KB국민카드가 전액 부담하는 방식으로 9월부터 11월 말까지 시행된다. 고객은 이자 없이 결제할 수 있어 소비 부담을 줄일 수 있고, 가맹점은 매출 증대 효과를 기대할 수 있어 소상공인의 영업 활성화에 실질적인 도움이 될 것으로 KB국민카드는 기대하고 있다. 또 추석 물가 부담을 낮추고 지역경제 활성화와 전통시장 상권 회복을 위해 소상공인 가맹점을 이용하는 고객에게 다양한 혜택을 제공한다. 소상공인 가맹점에서 ‘KB전통시장 온누리카드’로 건당 1만원 이상 KB Pay 결제하면 카드 상품서비스 외 추가로 누적금액 기준 신용카드 10%(최대 2만원) 캐시백, 체크카드 5%(최대 5000원) 캐시백을 9월부터 11월 말까지 매월 지급한다. 소상공인 가맹점은 전통시장, 온누리상품권 가맹점뿐 아니라 행정안전부에서 추진중인 민생회복소비쿠폰 가맹점과 착한가격업소까지 대상으로 포함했다. ‘KB전통시장 온누리카드’는 신용카드 기준 전월실적에 따라 전통시장 가맹점에서 최대 10%(최대 1만원), 온누리상품권 차감 결제 시 최대 10%(최대 1만원) 할인을 제공하며, 전통시장 가맹점에서 온누리상품권 차감...

title: NPC: Northland Taniwha triumph over Hawke’s Bay Magpies in dramatic 27-22 comeback victory
creator: Imran Ali
content: A rejuvenated Northland Taniwha side took the arm-wrestle back from a traditionally dominant side in their latest clash of the Bunnings NPC competition. The home side’s 27-22 win over a stunned Hawke’s Bay at Whangārei’s Semenoff Stadium on Saturday was a performance for the ages. Northland’s upward trajectory this season has been built on more than just set-piece accuracy and dominance in the collision. The team know a slick set piece and breakdown brilliance are the meat and potatoes for the lighter touch – the intricate attacking ploys on offer in their a la carte menu. They are rolling over opponents in the scrum and folding carriers to the turf.

title: Julia Roberts debuta en Venecia con ‘After the Hunt’ de Luca Guadagnino
creator: Editor
content: Fuera de competencia, la película de ‘After the Hunt’ con la que Julia Roberts llega por primera vez a la Mostra es un intenso relato post ‘Me Too’.Julia Roberts debutó este viernes en el Festival Internacional de Cine de Venecia de la mano del director italiano, Luca Guadagnino, con After the Hunt, un intenso relato que se inserta en el debate del movimiento “Me Too” y que invita a la discusión sobre el abuso en distintos ámbitos.‘After the Hunt’, la película con la que Julia debuta en Venecia y que invita al debateLa película After the Hunt, presentada este viernes en la 82a Mostra de Venecia fuera de la competencia, podría generar debate con su historia sobre un caso de agresión sexual en un prestigioso campus universitario.En el filme, producido por Amazon, Julia Roberts encarna a Alma, una profesora de filosofía de la Universidad de Yale, en Estados Unidos, que lleva una vida acomodada junto a su esposo, Fred (Michael Stuhlbarg), terapeuta.Alfombra roja de la película Afther the Hunt de Luca Guadagnino protagonizada por Julia Roberts, Andrew Garfield y Ayo Edebiri (Vittorio Zunino Celotto/Getty Images)Ambos forman parte de la élite intelectual del país, suelen invitar a amigos, colaboradores y estudiantes a casa, donde debaten entre copas de vino hasta altas horas de la madrugada. Pero lo que parece ser un universo de relaciones sanas, basadas en el respeto e impregnadas de altos valores, se tambalea cuando una alumna de Alma, Maggie (Ayo Edebiri), acusa a...

title: 함평군, 지역상품권 할인율 확대..."전통시장 활기 기대"
creator: 맹대환 기자
content: [함평=뉴시스]맹대환 기자 = 전남 함평군이 9월부터 모바일 함평사랑상품권 할인율을 20%로 확대하고 구매 한도도 두 배 상향해 지역경제 활성화에 나선다. 함평군은 9월1일부터 11월30일까지 모바일 함평사랑상품권 할인율을 기존 10%에서 20%로 두 배 확대하고, 구매 한도도 월 100만원까지 상향한다고 31일 밝혔다. 다만 지류형 상품권은 월 50만원 한도로 기존과 동일하게 10% 할인 판매를 유지한다. 이번 조치는 정부의 지역화폐 발행 규모 확대 방침에 따른 것으로, 지역 내 소비 촉진을 통해 침수 피해를 입은 지역 소상공인과 전통시장에 활력을 불어넣을 것으로 기대된다. 단 이번 혜택은 인구감소지역 인센티브 5%와 특별재난지역 5% 추가 국비 지원 예산 범위 내에서 진행하므로 예산 소진시 조기 종료될 수 있다. 모바일 상품권은 캐시백 혜택으로 제공한다. 구입시 정액이 출금되지만, 사용시 결제 금액의 20%가 캐시백으로 적립돼 다음 결제시 현금처럼 활용할 수 있다. 캐시백으로 적립된 금액에는 추가 적립이 이뤄지지 않는다. 구매 방법도 간단하다. 모바일 상품권은 '지역상품권 Chak'앱을 내려받아 회원가입 후 간편하게 구매할 수 있고 카드형 상품권은 지정 은행 창구를 방문해 발급받을 수 있다. 군은 할인율이 상향되는 만큼 상품권 통합관리시스템을 통한 구매·환전 이력 등을 상시 모니터링하고, 부정 유통 의심 가맹점이나 환전 과다 대상업소 등에 대해 현장 점검하는 등 부정 유통 단속도...

title: State Highway 50, in Central Hawkes Bay, is closed following a serious crash
content: A one-vehicle incident occurred north of Tiko-kino, just after 12pm. The road is expected to be closed for some time while emergency services are at the scene. Diversions are in the place from Butler, and Whaka-pirau Road.

title: 柴宮小が全国大会へ 福島県合唱コンクール開幕(福島民友新聞)
9개 언어 이곳에서 모두 통역···전남 이민·외국인종합지원센터 활약
creator: 고귀한 기자 go@kyunghyang.com
content: 전남 영암에서 일하는 캄보디아 국적 이주노동자 A씨(30대)는 최근 건강검진에서 즉시 수술이 필요하다는 진단을 받았다. 하지만 왜 수술을 받아야 하는지, 회복 기간은 얼마나 되는지 등 의료진의 설명을 알아듣지 못해 불안이 컸다. A씨는 동료로부터 전남 이민·외국인종합지원센터 콜센터로에 요청하면 통역지원을 받을 수 있다는 정보를 들었다. 전화를 건 A씨는 모국어인 크메르어 통역 지원을 받을 수 있었다. A씨는 “말이 통하지 않아 두려웠는데, 모국어로 설명을 들으니 안심이 됐다. 통역이 없었다면 수술을 결정하기도 어려웠을 것”이라고 말했다. 전남도가 운영 중인 이민·외국인종합지원센터가 외국인 주민의 지역사회 정착을 돕는 핵심 창구로 자리매김하고 있다. 31일 전남도에 따르면 이 센터는 본격적인 운영에 들어간 올해 1월부터 7월까지 총 4379건의 상담을 처리했다. 한 달 평균 600건이 넘는다. 상담은 생활·비자·노동·의료 등 정착과 직결된 분야 전반을 망라한다. 상담 언어도 꾸준히 확대하고 있다. 베트남어, 중국어, 인도네시아어, 캄보디아어, 네팔어 등 총 5개 언어로 운영해오다 7월부터는 태국어, 필리핀어, 우즈베키스탄어, 스리랑카어까지 확대됐다. 언어별로는 베트남어가 1364건(31.1%)으로 가장 많았고, 캄보디아어 537건(12.3%), 인도네시아어 448건(10.2%)가 뒤를 이었다. 센터는 외국인들의 접근성 강화를 위해 운영 시간도 확대했다. 평일은 오전 9시부터 오후 6시까지 문을 열고, 월·수요일은...

title: 'No excuse about what happened': Kalen Deboer on Alabama's stunning, season-opening loss to FSU
creator: WVTM
content: The Crimson Tide lost four times on the road last season. If Kalen DeBoer hopes to lead them back to the playoffs and resolidify the Alabama Standard, he's going to have to majorly course correct from Saturday's stunning loss to the Seminoles. "I choose to believe we got a good football team," said DeBoer after the 31-17 defeat, the Tide's first in a season opener since 2001. "But, you know, we can't play on our heels like, we're not going to be what we think we can be, what we want to be, if that's the case." "There's no excuse about what happened," he continued. "We stepped on the football field. They stepped on the football field. And we got to play ball. We got to play our our style of ball. And, you know last year isn't this year and it's going to be an uphill climb for us, but you can't think of it in the big scope of things." The game marked Ty Simpson's debut as Alabama's starting quarterback. The redshirt junior was good for 23 of 43 passes for 254 yards and two touchdowns. >> FOLLOW YOUR TEAMS: Sports coverage from WVTM 13 "He's got to just trust his reads and just cut it loose sometimes," said DeBoer of his performance. "Just let it fly." "He's giving everything he has," he continued. "But, you know, it's where, you know, I know he's in the locker room wanting and wishing that there were some things he would have done differently. But there are other guys, too. So, we got to catch the ball for him once in a while." Next up, the Tide hosts Louisiana-Monroe on Sept....

title: Paloma Valencia respondió a Petro tras críticas por reforma pensional: “Mediocre en todo”
creator: Licsa Gómez
content: La reforma pensional impulsada por el presidente Gustavo Petro ha generado un debate político y judicial en Colombia debido a cuestionamientos sobre su legalidad y su impacto en la población joven y adulta mayor. Diferentes sectores han señalado presuntas irregularidades en el trámite legislativo; de hecho, su estudio está en manos de la Corte Constitucional por este motivo. Sin embargo, el Ejecutivo defiende el proyecto como una medida para garantizar pensiones universales y fortalecer la protección social.Ahora puede seguirnos en Facebook y en nuestro WhatsApp ChannelEl viernes 29 de agosto, Petro lanzó críticas a Valencia en X, señalando: “Una senadora del uribismo ha demandado la reforma pensional. ¿Qué tienen contra la juventud pobre, qué tienen contra la vejez pobre? Ya sé: el ahorro de los trabajadores colombianos lo usan en el exterior para invertir en empresas que hacen bombas para asesinar bebés en Gaza”.En respuesta, la senadora del Centro Democrático replicó al día siguiente: “¿Qué tiene Gustavo Petro contra los niños y jóvenes que los pone a pagar su irresponsable reforma pensional? Volver al sistema pensional de reparto ahora que Colombia ya no está siquiera reponiendo población muestra que Petro odia a los niños y a la juventud, ¿Es Petro la reencarnación de Herodes?"Y agregó: “Esta es la manera como este presidente lleva la controversia: sembrando odio al ser incapaz de debatir. Señalando con mentiras y mala intención. Mediocre en...

title: Gobierno peruano rechaza declaraciones de la presidenta de México sobre Pedro Castillo
creator: Redacción Trome
content: El gobierno peruano rechazó categóricamente las declaraciones de la presidenta de México, Claudia Sheinbaum, quien un día antes había dicho que el expresidente Pedro Castillo Terrones (hoy recluido en el penal de Barbadillo) era objeto de una persecución política. Mira también: Lorena Trelles y Carla Harada se confiesan con Trome: “Somos menopáusicas y mamacitas” Comas: Detienen a niñera tras muerte de niña de 6 años que cayó de piso 16 Ante estas expresiones, Cancillería emitió un comunicado aclarando que ‘Castillo no es un perseguido político, como falsamente pretende sostener la señora Sheinbaum’, además, recordaron que el 7 de diciembre del 2022, pretendió la disolución inconstitucional del Congreso. El pronunciamiento precisa que las afirmaciones de la mandataria azteca ‘constituyen una violación a los principios fundamentales de la Carta de la Organización de Estados Americanos (OEA) y muestran un desconocimiento sobre la realidad política y jurídica del Perú’. “La situación jurídica del ciudadano Castillo obedece a decisiones adoptadas en el marco del Estado de derecho, con pleno respeto al debido proceso y a las garantías consagradas en la Constitución Política del Perú“ , precisó el comunicado. Comunicado de Cancillería. title: Viral video: ట్రాక్ట‌ర్లతో యువ‌కుల విన్యాసాలు.. కట్‌చేస్తే.. పోలీస్‌ స్టేషన్‌లో ఇలా..
creator: Jyothi Gadda
content: ఉత్త‌రప్ర‌దేశ్‌లో ప‌లువురు యువ‌కులు అత్యంత ప్ర‌మాద‌క‌రంగా ట్రాక్ట‌ర్ల‌తో విన్యాసాలు చేస్తూ రీల్స్ చేశారు. నవాబ్‌గంజ్ పోలీస్ స్టేషన్ ప్రాంతంలో రెండు ట్రాక్టర్ల ప్రమాదకరమైన స్టంట్ వెలుగులోకి వచ్చింది. ఫ‌రూఖాబాద్‌లో కొందరు యువ‌కులు రెండు ట్రాక్ట‌ర్ల‌ను తాళ్ల‌తో క‌ట్టి విన్యాసాలు చేశారు. ఇందుకు సంబంధించిన వీడియో సోషల్ మీడియాలో వైరల్‌గా మారింది. వీడియోలో రెండు ట్రాక్టర్లను తాడుతో కట్టి రోడ్డుపైకి లాగుతున్న యువకుల విన్యాసాల అందరినీ షాక్‌కు గురి చేశాయి. ఈ సంఘటన నవాబ్‌గంజ్‌లోని దునాయ రోడ్డుపై చోటు చేసుకుంది. స్థానిక వర్గాల సమాచారం ప్రకారం, ఈ ప్రదేశంలో యువకులు తరచుగా ట్రాక్టర్లతో విన్యాసాలు చేస్తారు. వీడియోలో కనిపిస్తున్న ట్రాక్టర్ నగరంలోని మొహల్లా నివాసికి చెందినది. అతని సోషల్ మీడియా ఖాతాలో ఇలాంటి అనేక స్టంట్ వీడియోలు ఉన్నాయి. వీడియో ఇక్కడ చూడండి.. ప్రస్తుతం వైరల్‌గా మారిన ఈ వీడియోలో ర‌హ‌దారిపై రెండు వేర్వేరు కంపెనీల‌కు చెందిన ట్రాక్ట‌ర్ల హార్స్‌ప‌వ‌ర్‌ను ప‌రీక్షిస్తూ వీడియో తీశారు. ఈ వీడియో నెట్టింట వైర‌ల్ కావడంతో న‌వాబ్‌గంజ్ పోలీసులు స‌ద‌రు యువ‌కుల‌పై రోడ్డు భ‌ద్ర‌తా చ‌ట్టం కింద కేసు న‌మోదు చేశారు. ఒక ట్రాక్టర్‌ను స్వాధీనం చేసుకున్నారు. నిందితులపై చట్టపరమైన చర్యలు తీసుకుంటామని మొహమ్మదాబాద్ ఏరియా అధికారి అజయ్ బర్మా తెలిపారు. మరిన్ని ట్రెండింగ్ న్యూస్ కోసం క్లిక్ చేయండి..

title: 1일부터 저축은행도 예금 보호한도 1억된다
creator: 매일경제
content: 예금자 보호한도가 9월1일부터 5000만원에서 1억원으로 올라간다. 예보 한도가 올라가는 것은 24년 만이다. 시중은행은 물론 저축은행·농협·새마을금고 같은 금융회사가 파산할 때 고객이 맡긴 돈을 지켜주는 범위가 1억원까지 늘어나는 것이다. 31일 금융위원회에 따르면 예금자보호법령 등 시행령 개정에 따라 9월부터 바뀐 제도가 시행된다. 예금보호 안전망이 넓어지며 개인 자산 전략에도 일대 변화가 예상된다. 달라지는 내용을 문답 형식으로 풀어봤다. - 1억원까지 보호받는 상품은. ▶시중은행, 저축은행, 농협·수협·신협·산림조합·새마을금고을 비롯한 상호금융권 정기 예적금 등이다. 증권사 예탁금, 보험사 보험계약도 보호한도가 올라간다. 다만 우체국예금은 예금자보호법 적용 대상은 아니다. 국가가 운영하는 기관인 만큼 우체국예금은 전액을 보호하도록 되어 있다. - 보호 받지 못하는 상품은. ▶뮤추얼펀드, 머니마켓펀드(MMF), 양도성예금증서(CD), 확정급여형 퇴직연금 적립금, 후순위 채권은 대상이 아니다. 국내 금융사의 해외 지점에 예치한 예금도 마찬가지다. 상품 가입 시 예금자보호 제외 조건에 해당하지 않는지 꼼꼼한 확인할 필요가 있다. - 저축은행 예금 3개를 갖고 있다면 얼마나 보호받다. ▶A저축은행에 각각 3000만원, 4000만원, 5000만원 등 1억2000만원 규모로 3개의 예금에 가입했다면 A은행이 파산했을 때 앞으로 1억원까지 보호받을 수 있다. 나머지 2000만원은 보호 대상이 아니다. 금융회사가...

title: Erzgebirgskrimi auf ZDF: Lara Mandoki über ihr Ende der Success -Serie | Unterhaltung
creator: Bernard Bernard
content: München – Es ist ein Abschied von der Rate. Am Samstag untersucht Lara Mandoki Karina Szabo erneut in den Erzgebirgen. Aber im Juli war es bereits bekannt, dass es aus der erfolgreichen ZDF Crime -Serie herauskommen wird. Bei der Bild sagt sie, welche Gründe wirklich zu dieser Entscheidung geführt haben. Wenn im neuen Fall „über die Grenze“ ihre Kollegin Winkler (gespielt von Kai Scheve, 59) verschwindet, geht Lara Mandoki als Kommissar Szabo an ihre Grenzen. „Ich habe es wirklich genossen zu filmen und war eine Herausforderung“, sagt die Schauspielerin von Bild. Im Fall „über die Grenze“ (Samstag, 20.15 Uhr, ZDF), Karina Szabo (Lara Mandoki) mit Forester Saskia Bergelt (Teresa Weißbach, 44, rechts) für ihre vermisste Kollegin. Es wird ein Rennen gegen die ZeitFoto: ZDF/CONRAD -LOBSTMandoki ermittelt bis 2026Trotzdem ist klar: Sie wird nächstes Jahr in zwei Filmen gezeigt, dann die “Erzgebirgskrimi „. Die letzte Folge mit ihr wurde bereits ausgeschaltet. „Wir gingen gut auseinander und der letzte Tag des Schießens war sehr traurig, wir haben alle geweint. Es fühlt sich an, als wäre ich zu Hause ausgezogen. Sowohl die Produktion als auch meine Kollegen werden immer meine Familie bleiben“, sagte die Münchenfrau.Lara Mandoki ist derzeit eine der gefragtesten Schauspielerinnen im Fernsehen. Am Dienstag ist sie in „Miss Merkel-A Cruise Thriller“ (RTL, 20.15 Uhr) und am 28. September im ZDF-Sonntagsfilm „Petra Goes Baden“ (20.15 Uhr) zu sehen.Foto: Sophie WainnerZDF...

title: 抗戰勝利80周年|東江縱隊後人受先輩薰陶 不同方式為國貢獻
creator: auto_generator
content: 在1943年抗戰期間成立的廣東人民抗日游擊隊東江縱隊,是當時中共在華南敵後戰場的主力部隊。有東江縱隊的後人不忘先輩奉獻精神,以不同方式繼續貢獻國家,亦期望年輕一代更好了解歷史,珍惜來之不易的幸福生活。 王衛平的父親王國華,曾經在東江縱隊司令部的電台工作,負責部隊以及跟延安黨中央之間的聯繫,確保情報傳遞及時和準確。他形容當時電台工作極之重要,部隊一旦失去聯繫就如同失明,對調動部署發揮關鍵作用。 王衛平現時為東莞市東江縱隊歷史研究會副秘書長,向包括學生等社會大眾講述父輩故事。他期望年輕人多了解當年抗戰歷史,激發他們愛國熱情,珍惜來之不易的幸福生活。他認為東江縱隊精神是跨時空的「活態基因」,其愛國團結堅韌的特質,為當代人提供應對挑戰的「精神坐標」。 有後人以口述歷史傳承英烈事跡,亦有人身體力行學習前人為國貢獻。同樣是東江縱隊後人的盧運柏、盧光華及盧國新,年輕時選擇跟隨先輩步伐參軍報國。 盧光華說,自幼經常聽到父親憶述當年抗戰故事,深明戰爭的殘酷,但為了保家衛國,長大後毅然決定參軍。他認為父輩在抗日戰爭中流血貢獻,他們作為後輩亦應為國家建設作出貢獻。 他的戰友盧運柏就在廣州黃埔組建「東縱精神傳承連」,與其他退役軍人投身扶貧幫困、社會治安、交通協調等志願服務,繼續貢獻國家。
