title: Πήγαν στο γάμο με 17 φορτηγά και ξεσήκωσαν το Αλιβέρι
creator: in.gr
content: Ένας διαφορετικός με... φορτηγά στην αυτοκινητοπομπή προς και από την εκκλησία έγινε το απόγευμα του Σαββάτου 30 Αυγούστου στην Εύβοια και συγκεκριμένα στο . Ο γαμπρός είναι γιος γνωστής οικογενείας με φορτηγά στο Αλιβέρι στην Εύβοια και στόλισε τα 17 φορτηγά της εταιρείας και τον συνόδευσαν στον γάμο. Τα φορτηγά άναψαν τους προβολείς και με συνεχή κορναρίσματα συνόδευσαν τον γαμπρό στην πιο ευτυχισμένη ημέρα της ζωής του. Όπως αναφέρει το evima ξεσήκωσαν το Αλιβέρι με τα κορναρίσματα και ακολούθησαν την πορεία από τον περιφερειακό δρόμο της πόλης προς το ξωκλήσι στην Κακιά Σκάλα. Έφτασαν στο πανέμορφο ξωκλήσι στην Κακιά Σκάλα με την πομπή των στολισμένων φορτηγών να εντυπωσιάζει τους καλεσμένους και τελέστηκε το μυστήριο του γάμου. Σίγουρα, τόσο ο γαμπρός και η νύφη, αλλά και όλη η περιοχή θα έχει να θυμάται αυτή τη μέρα για πολλά χρόνια!

title: 63岁比利时骑手跨越欧亚万里、骑行4个多月抵达上海
creator: chinanews
content: 中新网 上海8月31日电 (李佳佳 陈卓妍)63岁的比利时骑手克劳德·布鲁尔(Claude Brouir)30日骑着太阳能助力自行车抵达上海,受到此间各界的热烈欢迎。 从比利时布鲁塞尔出发,这位骑行爱好者横跨欧亚大陆1.2万公里,历时4个多月,成功抵达上海这座他心中“开放而充满活力的东方都市”,并在这里和他的家人团聚。 今年4月,布鲁尔从布鲁塞尔城市文化地标五十周年纪念公园出发,骑着太阳能助力自行车开启跨国骑行。在120余天的行程中,他穿越欧亚大陆的平原与山川,始终秉持环保理念,以实际行动践行“骑行连接世界”的愿景。在这一段骑行的历程中,他遇到了许多友善的人们。人与人之间温暖的连接,成为他坚持下去的动力之一。 他在当天上海官方为其举办的欢迎仪式上分享了旅途中的珍贵记忆,一路骑行中他不仅领略了中国丰富的自然与人文风貌,更收获了沿途民众的善意帮助。“旅途中我并不总是一个人,我遇到很多中国骑行的伙伴,结交到很多新的朋友。所以这段旅程对我来说很轻松,因为当我在餐厅里不会点单,当我在途中找不到路的时候,他们都在。”布鲁尔说。 布鲁尔说:“中国给他最大的震撼就是一直在变化,永远在变化。”上海的繁华景象与热烈氛围,更让他深刻感受到,此次骑行的终点,亦是两地深化交流的新起点。 上海市文化和旅游局副局长金雷在欢迎致辞时表示,今年是中欧建交50周年,明年恰逢中比建交55周年。站在这一新的历史起点上,上海将一如既往地欢迎和布鲁尔一样的比利时、欧洲友好人士来到中国、乐游上海,共同搭建联通中欧两地的交流桥梁。 比利时驻上海总领事布凡也来到现场,欢迎布鲁尔来到上海。近年来,比利时和中国在文化、旅游领域交流频繁,此次骑行活动不仅连接两座城市,更为两国友好合作增添了新的故事,充分展现了民间交流的无限可能。 当天的仪式结束后,布鲁尔继续其在上海的行程,他骑乘太阳能助力自行车搭乘东复线轮渡横渡黄浦江,随后前往百年老字号童涵春堂体验中医诊疗,进一步感受上海的城市文化与特色服务。 布鲁尔此次骑行之旅,选用太阳能助力车践行可持续旅行理念,以绿色出行搭建起地域间的环保纽带;同时也为上海入境旅游发展提供了生动案例——通过骑行视角深入探索城市地标与文化内涵,向海外展示了上海作为重要旅游目的地的开放形象与独特魅力。(完)

title: サッカー=トットナムが今季初黒星、新加入の高井はベンチ外
creator: ロイター編集
content: [ロンドン 30日 ロイター] - サッカーのイングランド・プレミアリーグは30日、各地で試合を行い、トットナムはホームでボーンマスに0─1で敗れて今季初黒星を喫した。 トットナムはトーマス・フランク新監督の下で開幕2連勝と好スタートを切っていたが、この日は前半5分に先制ゴールを献上。ボーンマスのブラジル人FWエバニウソンのシュートがクリスティアン・ロメロに当たり、GKグリエルモ・ビカリオが止められなかった。 トットナムはシュート数で相手の20本に対し、わずか5本にとどまり、枠内シュートは1本のみだった。今季加入した高井幸大はベンチ外だった。 リーズはニューカッスルとスコアレスドローに終わった。リーズの田中碧は膝の内側側副靱帯のけがで離脱している。 この他、チェルシーはフラムに2─0で勝利。マンチェスター・ユナイテッドはバーンリーに3─2で競り勝ち、今季初勝利を挙げた。サンダーランドはブレントフォードを2─1で下し、エバートンはウルバーハンプトンを3─2で退けた。

title: Pronóstico del clima en Barcelona este 31 de agosto: temperatura, lluvias y viento
creator: Infobae Noticias
content: Más allá de consultar el pronóstico del clima para saber qué vestir o si cargar o no con un paraguas, el reporte meteorológico es un instrumento que se se ha convertido en algo fundamental para diversos sectores como el del transporte (por cielo, mar y tierra), la agricultura, el turismo, la prevención de desastres, la salud pública y hasta para llevar a cabo operaciones militares . Pero si de por sí predecir el estado del tiempo podría resultar complejo a ello se le suma otra variante: el calentamiento global, que ha hecho aún más urgente la necesidad de mantenerse al tanto para poder actuar y adoptar políticas públicas que reduzcan los riesgos de desastres como alertas sobre inundaciones, sequías, olas gélidas, un mal aterrizaje y otros fenómenos relacionados. En este contexto, aquí el reporte meteorológico para las próximas horas en Barcelona este domingo: El tiempo para este domingo en Barcelona alcanzará los 29 grados, mientras que la temperatura mínima será de 20 grados. El pronóstico de los niveles de los rayos ultravioleta es de 7. En cuanto a la lluvia, la probabilidad de precipitaciones para dicha ciudad será del 7%, con una nubosidad del 46%, durante el día; y del 55%, con una nubosidad del 82%, a lo largo de la noche. En tanto, las ráfagas de viento llegarán a los 33 kilómetros por hora en el día y los 32 kilómetros por hora por la noche. Barcelona se ubica al noreste de España, en la costa mediterránea de la península ibérica,...

title: 美, 중국 장비 수출 강화...삼성·SK하닉 사업 영향은?
creator: 동아일보
content: 美, 삼성·SK VEU 명단서 제외 삼성·SK, 中 첨단공정 전환 차질 우려 c뉴시스 미국 트럼프 정부가 중국 공장에 대한 미국산 장비 반입 규제를 강화하면서 중국에 진출해있는 한국 반도체 기업들도 영향이 불가피할 전망이다. 31일 미국 연방관보 및 업계에 따르면 미국 상무부는 삼성전자와 SK하이닉스, 인텔 등 주요 반도체 기업들이 중국 내 공장에 미국산 반도체 장비를 반입할 경우 개별 허가를 받아야 한다고 밝혔다. 이 조치는 관보 게시일(29일)로부터 120일 후부터 적용될 예정이다. 이에 따라 삼성전자와 SK하이닉스는 앞으로 중국 내 공장에 장비를 반입할 때마다 미국 정부의 사전 승인을 받아야 한다. 지난 2022년 당시 미국 조 바이든 정부는 미국의 반도체 기술 유출을 막기 위해, 중국에서 공장을 운영하는 반도체 기업들을 대상으로 건별로 허가를 받는 규정을 도입했다. 다만 ‘검증된 최종 사용자(VEU)’ 자격이 있는 기업들은 미국의 별도 허가 없이 미국산 장비를 중국으로 들여올 수 있었다. 삼성전자와 SK하이닉스는 이 VEU 자격을 갖고 있어 허가 절차나 기간 제한 없이 미국산 장비를 중국 공장에 공급했지만, 이번에 미국 정부가 VEU 명단에서 양사를 제외하면서 이제는 장비 반입 때마다 허가를 받아야 한다. 업계에서는 이 규제로 양사가 장비 도입 지연 뿐 아니라, 첨단 공정 전환과 기술 업그레이드에도 적지 않은 차질이 발생할 수 있다고 우려한다. 현재 삼성전자는 중국 시안과 쑤저우에서 각각 낸드플래시,...

title: "스토킹·교제폭력 피해자 보호" 경기도, 민간경호 지원
creator: 이병희 기자
content: [수원=뉴시스] 이병희 기자 = 경기도와 경기도여성가족재단 젠더폭력통합대응단이 스토킹·교제폭력 피해자를 위해 올해부터 민간경호 지원을 시범 도입한다. 31일 경기도, 경기도여성가족재단에 따르면 경기도와 대응단은 스토킹·교제폭력 피해자에 대한 상담·법률·의료 지원뿐 아니라 피해자의 안전과 일상 회복을 돕기 위해 안심주거 지원과 경기도형 긴급안전지원을 운영 중이다. 다음 달부터는 경찰력만으로는 한계가 있는 피해자 보호를 위해 민간경호 지원을 시범 도입한다. 피해자의 출퇴근·외출 시 안전을 보장하기 위한 조치로, 경찰청 협의와 전문가 심의위원회를 거쳐 꼭 필요한 대상자를 지원할 예정이다. 민간경호는 경찰청과 서울시가 2023년부터 시범사업으로 시작해 현재까지 운영해온 사업이다. 경기도는 예산 3000만원 규모로 지원을 시작해 기존 제도의 사각지대를 보완하고 피해자 맞춤형으로 지원을 추진한다는 방침이다. 현재 도는 ▲이사비 지원 ▲자동차 번호 변경 ▲폐쇄회로(CC)TV 설치·보안 물품 제공 등 긴급안전지원을 통해 피해자가 가해자의 추적에서 벗어나 안전하게 생활할 수 있도록 돕는다. 또 장애인이거나 어린 자녀가 있는 피해자에게 심리상담, 병원 치료, 경찰 조사·재판 출석 지원과 같은 긴급 돌봄도 제공하고 있다. 김진효 경기도 여성정책과장은 "스토킹·교제폭력은 반복되기 쉬운 범죄인 만큼 피해자가 두려움 없이 생활할 수 있도록 '경기도형 긴급안전지원'과 연계해 촘촘한 지원체계를 마련해...

title: John Mateer sets record in Oklahoma debut, leading No. 18 Sooners to 35-3 win over Illinois State
creator: CLIFF BRUNT - AP Sports Writer
content: NORMAN, Okla. (AP) — John Mateer passed for 392 yards and three touchdowns in a record-setting first game at Oklahoma, and the 18th-ranked Sooners beat Illinois State 35-3 on Saturday night. Mateer, a transfer from Washington State, set the school record for most yards passing in an Oklahoma debut, surpassing Baker Mayfield's 388 yards against Akron in 2015. Keontez Lewis, a transfer from Southern Illinois, had nine catches for 119 yards and two touchdowns for Oklahoma. Jaren Kanak, a converted linebacker, had five catches for 90 yards. Deion Burks added seven catches for 88 yards and a score for Oklahoma, which gained 495 yards in Ben Arbuckle's first game as offensive coordinator. The Sooners allowed just 151 total yards, including 34 yards passing, with head coach Brent Venables as the defensive play-caller. He took over after his previous play-caller, Zac Alley, left to become defensive coordinator at West Virginia. Wright Wenkers had 50 yards on seven carries for Illinois State. The FCS Redbirds' only points came on a field goal after Mateer threw an interception deep in his team's territory in the third quarter. Illinois State: The Redbirds were solid — they didn't turn the ball over and didn't get blown out too badly. They were a playoff team last season, and they appear capable of getting there again. Oklahoma: The Sooners moved the ball, but they gained just 103 yards rushing on 32 carries. That will need to improve against a rugged schedule. Illinois State: Hosts...

title: 보훈부, 9월의 독립운동에 '한국광복군 창설' 선정
creator: 남빛나라 기자
content: [서울=뉴시스] 남빛나라 기자 = 국가보훈부는 '한국광복군 창설'을 '2025년 9월의 독립운동'으로 선정했다고 31일 밝혔다. 한국광복군은 1940년 9월 17일 충칭에서 대한민국임시정부의 정규군으로 창설됐다. 광복군은 창설 초기 수십 명에 불과했지만, 국내·외 동포들의 지원과 광복군의 적극적인 병력 모집·선전 활동을 통해 1945년 광복 직전에는 1000여 명 규모의 정규군으로 성장했다. 광복군은 일본군에 소속된 한인 병사와 적 후방의 한인 청년을 포섭하는 초모공작을 전개했다. 특히 이들에 대한 교육과 훈련, 적군에 대한 정보 수집과 교란 등을 진행했다. 충칭방송국과 기관지 '광복'을 통해 국내외 동포에게 독립운동의 당위성을 알리고, 국제사회의 관심과 지지를 이끌어내는 역할도 했다. 광복군은 1943년 인도-버마 전선에 '인면전구공작대'를 파견해 영국군과 함께 일본군을 상대로 작전에 참가했으며, 1944년 초 임팔 전투에서 큰 활약을 했다. 1945년에는 버마 총반격전에도 참여하는 등 2년 간에 걸쳐 대일작전에 참여했다. 1945년에는 미국 전략첩보국(OSS)과 합작해 한반도 침투를 위한 국내진입 작전을 준비했다. 선발된 광복군 대원 50명은 일본의 항복으로 실전에 투입되지는 못했다. 보훈부는 "광복군은 일제를 상대로 독립전쟁을 전개했던 임시정부의 정규군으로, 연합군과의 연대를 통해 국제적 지위를 확보하고자 했다"며 "조국의 독립을 위한 자주적 독립의지로...

title: Desigualdades planeadas
creator: Opinião
content: Por: Nuno Flores* Em 2019, quando a Iniciativa Outros Bairros (IOB) arrancou no Mindelo, era sabido que a cidade perdera o monopólio da urbanização. Enquanto discursos políticos perseguiam e criminalizavam cidadãos que ocupavam míseros m2 de chão para exercerem um direito constitucionalmente estabelecido – o direito à habitação digna e à infraestrutura – na IOB propúnhamos refletir sobre como o planeamento, através de leis, regras de uso e da ocupação do solo ou do investimento pode produzir desigualdade, concentrar a renda e excluir. Esse quadro político configura-se como um desafio para o grupo de arquitetos e investigadores da IOB – Nuno Flores, Ângelo Lopes, Jakob Kling, Erickson Fortes e Rita Rainho (I2ADS – Universidade do Porto) – dentro do Ministério das Infraestruturas, Ordenamento do Território e Habitação (MIOTH). A cidade já não era um objeto claramente definido, passou a integrar um gigantesco processo de urbanização de escala planetária, exigindo repensar as muitas e contraditórias formas de construção social do território. Cabo Verde não escapa a essas contradições, como imaginário universal do urbano, igualmente bloqueando reflexões sobre outras formas de estruturar e construir ações relacionais no território. No caso do Mindelo, o imaginário da cidade continua preso ao modelo colonial, uma cidade impositiva e segregadora. A insistência dos decisores locais e centrais em reproduzir este modelo de cidade confronta-se com...

title: 금융기술 '스타트업' 성장 불지핀다... '부산 핀테크허브' 입주기업 3차 모집
creator: asiae_daily
content: 부산이 금융기술 분야를 이름하는 이른바 '핀테크'의 혁신 거점 도약을 위해 다시 한번 스타트업 문을 연다. 핀테크 기업 집적지인 '부산 핀테크 허브'가 새 입주기업을 찾는다. 부산시는 9월 1일부터 17일까지 3차 모집을 진행해 9개 유망 기업을 선발한다는 계획이다. '부산 핀테크 허브'는 금융기술 산업의 다양성과 기업 성장을 뒷받침하기 위해 시가 조성한 육성 플랫폼이다. BIFC 11~15층의 '유니콘-스페이스'와 부산상공회의소 3층의 '스타-스페이스' 두 곳에서 운영되며 현재 42개사가 입주해 있다. 단순한 사무공간을 넘어 사업화 자금, 맞춤형 프로그램, 네트워크 확장을 지원하면서 입주기업들의 매출 증대와 투자 유치 성과를 이끌어왔다. 시는 앞서 2차례 모집에서 9개사를 선발했고 이번 3차 모집으로 기술력과 성장 가능성을 갖춘 신생기업 9곳을 추가해 핀테크 생태계를 확장키로 했다. 모집 대상은 창업 7년 이내 IT·데이터 기반 스타트업으로 핀테크·디지털 전환·데이터 기반 사업모델을 보유하면 지원할 수 있다. 이곳의 성과는 이미 수치로 입증됐다. 2019년 개소 이후 누적 입주기업은 97개사에 달했고 이 가운데 31%가 입주 후 매출을 10배 이상 끌어올렸다. 입주 기업의 누적 투융자 규모도 2020년 40억원에서 2024년 말 712억원으로 불어났다. 개별 사례도 눈에 띈다. 2022년 입주한 (주)팜코브는 리퍼브 거래 플랫폼을 테크핀 사업으로 전환해 매출을 10배 늘렸고 같은 해 입주한 (주)에스비엑스지는 이스포츠 기반 핀테크 서비스로 지난해...

title: Qué ver esta noche en Disney+ Colombia
creator: Infobae Noticias
content: Para los amantes de la televisión nunca había sido tan fácil el tener acceso a un amplio catálogo de series con el surgimiento de las plataformas por streaming, aunque surge un inconveniente: entre tanta variedad de títulos y géneros que hay en el nuevo milenio ya no es nada sencillo encontrar la próxima producción para ver.Sin embargo, pensando en estos nuevos retos, Disney+ ofrece a sus suscriptores una lista con sus obras más populares, de modo que sea más fácil elegir.Distintos géneros, todos con historias apasionantes para pasar muchas horas frente a la pantalla, en un maratón o en los ratos libres.Las producciones más populares de Disney+ Colombia1. ThunderboltsUn grupo de supervillanos y antihéroes van en misiones para el gobierno. Basado en la serie de cómics del mismo nombre.2. Alien: Planeta Tierra (Alien: Earth)Cuando una misteriosa nave se estrella contra la Tierra, una joven y un variopinto grupo de soldados tácticos hacen un fatídico hallazgo que los pone cara a cara con la mayor amenaza del planeta. El equipo de rescate busca supervivientes entre los restos de la colisión y se topa con una forma de vida depredadora que levanta más misterios y miedos de los que cabría imaginarse. Debido a esta nueva amenaza, el equipo deberá luchar por sobrevivir. Lo que decidan hacer con este descubrimiento podría cambiar el planeta Tierra tal y como lo conocen.3. title: Highlights, Photos and Notes: Louisville 51, Eastern Kentucky 17
creator: Matthew McGavic
content: LOUISVILLE, Ky. - Year three of the Jeff Brohm era of the Louisville football program is off and running, with the Cardinals easily taking down in-state FCS foe Eastern Kentucky, 51-17, to kick off their 2025 season. The Atlantic Coast Conference put together a highlight tape of the matchup, which you can see here: Team Notes: Louisville improves to 21-8-1 in the all-time series vs. Eastern Kentucky, including 14-4-1 in Louisville and 5-0 at L&N Stadium. Louisville improves to 59-42-6 in season openers, including 38-18-3 at home and 14-5 at L&N Stadium. The Cardinals amass 542 yards of offense, the sixth highest total in a season opener. Louisville improves to 38-7 vs. FCS teams, including a 26-game winning streak. Louisville scores a touchdown on its opening drive of the season for the first time since Jawon Pass ran for an 8-yard score vs. Notre Dame on Sept. 2, 2019. Louisville allows only 150 yards of offense, holding the Colonels to 74 yards rushing and 76 yards passing. Louisville quarterbacks complete passes to 13 different receivers. Jeff Brohm becomes the first Louisville coach to win his first three season openers since Bobby Petrino won his first five from 2003 to 2006 and 2014. Louisville scores at least 30 points for the 12th time in 14 home games under Brohm. Brohm improves to 20-8 at Louisville and 86-52 overall. Player Notes: QB Miller Moss made his Louisville debut with 17-of-25 passing for 223 yards, 1 touchdown, 2 interceptions, and an 8-yard rushing TD,...

title: 'I've always thrived on variety': Ben Lee on finding balance in life
creator: Daniel Johnson
content: As a touring musician, producer, DJ, podcaster, father and husband, Ben Lee is no stranger to multitasking. Since entering the public consciousness at 14 with his band Noise Addict, he has released 15 solo albums, acted alongside Rose Byrne and undertaken numerous explorations into alternative spirituality. He now hosts the podcast Weirder Together with his wife, actor and author Ione Skye and is about to embark on a national tour to mark the 20th anniversary of his double platinum album Awake is the New Sleep. After spending much of the past three decades in the United States, last year he moved back to Australia with Skye, their teenage daughter, Goldie, and stepdaughter Kate. Ben Lee and his wife, actor and author Ione Skye, host the podcast Weirder Together. "I feel like, as artists, we have to somewhat go with the flow of life, where the work is, where the energy is, and it does feel like an amazing time to be in Sydney, creatively," Lee says. They live on the traditional lands of the Gadigal and Birrabirragal people with their dog, Gus. Ben shares how he finds balance in a busy life. A typical day for me involves... I get up early. I have a teenager, so I pack her some lunch and get her off to school. I'm enjoying exercising, I feel like late 40s is the right time, so I'm working out, doing Pilates. I've always really thrived on variety, so I always have a lot of different projects and different collaborations and different things happening. At the moment, it's quite...

title: Janhvi Kapoor: ‘ముగ్గురు పిల్లలను కనాలని ఉంది’.. ఈ నెంబర్ వెనక ఆసక్తికర విషయం చెప్పిన జాన్వీ కపూర్
creator: Basha Shek
content: ప్రస్తుతం పెళ్లి చేసుకున్నవారు ఒకరు లేదా ఇద్దరు పిల్లలు చాలు అంటున్నారు. అంతకు మించి అసలు ఆలోచనే లేదంటున్నారు. అయితే బాలీవుడ్ అందాల తార జాన్వీ కపూర్ మాత్రం చాలా డిఫరెంట్ గా ఆలోచిస్తోంది. శ్రీదేవి నట వారసురాలిగా ధడక్ సినిమా తో హీరోయిన్ గా బాలీవుడ్ ఇండస్ట్రీకి పరిచయమైంది జాన్వీ. ఆ తర్వాత పలు సూపర్ హిట్ సినిమాలతో తల్లికి తగ్గ తనయ అనిపించుకుంటోంది. ఎన్టీఆర్ తో కలిసి దేవర సినిమాతో తెలుగు ఆడియెన్స్ ను కూడా పలకరించిందీ అందాల తార. ప్రస్తుతం గ్లోబల్ స్టార్ రామ్ చరణ్ తో కలిసి పెద్ది అనే సినిమాలో నటిస్తోంది. కాగా జాన్వీ నటించిన లేటెస్ట్ సినిమా పరం సుంది. సిద్దార్థ్ మల్హోత్రా ఇందులో హీరోగా నటించాడు. ఆగస్టు 29వ తేదీన థియేటర్లలో రిలీజైన ఈ సినిమాకు పాజిటివ్ టాక్ సొంతం చేసుకుంది. తాజాగా ఈ సినిమా ప్రమోషన్లలో పాల్గొన్న ఆమె తన పర్సనల్ అండ్ ప్రొఫెషనల్ లైఫ్ గురించి పలు ఆసక్తికర విషయాలు పంచుకుంది. ఇదే సందర్భంగా తన పెళ్లి, పిల్లల గురించి ఇంట్రెస్టింగ్ కామెంట్స్ చేసింది. ప్రస్తుతం ఈ వ్యాఖ్యలు నెట్టింట వైరలవుతున్నాయి.‘నేను పెళ్లి చేసుకున్న తరువాత ముగ్గురు పిల్లలను కనాలని అనుకుంటున్నాను. ఎందుకంటే మూడు నా లక్కీ నంబర్​. అంతేకాదు నా పిల్లల్లో ఇద్దరు గొడవ పడుతున్నప్పుడు, మూడో బిడ్డ వాళ్లలో ఒకరికి సపోర్ట్ గా ఉంటారు. సందర్భాలను బట్టి ఈ సపోర్ట్ మారుతూ ఉంటుంది. ఈ విధంగా నా బిడ్డలందరికీ ఒక తోడు, సపోర్టు దొరుకుతుంది’ అని జాన్వీ చెప్పుకొచ్చింది. కాగా జాన్వీ కపూర్ తన పెళ్లి, భర్త గురించి మాట్లాడటం ఇదే మొదటిసారి కాదు. గతంలో పలుమార్లు ఇదే తరహా కామెంట్స్ చేసి వార్తల్లో నిలిచింది. జాన్వీ కపూర్​ తన భర్త, ముగ్గురు పిల్లలతో కలిసి తిరుపతిలో సెటిల్ అవ్వాలని కోరుకుంటున్నట్లు ఒక సందర్భంలో చెప్పుకొచ్చింది.పరమ్ సుందరి...

title: Lynx clinch top seed in WNBA playoffs, single-season franchise wins record with bounce-back victory over Sun
creator: Yahoo Sports
content: It seemed likely when the Minnesota Lynx darted to a 17-2 start this season. Now it's definite. Head coach Cheryl Reeve's squad will own the top seed in the WNBA playoffs. Minnesota clinched the W's best record this season as well as the franchise's single-season wins record with a 94-70 victory over the recently-surging Connecticut Sun on Saturday, just two days after the Lynx suffered their worst loss of the year. The Sun (10-29), still hovering near the bottom of the league standings despite having won five of its previous seven games, went toe-to-toe with the Lynx (31-8) in the first quarter. But a 16-4 Minnesota run in the second frame began to put its 21-point blown lead and 14-point defeat to the Seattle Storm Thursday in the rear view mirror. Although Connecticut dominated the glass — thanks to 11 offensive rebounds — it struggled to capitalize, shooting only 35.9% from the field in the opening half. The Sun made just one 3 in that span. Meanwhile, the Lynx entered intermission with seven triples. That's nothing new for Minnesota, which came into Saturday with the league's best 3-point percentage. Courtney Williams led the way initially with a trio of first-half triples. She wound up with 15 points, 8 rebounds and 4 assists, masterfully orchestrating offense out of Sun double teams. But when all was said and done, the league's seventh all-time-leading 3-point shooter, Kayla McBride, clocked out with a team-high five 3s. Forward Alanna Smith wasn't far behind with...

title: 국힘 "李 정부, 예산안에 '직장인 점심 할인' 포함...지선용 포퓰리즘"
creator: 한은진 기자
content: [서울=뉴시스]한은진 기자 = 국민의힘은 31일 이재명 정부를 향해 "직장인 점심값을 왜 세금으로 지원하는가. 내년 지방선거용 포퓰리즘일 뿐"이라고 말했다. 최보윤 수석대변인은 이날 논평을 내고 "이재명 정부가 내년 예산안에 '직장인 든든한 한끼'라는 이름으로 79억원을 투입해 직장인 점심값을 깎아주겠다고 밝혔다"며 "인구감소 지역 중소기업 근로자 5만 4000명에게 월 4만 원 한도의 점심 할인 혜택을 준다는 것"이라고 설명했다. 최 수석대변인은 "직장인에게 점심을 싸게 제공하겠다는 발상은 듣기에는 그럴듯해 보일지 몰라도 국민적 반응은 싸늘하기만 하다"며 "정책이 발표되자마자 비판의 목소리가 터져 나오고 있다"고 전했다. 그는 "세금으로 직장인 밥값까지 챙겨야 하느냐는 반발, 도시락을 싸오거나 점심을 거르는 직장인은 배제된다는 불만, 결국 식당 가격 인상으로 밥값만 더 올라갈 것이라는 우려가 잇따르고 있다"며 "무엇보다 일자리조차 없어 끼니 해결이 어려운 청년과 노년층이 많은 현실에서, 굳이 직장인 점심을 세금으로 보조하는 것이 타당하냐는 근본적 의문이 제기되고 있다"고 했다. 그는 "이미 국가채무는 사상 최대 규모로 불어나고 있다. 그럼에도 불구하고 정부가 이런 사업을 밀어붙이는 이유는 뻔하다"며 "밥값을 깎아주겠다는 달콤한 구호로 직장인 표심을 겨냥하려는 것"이라고 주장했다. 이어 "결국 내년 지방선거를 의식한 포퓰리즘, 보여주기식 선심 행정일 뿐"이라고 비판했다. 최...

title: Freak lorry crash claims life of Orang Asli woman, leaves another injured near Simpang Pulai
content: IPOH, Aug 31 — An Orang Asli woman died when she was crushed under a bonded or covered lorry on Jalan Simpang Pulai-Cameron Highlands at Jalan Kampung Pos Slim, near Simpang Pulai, last evening in a freak accident.Perak Fire and Rescue Department (JBPM) acting assistant director of operations Shazlean Mohd Hanafiah said his department received a call at 3.16 pm before a team from the Simpang Pulai Fire and Rescue Station rushed to the scene of the incident, 57 kilometres (km) away.“A bonded lorry skidded and hit a stall. The accident caused a 54-year-old Orang Asli woman to die after being crushed under the lorry,” he said in a statement tonight.“Another 26-year-old Orang Asli woman suffered injuries to her face and legs, while the 47-year-old lorry driver was unhurt.”Shazlean also said the victim was confirmed dead at the scene by medical personnel and handed over to police for further action, adding that the JBPM operation ended at 5.30 pm. — Bernama

title: Lula quer reunião extraordinária dos Brics para negociar nova resposta aos EUA
creator: Augusto de Sousa
content: Lula durante discurso na Cúpula do Brics. Foto: Joédson Alves/Agência BrasilQuase dois meses depois de sediar a cúpula do Brics, no Rio de Janeiro, o governo Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva (PT) prepara um novo movimento no bloco. A Presidência articula a realização de uma reunião extraordinária, em caráter virtual, entre os 11 chefes de Estado do grupo. O objetivo é reagir aos “ataques” contra o multilateralismo e discutir medidas conjuntas diante das recentes tarifas impostas pelos Estados Unidos.A iniciativa partiu do próprio Lula, que considera necessário fortalecer a coordenação política do Brics diante do atual cenário internacional. A missão de articular o encontro foi delegada ao assessor especial da Presidência e ex-ministro das Relações Exteriores, Celso Amorim. Segundo o jornal Valor Econômico, Amorim já conversou nos últimos dias sobre o tema com o chanceler russo, Sergei Lavrov.Na próxima semana, Amorim viajará à China para participar das cerimônias pelos 80 anos da vitória chinesa sobre o Japão na Segunda Guerra Mundial. O evento reunirá diversos líderes, incluindo Vladimir Putin (Rússia), Luong Cuong (Vietnã), Prabowo Subianto (Indonésia) e Anwar Ibrahim (Malásia).Durante a viagem, o diplomata brasileiro deve aproveitar para realizar reuniões bilaterais que reforcem a posição de Lula sobre a importância de uma resposta coordenada ao tarifaço do presidente estadunidense Donald Trump.Líderes dos países membros do Brics....

title: Banpais Y Seguros Del Pais Evolucionan Con Nueva Imagen Institucional
creator: Editor 3
content: Honduras. Como parte de su proceso de evolución institucional, y siendo parte de Corporación Bi desde 2007, Banpaís y Seguros del País presentaron oficialmente su nueva imagen corporativa. Este cambio representa mucho más que una renovación visual: refleja una transformación estratégica, una entidad más ágil y humana, y una reafirmación de su compromiso con Honduras. Banpaís y Seguros del País forman parte de Corporación Bi desde hace 18 años. Esta incorporación le ha permitido robustecer su capacidad operativa, modernizar sus procesos y ampliar su propuesta de valor, manteniendo su identidad hondureña y su cercanía con las comunidades a las que sirve. “Este paso responde a nuestra convicción de evolucionar, anticipando los desafíos del entorno financiero y honrando la confianza de quienes forman parte de nuestra visión: clientes, colaboradores, accionistas y aliados. En Banpaís, entendemos que innovar no es solo transformar una marca; es construir, desde la experiencia, una nueva forma de conectar con las nuevas generaciones”, afirmó la licenciada María del Rosario Selman-Housein, presidenta ejecutiva de Banpaís, quien ha liderado a la institución desde hace más de 20 años y ha dirigido este proceso con visión estratégica y enfoque humano. El nuevo logotipo integra el distintivo “Bi”, símbolo regional de solidez y confianza, junto con el ícono del infinito sobre la letra “i”, que representa acompañamiento constante y posibilidades...

title: Georgia 45, Marshall 7: Bulldogs have a plan for Marshall.
creator: SB Nation
content: Georgia didn’t need to do anything elaborate to take down the Marshall Thundering Herd. And they never set out to. Instead they did the bare basics reasonably well, and it was all Bulldog fans could have dreamed of. The Bulldog offense churned out 488 yards of offense, which was a welcome development. Even more titillating was the balance of 249 yards through the air and 239 yards on the ground.Dwight Phillips had a solid day, with 60 yards rushing in only 5 carries. But it was Gunner Stockton who led all Bulldogs with 73 rushing yards on 10 attempts. Stockton became the first Georgia Bulldogs quarterback to run for multiple touchdowns in a game since Stetson Bennett did so in the 2022 national championship game.While I don’t know that Mike Bobo wants Gunner Stockton to take off as much as he did early in this game, once the meat of the SEC schedule hits it is safe to say that the young quarterback will have put enough on film to keep league coaches up late scheming.The pass protection was a bit iffy at points as well, with Stockton bailing the offensive line out with his legs in a way that Carson Beck rarely was able to. Some of the issues can be pinned on injuries that took down guards Micah Morris and Juan Gaston, as well as taxkle Ernest Greene. Morris was able to return, and Coach Smart was complimentary of Bo Hughlwy’s relief work for Greene. But Gaston went for an MRI, and may be sidelined for awhile. Defensively the Bulldogs looked exactly as you’d expect them to...

title: ಧರ್ಮಸ್ಥಳ ಪ್ರಕರಣದಲ್ಲಿ ಮೌನಮುರಿದ ಪಂಚಪೀಠ ಶ್ರೀಗಳು, ಕಾಣದ 'ಕೈ'ಗಳ ಪಿತೂರಿ, ತಪ್ಪಿತಸ್ಥರಿಗೆ ಕಠಿಣ ಶಿಕ್ಷೆಗೆ ಆಗ್ರಹ
creator: Kannadaprabha News
content: ಬಾಳೆಹೊನ್ನೂರು (ಆ.31): ಶ್ರೀಕ್ಷೇತ್ರ ಧರ್ಮಸ್ಥಳದಲ್ಲಿ ಕಳೆದ ಕೆಲ ದಿನಗಳಿಂದ ನಡೆಯುತ್ತಿರುವ ಬೆಳವಣಿಗೆಗಳ ಕುರಿತು ಪಂಚ ಪೀಠಗಳ ಜಗದ್ಗುರುಗಳು ಅಸಮಾಧಾನ ವ್ಯಕ್ತಪಡಿಸಿದ್ದು, ಸನಾತನ ಧರ್ಮ ತೇಜೋವಧೆಗೆ ಕಾಣದ ಕೈಗಳು ಹುನ್ನಾರ ನಡೆಸಿವೆ ಎಂದಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಶನಿವಾರ ಜಂಟಿ ಪತ್ರಿಕಾ ಹೇಳಿಕೆ ಬಿಡುಗಡೆ ಮಾಡಿರುವ ರಂಭಾಪುರಿ ಪೀಠದ ಡಾ.ವೀರಸೋಮೇಶ್ವರ ಜಗದ್ಗುರು, ಉಜ್ಜಯಿನಿಯ ಸಿದ್ಧಲಿಂಗ ಜಗದ್ಗುರು, ಕೇದಾರದ ಭೀಮಾಶಂಕರ ಜಗದ್ಗುರು, ಶ್ರೀಶೈಲದ ಡಾ.ಚೆನ್ನಸಿದ್ಧರಾಮ ಜಗದ್ಗುರು ಹಾಗೂ ಕಾಶೀ ಪೀಠದ ಡಾ.ಚಂದ್ರಶೇಖರ ಜಗದ್ಗುರು, ಡಾ.ಮಲ್ಲಿಕಾರ್ಜುನ ವಿಶ್ವಾರಾಧ್ಯ ಜಗದ್ಗುರುಗಳು, ಧರ್ಮ ಕ್ಷೇತ್ರಗಳು ತಮ್ಮದೇ ಆದ ಸಂಸ್ಕೃತಿ ಮತ್ತು ಪರಂಪರೆ ಅನುಸರಿಸುತ್ತವೆ. ಅಂತಹ ಧರ್ಮ ಕ್ಷೇತ್ರಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ರಾಜಕೀಯ ಬೆರೆಸುವ ಕೆಲಸ ಯಾರೂ ಮಾಡಬಾರದು. ಅನವಶ್ಯಕವಾಗಿ ಧರ್ಮಸ್ಥಳದ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಇಲ್ಲ ಸಲ್ಲದ ಆರೋಪ ಮಾಡುತ್ತಿದ್ದು, ಭಕ್ತರು, ಸಮಾಜ ಹಾಗೂ ಸರ್ಕಾರದ ದಿಕ್ಕು ತಪ್ಪಿಸುವ ಕೆಲಸ ನಡೆಯುತ್ತಿದೆ ಎಂದಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಸನಾತನ ಧರ್ಮ ತೇಜೋವಧೆಗೆ ಕಾಣದ ಕೈಗಳು ಹುನ್ನಾರ ನಡೆಸಿವೆ. ಸರ್ಕಾರ ರಚನೆ ಮಾಡಿರುವ ವಿಶೇಷ ತನಿಖಾ ಸಂಸ್ಥೆ ಮೇಲ್ನೋಟಕ್ಕೆ ಆರೋಪಿಗಳಾಗಿರುವವರ ವಿಚಾರಣೆ ನಡೆಸುತ್ತಿದ್ದು, ಈ ಒಟ್ಟಾರೆ ಪ್ರಕರಣದ ಹಿಂದಿನ ಸೂತ್ರಧಾರಿಗಳನ್ನು ಪತ್ತೆಹಚ್ಚಿ ಆದಷ್ಟು ಬೇಗ ಅವರಿಗೆ ಶಿಕ್ಷೆ ನೀಡುವಂತಾಗಬೇಕು ಎಂದು ಆಗ್ರಹಿಸಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಇದನ್ನೂ ಓದಿ: ಧರ್ಮಸ್ಥಳ ಅಪಪ್ರಚಾರ ವಿರೋಧಿಸಿ ದೋಸ್ತಿಗಳ ಪ್ರತ್ಯೇಕ ಹೋರಾಟ, ಇಂದು ಹಾಸನದಿಂದ ಜೆಡಿಎಸ್ ಸತ್ಯಯಾತ್ರೆ ನಾಡಿನಲ್ಲಿರುವ ಅನೇಕ ಮಠ-ಮಂದಿರಗಳು ಧಾರ್ಮಿಕ, ಶೈಕ್ಷಣಿಕ ಮತ್ತು ಸಾಮಾಜಿಕವಾಗಿ ಪ್ರಾಚೀನ ಕಾಲದಿಂದಲೂ ಕಾರ್ಯ ನಿರ್ವಹಿಸಿಕೊಂಡು ಬಂದಿವೆ. ಅಂತೆಯೇ ಧರ್ಮಸ್ಥಳ ಕ್ಷೇತ್ರ ಶತಮಾನಗಳ ಇತಿಹಾಸ ಹೊಂದಿದ್ದು, ನಾಡಿಗೆ ವಿಶೇಷ ಕೊಡುಗೆ ನೀಡಿದೆ. ಧರ್ಮಾಧಿಕಾರಿ ಡಾ.ವೀರೇಂದ್ರ ಹೆಗ್ಗಡೆ ಅವರು 50 ವರ್ಷಗಳಿಂದ ಧರ್ಮ-ಸಂಸ್ಕೃತಿ ಪುನರುತ್ಥಾನಕ್ಕೆ ವಿಶೇಷ ಕೊಡುಗೆ ನೀಡಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಇಂತಹ ಕ್ಷೇತ್ರದ ಮೇಲೆ ಬಂದಿರುವ ಆರೋಪಗಳು ಮುಕ್ತವಾಗಿ ಆದಷ್ಟು ಬೇಗ ಮೊದಲಿನಂತೆ ಎಲ್ಲ ಸಾಮಾಜಿಕ...

【ヒグマ速報】ウドがむさぼり食われ近くではクマの足跡_発見現場は小樽市の”休耕地”_土地の所有者が地元猟友会のハンターに相談し警察に通報_市が箱わな設置へ〈北海道〉
creator: 北海道文化放送
content: 北海道・小樽市の休耕地で8月31日、クマの足跡が確認されました。 近くではウドがむさぼり食われた跡がも見つかっています。 午前5時半ごろ、小樽市星野町の休耕地で、土地の所有者の70代男性がクマの足跡を発見しました。 男性は地元の猟友会に所属するハンターに相談。 このハンターが午前6時半ごろ、警察に通報しました。 クマの足跡の近くではウドがむさぼり食われていて、クマによるものとみられています。 小樽市は箱わなを設置する方針です。 北海道の最新ニュース、身近な話題、災害や事故の速報などを発信します。

title: Lễ kỷ niệm 80 năm Quốc khánh: Hà Nội kiểm soát an ninh bằng công nghệ AI
creator: Theo PV
content: Ngay từ rạng sáng 30/8, khu vực Quảng trường Ba Đình (Hà Nội) đã rợp cờ hoa, các khối diễu binh, diễu hành tập hợp về quảng trường để tham gia tổng duyệt Lễ kỷ niệm 80 năm Quốc khánh và Cách mạng Tháng Tám thành công. Buổi tổng duyệt có sự tham gia của hơn 40.000 người, bao gồm lực lượng vũ trang, các khối quần chúng như thanh niên, phụ nữ, công nhân, trí thức, văn nghệ sĩ và các đoàn quốc tế. Các tuyến phố lân cận Ba Đình chật kín người dân đứng xem, cổ vũ, tạo nên bầu không khí sôi động, hào hùng nhưng vẫn trang nghiêm. An ninh triển khai ở mức cao nhất Trước quy mô lớn, Công an Hà Nội phối hợp Bộ Tư lệnh Cảnh vệ và các đơn vị liên quan triển khai phương án an ninh ở cấp độ cao nhất. Hàng chục nghìn cán bộ, chiến sĩ được huy động, bố trí nhiều vòng bảo vệ, kiểm soát giao thông, phòng chống cháy nổ, cứu hộ – cứu nạn. Song song với an ninh, công tác y tế, hậu cần cũng được chú trọng. Bộ Y tế triển khai lực lượng kiểm soát an toàn thực phẩm, bố trí xe cấp cứu và đội ngũ y tế trực tại các điểm tập trung đông người. Ngành điện lực và viễn thông Hà Nội cũng chuẩn bị phương án dự phòng nhằm bảo đảm hệ thống chiếu sáng, truyền hình trực tiếp không bị...

title: Эрдоган отправился на саммит ШОС в Китае
content: Президент Турции Реджеп Тайип Эрдоган вылетел в китайский Тяньцзинь для участия в саммите Шанхайской организации сотрудничества (ШОС) и встречах с лидерами других государств. Об этом сообщило агентство Anadolu. Отмечается, что турецкого лидера в аэропорту провожали вице-президент Турции Джевдет Йылмаз , губернатор Анкары Васип Шахин и ряд официальных лиц. Эрдоган выступит на расширенной сессии саммита уже в этот понедельник, 1 сентября. Кроме того, он запланировал проведение двусторонних встреч с главами других стран, в том числе и с председателем КНР Си Цзиньпином .

title: Danh sách ô tô đang bán tại Việt Nam đáp ứng mức tiêu thụ nhiên liệu 4,83 lít/100 km
creator: Thethao247
content: Dự thảo tiêu chuẩn nhiên liệu 2030 đặt ra ngưỡng 4,83 lít/100 km cho ô tô con, khiến dư luận quan tâm mẫu xe nào tại Việt Nam có thể đáp ứng quy định khắt khe này. Bộ Xây dựng đang lấy ý kiến cho dự thảo Tiêu chuẩn kỹ thuật Quốc gia mới, trong đó đề xuất mức tiêu hao nhiên liệu trung bình cho ô tô con tại Việt Nam đạt 4,83 lít/100 km vào năm 2030. Theo dự thảo, mức tiêu hao 4,83 lít/100 km sẽ được tính dựa trên trung bình toàn bộ các dòng xe con lưu hành tại Việt Nam. Đây là tiêu chí then chốt trong nỗ lực hướng tới giảm phát thải ròng bằng 0 vào năm 2050. Các hãng xe nếu không đạt chuẩn có thể bù trừ bằng cách mua tín chỉ từ đơn vị khác, hoặc phải nhanh chóng điều chỉnh cơ cấu sản phẩm, chẳng hạn đẩy mạnh công nghệ tiết kiệm nhiên liệu, loại bỏ mẫu xe ngốn xăng. Nếu sau ba năm vẫn không đáp ứng, doanh nghiệp sẽ bị buộc tạm ngừng sản xuất, lắp ráp hoặc nhập khẩu. Hiệp hội các nhà sản xuất ô tô Việt Nam (VAMA) cho rằng, mục tiêu này quá khắt khe và có thể "thay đổi gần như toàn bộ hiện trạng" ngành công nghiệp ô tô trong nước. Theo nghiên cứu của VAMA, nếu áp dụng chuẩn mới, 96% xe chạy xăng truyền thống và 14% xe hybrid đang bán tại Việt Nam sẽ không đạt yêu cầu. Điều này đồng...

title: 4 đồ dùng bán cực chạy trên các sàn thương mại điện tử bị "phanh phui" chứa chất gây ung thư, nhiều gia đình Việt vẫn đang vô tư sử dụng
creator: Theo Mỹ Diệu
content: Mới đây, Đài CCTV của Trung Quốc đã cảnh báo về 4 loại sản phẩm quen mặt trong mỗi gia đình , nhưng lại có nguy cơ gây ung thư cực cao. Đáng lo hơn, chúng vẫn đang âm thầm len lỏi trong từng ngóc ngách nhà chúng ta. 1. Giấy vệ sinh giá rẻ Không ít người tin rằng giấy vệ sinh rất sạch, nhưng thực tế nhiều loại giấy còn bẩn hơn cả khăn lau. Khảo sát từng được CCTV công bố cho thấy, trong 150 lô giấy sinh hoạt , tỷ lệ không đạt chuẩn lên tới 24% , thậm chí một số mẫu phát hiện chứa chất gây ung thư. Nguyên nhân là do nhiều cơ sở sản xuất vì lợi nhuận đã dùng nguyên liệu tái chế, rác thải để làm giấy, sau đó thêm chất tẩy trắng, huỳnh quang để khiến giấy trông trắng và bắt mắt. Những hóa chất này khi tiếp xúc lâu dài có thể gây dị ứng, hại đường hô hấp, thậm chí làm tăng nguy cơ mắc ung thư phổi, ung thư ruột. 2. Cốc giữ nhiệt giá rẻ Bình giữ nhiệt là vật bất ly thân của nhiều người, nhưng không phải loại nào cũng an toàn. Những chiếc bình giá rẻ thường được làm từ thép không gỉ kém chất lượng , đặc biệt loại có ký hiệu “201” ở đáy, vốn không đạt chuẩn thực phẩm . Dùng lâu ngày, các kim loại nặng có thể ngấm vào nước, gây ngộ độc thần kinh và làm tăng rủi ro ung...

title: برنامه قطعی برق بوشهر امروز یکشنبه 9 شهریور ۱۴۰۴
creator: info@sharghdaily.com (sharghdaily)
content: به گزارش گروه رسانه‌ای شرق ، قطع روزانه برق خانگی در حالی در دستور کار وزارت نیرو قرار گرفته است که وزیر نیرو پیش بینی می کند امسال ناترازی برق به ۳۰ هزار مگاوات برسد. کاهش تولید برق درست در شرایطی که مصرف در حال افزایش است منجر به جیره بندی زودهنگام برق خانگی در شهریور امسال شده است. در ادامه برنامه قطع برق بوشهر را می‌توانید از لینک مشاهده کنید. برای اطلاع از جدول خاموشی استان و شهر خود به این صفحه مراجعه کنید. آخرین اخبار اقتصادی را از طریق این لینک پیگیری کنید.

title: Oklahoma-Illinois State: OU Stock Report
creator: John E. Hoover
content: It’s hard to get too excited about Oklahoma’s 35-3 win over Illinois State on Saturday night in Norman. The Sooners beat up on an FCS opponent. OU was favored by 35 1⁄2, per FanDuel sports book, but still had most of their starters and frontline players on the field for the entire game. The Redbirds showed up, got their paycheck and took their beating. Illinois State may be the No. 6-ranked team in the FCS, but they’re still FCS. At a blue blood FBS program like OU, the Sooners’ season debut was never in doubt. Well, maybe not never. OU’s first two offensive possessions were duds – a three-and-out and a two-and-fumble. Meanwhile, against a ballyhooed Sooner defense, the Redbird ripped off runs of 24 yards (on third-and-13) and 23 yards (on a QB scramble). After that, things went largely according to plan as OU raced to a 21-point halftime lead and coasted to victory. New quarterback John Mateer had seven completions of 20 yards or more – after the OU offense had just 20 all of last season. Mateer also rushed for a touchdown. Jaren Kanak showed some real skill at tight end. Tory Blaylock flashed at running back. Keontez Lewis Deion Burks and Isaiah Sategna each announced their intentions with a huge performance. Things will get much tougher next week when the Michigan Wolverines come to Norman. Coached by former Sooner offensive lineman Sherrone Moore, Michigan last season beat national champion Ohio State in their annual border war, and they won their own national...

title: Katso kuvat | Kaurialan stadionin katsomo on nyt puhtaanvalkoinen – Kysyimme mitä kenttäremontissa on jo saatu aikaan
Hóa ra T1 đã bị 'mắc bẫy' đầy tinh vi dẫn đến thất bại trước Gen.G
creator: Thethao247
content: Chính Chovy của Gen.G đã xác nhận điều này. Trong trận đấu cuối cùng của vòng bảng LCK Mùa Hè 2025, Gen.G đã đánh bại T1 với tỷ số 2-1, khép lại mùa giải bằng một chiến thắng đầy kịch tính. Không chỉ giúp đội nhà củng cố vị thế ứng cử viên vô địch, Chovy còn đạt cột mốc 500 ván thắng trong sự nghiệp – một thành tích đáng nể. Tuy nhiên, điều khiến người hâm mộ bất ngờ nhất chính là tiết lộ của Chovy sau trận: Gen.G đã chủ động “gài bẫy” T1 trong khâu cấm chọn ván 3. Chovy chia sẻ về chiến lược này: “Ở phe Đỏ, chúng tôi nghĩ rằng thả cho đối thủ một số quân bài mạnh rồi đổi lại lấy những lựa chọn có lợi cho mình là phương án tốt nhất. Đó là lý do vì sao chúng tôi cố tình thả Yunara để khắc chế và T1 thật sự đã mắc phải cái bẫy này". Chovy cũng thẳng thắn nhìn nhận thất bại ở ván 1: “Với đội hình đó, một khi mất lợi thế thì rất khó để lật lại. Ở pha giao tranh cuối cùng, dù biết Renekton đang chờ nhưng đó là vị trí chúng tôi buộc phải đánh. Phải công nhận T1 xử lý tốt hơn”. Tuy nhiên, đến ván 3, “cái bẫy” mà Gen.G chuẩn bị đã phát huy hiệu quả, giúp họ khép lại trận đấu với chiến thắng quan trọng. Một điểm đáng chú ý khác của trận đấu này đó là việc Ruler đã có...

title: نیروگاه‌های خورشیدی شهرضا و دهاقان کلید خورد
creator: info@sharghdaily.com (sharghdaily)
content: به گزارش گروه رسانه‌ای شرق ، ‌عملیات اجرائی دو نیروگاه خورشیدی به ظرفیت‌های ۳۰۰ مگاوات در شهرستان شهرضا و ۴۷۰ مگاوات در شهرستان دهاقان با حمایت مالی بانک گردشگری و سرمایه‌گذاری گروه مالی گردشگری آغاز شد. به گزارش روابط‌عمومی گروه مالی گردشگری، این پروژه‌ها با مجموع سرمایه‌گذاری بیش از ۳۶۰ میلیون دلار، گامی مهم در مسیر توسعه انرژی‌های تجدیدپذیر، تأمین پایدار برق و ایجاد فرصت‌های شغلی در استان اصفهان به شمار می‌روند. آیین کلنگ‌زنی و آغاز عملیات اجرائی این نیروگاه‌ها با حضور استاندار اصفهان، مسئولان استانی و شهرستان شهرضا، امام‌جمعه، فرماندار و اعضای شورای تأمین شهرضا، نمایندگان گروه مالی گردشگری و بانک گردشگری، شرکت لاوان به‌صورت ارتباط ویدئوکنفرانسی وزیر نیرو برگزار شد. مراسم به‌طور زنده پخش شد و این طرح به‌عنوان پروژه پایلوت استان اصفهان معرفی شد. استاندار اصفهان در این مراسم با تأکید بر جایگاه ویژه استان در توسعه زیرساخت‌های انرژی اظهار کرد: اصفهان رتبه نخست کشور در تولید انرژی خورشیدی را دارد و هر روز شاهد افتتاح و کلنگ‌زنی پروژه‌های جدید در حوزه انرژی هستیم. توسعه انرژی‌های پاک از اولویت‌های اصلی دولت چهاردهم است و این رویکرد، ضمن کاهش وابستگی به سوخت‌های فسیلی، نقش مهمی در صیانت از محیط زیست، کاهش آلاینده‌های زیست‌محیطی و تحقق توسعه پایدار ایفا می‌کند. وی افزود: شهرستان شهرضا و دیگر نقاط مستعد استان می‌توانند به قطب‌های مهم سرمایه‌گذاری در عرصه نیروگاه‌های خورشیدی تبدیل شوند و ضمن تأمین نیاز داخلی، زمینه‌ساز صادرات انرژی به سایر مناطق کشور و حتی فراتر از مرزها باشند. دولت نگاه ویژه‌ای به توسعه انرژی‌های نو دارد و استان اصفهان می‌تواند الگویی موفق برای سایر...

title: When (And Why) Subaru Discontinued The EJ Engine
creator: staff@slashgear.com (Nate Williams)
content: First introduced in 1989 with the Subaru Legacy and Subaru Liberty, the EJ series (and its EJ20 and EJ25 variants) became a fast favorite for the flat-four "boxer" layout. With a low center of gravity and a distinctive rumble to boot, those who know a thing or two about engines could plainly see that the EJ was everything a person could ask for in a boxer. Over the decades to come, the EJ design would power everything from family sedans to legendary rally cars, like the Subaru WRX STI . This remarkable 30-year run is why the EJ engine's discontinuation came as such a shock. The discontinuation was twofold: In Japan, Subaru unveiled the (appropriately named) WRX STI EJ20 Final Edition at the 2019 Tokyo Motor Show to great fanfare. In the U.S., things were much more subtle: Subaru simply stopped putting EJs in its WRX STIs after the 2020 edition. It wasn't any one thing that led to Subaru retiring the EJ, but more a combination of multiple factors. For one, the engine had changed very little over the years, which meant it struggled to meet modern efficiency and emissions standards. Beyond this, Subaru's company-wide focus had shifted toward next-generation platforms and engine technologies (including electrification, which just wasn't going to work with the EJ). Practically speaking: the EJ is a part of Subaru's past, not its future. The EJ engine might be done for (at least going forward), but that doesn't necessarily spell the end of Subaru's performance engines altogether....

title: २०८१ सालको पद्मश्री साहित्य पुरस्कार रमेश भुसालको 'छालबाटो'लाई
creator: सेतोपाटी संवाददाता
content: खेमलाल हरिकला लामिछाने प्रतिष्ठानले २०८१ सालको पद्मश्री साहित्य पुरस्कार रमेश भुसालको संस्मरणात्मक कृति ‘छालबाटो’लाई प्रदान गर्ने भएको छ। पद्मश्री साधना सम्मान यस वर्ष नेपाली शिक्षा परिषद्की अध्यक्ष रमा शर्मालाई अर्पण गर्ने निर्णय गरिएको प्रतिष्ठानका अध्यक्ष जीवा लामिछानेले जानकारी दिए। भुसालकृत ‘छालबाटो’ले कैलाश मानसरोवर हुँदै तिब्बतस्थित कर्णालीको उद्गम र भारतको गंगासम्मको यात्रामा कर्णालीको प्रवाह, सीमा सुरक्षा, स्थानीय बस्ती, जलवायु परिवर्तन, वन्यजन्तु, जलविद्युत् र विस्थापनजस्ता गम्भीर विषयलाई नियात्रामार्फत्रूपमा समेटेको छ । पद्मश्री साधना प्राप्त गर्ने शर्माले आफ्नो सम्पूर्ण जीवन भाषा, साहित्य, संस्कृति र कलाको उन्नयनमा समर्पित गरेको प्रतिष्ठानले बताएको छ। शर्माका अन्वेषण, समालोचना, जीवनी, निबन्ध, भाषा, बालसाहित्य लगायतका करिब दुई दर्जन पुस्तकहरू प्रकाशित छन्। त्यसैगरी, समाजका विविध क्षेत्रमा उत्कृष्ट योगदान पुर्याएवापत प्रदान गरिने ‘पद्मश्री गौरव पुरस्कार’ यस वर्ष प्रा.डा. अभिनारायण सुवेदीलाई प्रदान गर्ने निर्णय गरिएको छ। नेपाली र अंग्रेजी दुवै भाषामा कलम चलाउने निबन्धकार, समालोचक, भाषाविद्, नाटककार, अनुवादक तथा कवि प्रा.डा.अभि सुवेदीका करिब तीन दर्जन कृति प्रकाशित छन्। उनी साहित्य सिर्जना तथा समसामयिक लेखनमा अत्यन्तै सक्रिय छन्। यी पुरस्कारको राशि जनही अक्षरेपी तीन लाख नगद तथा सम्मानपत्र रहेको छ। यी पुरस्कार तथा सम्मान कोजाग्रत पूर्णिमाको दिन अर्पण गरिनेछ।

title: 하마스, 가자 수장 무함마드 신와르 사망 공식 확인
creator: 동아일보
content: 이스라엘 폭살 발표 이후 3개월 만 팔레스타인 무장 정파 하마스가 가자 지구 수장 무함마드 신와르의 사망을 공식 확인했다. 지난 5월 이스라엘의 사살 발표 이후 3개월 만이다. 31일(현지 시간) 타임스오브이스라엘(TOI) 등에 따르면 하마스는 이날 그가 다른 지도부와 함께 있는 사진과 함께 “순교”라고 발표했다. 이슬람 무장 단체는 반(反)서방·이스라엘 투쟁 중 사망한 이들을 순교자로 칭한다. 무함마드 신와르는 2023년 10월7일 이스라엘을 상대로 한 알아크사 홍수 기습의 지휘자이자 가자 지구 이전 지도자였던 야히야 신와르의 동생이다. 야히야 신와르는 이듬해 10월16일 이스라엘군의 추격으로 사망했다. 이스라엘군은 무함마드 신와르가 가자 지구 지도자 자리를 물려받자 지난 5월 신베트와의 공동 작전으로 하마스 센터에 있던 그를 폭살했다고 밝혔다. 이후 그의 시신도 확보했다고 발표했지만, 하마스는 그의 사망을 공식 인정하지 않고 있었다. 이번 발표는 이스라엘이 국제사회의 비판 속에서 가자 북부 거점 도시인 가자시티 장악 작전을 준비하는 가운데 이뤄졌다. [서울=뉴시스]

title: دي لا فوينتي يبني منتخبًا متحدًا قبل المونديال
content: هاي كورة (رأي خاص بالصحفي خوان خيمينيز – As) لويس دي لا فوينتي لا يترك شيئًا للصدفة، استدعاء رودريغو وكارفاخال ليس مجرد استعادة أسماء كبيرة، بل خطوة لزرع الانسجام داخل غرفة ملابس المنتخب قبل التوجه إلى منافسات المونديال. اللاعبان يملكان ثقلًا كبيرًا في الفريق، وتجربتهما في اليورو واضحة للجميع، كما ظهر تأثيرهما الصيف الماضي في نهائيات دوري الأمم، عندما افتقدت إسبانيا لهيبتهما وارتكبت أخطاء كلفتها أهدافًا سهلة. المدرب لا يكتفي بذلك، بل يراقب اللاعبين الواعدين أيضًا، بيدري، الذي يقترب من أفضل 5 لاعبين للكرة الذهبية، يحتاج لموازنة دقيقة في مركزه لإفساح المجال لفابيان، بينما يُفكر دي لا فوينتي في إعادة لابورت إلى صفوف المنتخب إذا استعاد مستواه مع أتلتيك. المهمة الأكبر للمدرب الآن هي بناء روح الفريق، وتعزيز التواصل بين القادة، كما فعل في تجمع دوناويشينغن الشهير، حيث جمع بين القوة والانسجام داخل غرفة الملابس. كل التفاصيل الصغيرة مهمة، وكل خطوة محسوبة لتجنب الاحتكاكات وضمان أن يكون المنتخب جاهزًا للمواجهة الأكبر على الساحة العالمية: المونديال.

title: MLB》人類腦袋無法理解大谷翔平!道奇總裁不解為何MVP還需要討論
creator: 自由時報電子報
content: 大谷翔平。(資料照) 〔體育中心/綜合報導〕道奇日本巨星大谷翔平今年再度回歸鬼神二刀流,道奇總裁佛里德曼(Andrew Friedman)近日在節目上盛讚大谷,更直言無法理解,為何每年都還有「誰才是MVP」的討論。 佛里德曼近日在節目上狂讚大谷,「他其實被低估了,我不認為人類的大腦能完全理解他現在正在做的事情。」並強調,「光是他存在的價值,以及他身兼投手與打者繳出的傑出表現,已經超越人類能理解的範疇,也正因如此,沒有人能準確地去評價他。」 請繼續往下閱讀... 佛里德曼還提及目前暫居國聯全壘打王的費城人重砲史瓦伯(Kyle Schwarber),「史瓦伯打出了一個令人難以置信的賽季,但如果你去想一想,大谷作為領袖是有多麼出色,以及他在打擊區裡有多可怕,你就會發現,這幾年時不時出現『MVP應該是大谷還是某人』的爭論,根本就說不通,特別是當他投打二刀流的賽季。」 大谷翔平本季將挑戰MVP三連霸,也是個人生涯第4座MVP,佛里德曼表示:「考量到大谷正在完成的事情是多麼困難以及獨一無二,就會明白,至今他仍完全沒有被充分的評價。」 不用抽 不用搶 現在用APP看新聞 保證天天中獎 點我下載APP 按我看活動辦法

title: Culminó participación de cachanillas en Panamiercano Infantil de Esgrima
creator: Jesús Cota
content: Mexicali, Baja California.- En lo que fue su última competencia del 2025, las esgrimistas cachanillas Regina Evaristo y Jordan Crowder culminaron su participación en el Campeonato Panamericano de Esgrima Infantil que se realizó en Perú. Evaristo Hernández acabó en la séptima posición de Florete Infantil B, luego de perder en Cuartos de Final ante la peruana Evelyn Jamaica por marcador de 10-8. Pero en la primera ronda, la mexicalense ganó sobre la brasileña Julia Canashiro 10-6. En la ronda de clasificación, Regina se ubicó en el Pool 3, donde derrotó a Julia Canashiro, Alba Burga de Perú, Verena Damico de Argentina y Luciana Guille de Bolivia, cayó ante la ecuatoriana Abigail García. Por su parte, Crowder Beltrán culminó en la décima octava posición en Florete Pre Cadete , luego de perder en la ronda de los 32vos ante Domenica Palma de Perú 10-8. En la fase de grupos, Jordan fue última del Pool A, donde enfrentó a Monserrat Florian de Guatemala, Sofía Ferrón de Brasil, Victoria Sepúlveda de Chile, la peruana Rafaela Camargo, Maya Orbe de Estados Unidos y Romina Arámburo de Bolivia. En el medallero final, México culminó en la quinta posición con dos oros y seis bronces para un total de ocho. Estados Unidos fue primero, Brasil segundo y Argentina tercero.

title: What Ty Simpson promised Alabama football fans after Florida State loss
creator: The Tuscaloosa News
content: TALLAHASSEE, Fla. — The question to Ty Simpson was about Alabama football's lack of successes finishing drives, the seven drives that ended in Florida State territory, and the three times those ended in scores. But Simpson, Alabama's redshirt junior quarterback, used those frustrations to address something bigger — and he addressed it directly to Crimson Tide fans."I promise you one thing, and that goes to every Alabama fan and my teammates, that I’m going to work hard and make sure we’re going to get this fixed," Simpson said. Roping in fellow captains in linebacker Deontae Lawson and center Parker Brailsford, Simpson said there's "nobody who loves this university and loves this team more than these three guys here." "We’re going to make sure we get this right," Simpson said. In his first start for the Crimson Tide, Simpson completed 23 of 43 pass attempts for 254 yards and two touchdowns to Josh Cuevas and Rico Scott. He added four rushing yards on nine carries and was sacked three times.Alabama will host Louisiana Monroe Saturday, Sept. 6, in its home opener.Colin Gay covers Alabama football for The Tuscaloosa News, part of the USA TODAY Network. Reach him at cgay@gannett.com or follow him @_ColinGay on X, formerly known as Twitter. This article originally appeared on The Tuscaloosa News: What Ty Simpson promised Alabama football fans after FSU loss

title: El innovador café saludable que llega: rico en hierro y minerales esenciales sin azúcar ni perder sabor
creator: P. F.
content: Investigadores del Instituto Tecnológico de Massachusetts (MIT) han ideado una nueva forma de fortificar alimentos y bebidas mediante micropartículas cristalinas que contengan hierro o yodo , que se puedan espolvorear en alimentos básicos como el café para ayudar a combatir la desnutrición. "El objetivo era desarrollar algo que no reaccionara con el alimento en sí ", explica la investigadora principal del Instituto Koch para la Investigación Integral del Cáncer del MIT, Ana Jaklenec. De esta manera, "se puede incorporar a una amplia gama de alimentos y bebidas sin comprometer la calidad", explica en declaraciones recogidas por Europa Press . Estas micropartículas podrían adaptarse para transportar minerales importantes como el zinc, el calcio o el magnesio , matizan los investigadores del estudio publicado en la revista Matter . Fortificar alimentos suele ser complejo, ya que muchos nutrientes son frágiles y se descomponen durante el almacenamiento o la cocción, explican los autores. Además, añadir hierro a los alimentos puede llevarlo a reaccionar con otras moléculas, dándoles un sabor metálico . Sin embargo, el laboratorio de Jaklenec demostró que encapsular nutrientes en polímeros puede protegerlos de su descomposición o de reaccionar con otras moléculas. Pero, una desventaja de este enfoque es que el polímero agrega mucho volumen al material , lo que limita la cantidad de hierro u otros nutrientes que terminan en los alimentos. "Esto dificulta...

title: 외교장관 “APEC 계기 북미 정상회담 가능성 매우 낮아”
creator: 동아일보
content: “북, 러 한계 알았을 것...중국과 관계 복원할 기회” “김정은, 국제사회로 나오는 계기...중·러 협력 강화한다면 우려” 김정은·시진핑 만남, 북미 정상회담 포석 전망엔 “상상력 풍부” 조현 외교부 장관이 29일 서울 용산 대통령실 청사에서 열린 제39회 국무회의(임시)에 입장하고 있다. 2025.08.29. 대통령실통신사진기자단 조현 외교부 장관은 오는 10월말 경주에서 열리는 아시아태평양경제협력체(APEC) 정상회의에서 김정은 북한 국무위원장과 도널드 트럼프 미국 대통령이 정상회담을 할 수 있다는 전망과 관련해 “그럴 가능성은 현재로서는 매우 낮다”고 31일 말했다. 조 장관은 이날 KBS 일요진단에 출연해 이같이 말한 뒤 “그럴 가능성을 배제할 필요는 없지만 매우 조심스럽게 준비하고 있다”고 했다. 김 위원장에게 APEC 초청장을 발송했느냐는 질문에는 “안 됐다”고 답했다. 김 위원장이 내달 3일 중국에서 열리는 전승절 행사에 참석하는 데 대해서는 다자무대 데뷔전이라는 점에 주목했다. 조 장관은 “어떤 측면에서는 국제무대로 김 위원장이 나오는 것이고, 소망해 본다면 이것이 북한이 국제사회로 나오는 계기가 될 수도 있다”며 “다른 한편으로 북한이 중국·러시아와 협력을 강화하는 것이 된다면 우리로서도 우려하지 않을 수 없다”고 했다. 참석 배경에 대해서는 “그동안 북한이 러시아와 굉장히 가까워졌지만, 아마 러시아의 한계를 알았을 것”이라며 “다소 소원해진 중국과의 관계를 복원할 기회를 보고 있지...

title: Bryce Underwood's first TD pass: Michigan QB connects with Marlin Klein
creator: Detroit Free Press
content: The moment Michigan football fans have been waiting on since quarterback Bryce Underwood officially signed with the Wolverines last December didn't take long.With 25 seconds left in the first half of his Wolverines debut, Underwood's pass found the end zone on a 15-yard completion to tight end Marlin Klein. It was first-and-10 at the New Mexico 15 after a timeout at Michigan Stadium in Ann Arbor. Michigan had three wide receivers on the field and motioned Klein to the left side of the formation when he ran an out-and-up along the left sideline to cook the linebacker, as Underwood floated a pass to his wide-open target for what became a 24-10 lead going into halftime.ANOTHER ONE FOR @umichfootball 😤 Bryce Underwood records his first career passing TD! pic.twitter.com/dR8IvWRntO— FOX College Football (@CFBONFOX) August 31, 2025It capped off a eight-play, 75-yard drive on U-M's sixth drive of the evening. At the time of the play, Underwood had completed 12 of 17 passes for 144 yards.FOLLOW ALONG: Michigan vs New Mexico live updates, analysisThe roar was notable when the Wolverines offense first took the field, presumably the deafening cheer was a salute for Underwood, the hometown star from just up the road in Belleville who already has sponsorships from Beats By Dre, Celsius and earlier this week announced some proceeds from his jersey sales would go back to the youth in Detroit.Tony Garcia is the Wolverines beat writer for the Detroit Free Press. title: Más de 15 mil elementos de la policía capitalina activarán el “Operativo Regreso a Clases 2025”
creator: Guillermo Espinosa
content: El jefe de la Policía capitalina Pablo Vázquez Camacho, anuncio que el próximo lunes 1o de Septiembre la corporación a su cargo implementará un importante dispositivo de seguridad y vialidad mediante la activación del “Operativo Regreso a Clases 2025” con más de 15 mil efectivos de la policía desplegados en las zonas escolares de las 16 Alcaldías de la Ciudad de México.“El día de hoy, cumpliendo la instrucción de nuestra jefa de Gobierno, la Secretaría de Seguridad Ciudadana reafirma su compromiso con la protección de los derechos de las niñas, los niños, los adolescentes y los jóvenes, trabajando para garantizar un entorno seguro para su óptimo desarrollo”.Por ello, el próximo lunes 1 de septiembre, en el marco del inicio del ciclo escolar 2025-2026, entre las acciones más importantes que contempla dicho operativo se encuentran tareas de vigilancia y seguridad en las vías de acceso y mediaciones de las zonas y planteles escolares públicos y privados con recorridos pie tierra y patrullajes estrenando patrullas.Se mantendrá la presencia policial a la hora de entrada y salida en los turnos matutino y vespertino para prevenir hechos que pongan en riesgo a las y los alumnos, docentes y autoridades educativas”.Se realizarán los Senderos Seguros de las rutas de servicio público, de transporte público hacia los planteles escolares y se mantendrá la vigilancia en los diferentes sistemas de transporte.Se implementarán dispositivos viales para el...

title: Nacho Beristáin y su contundente análisis de la pelea Canelo vs Crawford: “Técnicamente es un poco mejor”
creator: César Márquez
content: La pelea entre Saúl Canelo Álvarez y Terence Crawford ha dado mucho de qué hablar entre aficionados y expertos del deporte. Y ahora, a pocas semanas del combate, Nacho Beristáin ha brindado un análisis sobre ambos pugilistas. La cita está programada para el 13 de septiembre en el Allegiant Stadium, de Las Vegas, Nevada, donde el tapatío expondrá sus cuatro títulos de la categoría supermediana (CMB, AMB, OMB y FIB) ante un Bud Crawford, que subirá dos divisiones más. La función no solamente luce atractiva por la cantidad de campeonatos que se disputarán, sino también por la calidad boxística que ambos pugilistas han demostrado durante la última década. Nacho Beristáin y su análisis sobre el combate Canelo vs Crawford En entrevista con ESPN Knockout, Nacho Beristáin aseguró que si se hace un análisis técnicamente, el estadounidense es un tanto mejor, además, destacó la mala racha que tiene Álvarez de no noquear.“Sobre sale por su técnica Crawford, pero por mucho. Yo creo que haciendo un análisis técnicamente es un poco mejor. No sé si me da esa impresión o me quedo con que Canelo lleva como 10 peleas que no ha podido noquear a nadie”, declaró el entrenador de múltiples campeones mundiales. Cabe indicar que la relación entre Beristáin y Canelo Álvarez ha estado marcada por declaraciones polémicas, ya que el entrenador de Salón de la Fama ha expresado en reiteradas ocasiones su postura crítica hacia el boxeador tapatío. title: Interapas retira cerca de 500 kilos de basura del drenaje en la última semana
creator: Redacción
content: ⁠ Se dió mantenimiento y limpieza preventiva en más de mil 500 metros de red sanitaria. SLP.- Durante la actual temporada de lluvias, INTERAPAS mantiene activos los trabajos de limpieza y desazolve preventivo para evitar taponamientos en la red sanitaria y reducir el riesgo de fugas y brotes de aguas residuales. En la capital potosina, las cuadrillas limpiaron 680 metros de drenaje y 23 pozos de visita, de los cuales se extrajeron aproximadamente 450 kilos de basura y lodos. Entre los puntos atendidos destacan las calles Felipe Ángeles y López Mateos en la colonia División del Norte; Molinos del Rey de la colonia Los Molinos; así como acciones en Satélite de la colonia Rural Atlas y en San Antonio de los Gómez. En Soledad de Graciano Sánchez se realizaron trabajos diversas zonas como Fidel Velázquez, Periférico Oriente, Quintas de la Hacienda, Hogares Ferrocarrileros, San Felipe, San Francisco, avenida Gálvez y carretera a Rioverde, atendiendo 850 metros de tubería. INTERAPAS hace un llamado a la ciudadanía para no arrojar basura ni desechos a la calle o al drenaje, ya que la correcta disposición de los residuos es clave para mantener en buen estado la infraestructura sanitaria, especialmente durante la temporada de lluvias.

title: 台南大內首批15名在地生活觀察員 訪耆老、走讀古今
creator: 劉婉君
content: 〔記者劉婉君/台南報導〕台南市大內區推動社區營造,培訓「在地生活觀察員」,透過訪談耆老、走讀古今等方式,學習以生活者的視角,觀察與記錄地方,首批有15名成員。9月下旬將推出由老照片景點串連規劃而成的小旅行路線,帶民眾認識大內,期能於明年發行1本在地生活視角的地方刊物。 大內在地生活觀察員培力計畫由大內區公所推動,希望培育具有觀察力、敘事力、導覽力的在地人才,為大內人文地產景發掘更多可能性。以政治、建設、產業等主題,由講師帶領學員實地踏查老照片中的大內景點,從古今對照中,了解大內的歷史發展。 請繼續往下閱讀... 例如二溪景觀大橋,早期原為1961年興建的二重溪吊橋,後毀於1978年的八一水災,改為混凝土大橋,2001年再因納莉風災被沖斷,重建後成為今貌,目前北側仍留有第1代吊橋的橋墩遺跡。 另外,學員也訪談曾在曾文溪畔從事砂石業、年近百歲的竹筏擺渡人、米廠等耆老,相關內容都將做為明年出版地方刊物的資料。 大內區公所目前也著手將生活觀察員蒐集到的全區46家飲食店家,設計成美食地圖中;同時預計於9月20日推出小旅行,包括二溪景觀大橋、義成堂中藥店、日式酒家舊址等,每個景點均由學員負責導覽解說,帶民眾一同探訪大內的古今。 不用抽 不用搶 現在用APP看新聞 保證天天中獎 點我下載APP 按我看活動辦法

title: Delhi : कपिल उर्फ नंदू और वेंकट गर्ग गिरोह के दो शार्प शूटर मुठभेड़ के बाद गिरफ्तार, मददगारों पर लगेगा मकोका
content: दिल्ली पुलिस की स्पेशल सेल ने रोहिणी के सेक्टर-28 में मुठभेड़ के बाद कपिल उर्फ नंदू और वेंकट गर्ग गिरोह के दो शार्प शूटरों को गिरफ्तार किया है। मुठभेड़ के दौरान दोनों शूटरों के पैर में गोली लगी। पांच करोड़ की उगाही नहीं देने पर छावला इलाके में रियल एस्टेट डेवलपर के फार्म हाउस पर गोलीबारी करने के मामले में दोनों वांछित थे। इनके पास से पुलिस ने दो पिस्टल, सात कारतूस और चार खोखा बरामद किए हैं। गिरफ्तार शूटरों की पहचान हरियाणा के अंबाला कैंट स्थित छोटा कुड्डान निवासी हर्षदीप उर्फ अंकित और पानीपत के धूप सिंह नगर स्थित वार्ड नंबर 12 निवासी नवीन धीमान के रूप में हुई है। स्पेशल सेल के अतिरिक्त पुलिस आयुक्त प्रमोद कुशवाहा ने बताया, 28 अगस्त को तीन बदमाशों ने छावला इलाके में एक रियल एस्टेट डेवलपर के फार्म हाउस पर गोली चली थी। पुलिस टीम को पता चला कि गोली चलाने वालों में वैंकट गर्ग गैंग के बदमाश हर्षदीप और नवीन शामिल हैं। शुक्रवार रात दोनों के रोहिणी सेक्टर-28 में किसी से मिलने के लिए आने की सूचना स्पेशल सेल टीम ने वहां पर घेराबंदी कर दी। खुद को घिरा पाकर बदमाशों ने पुलिस टीम पर गोलियां चला दी। पुलिस टीम ने आत्मरक्षा में गोलियां चलाईं, गोली हर्षदीप और नवीन धीमान के पैर में लगी। इलाज के लिए दोनों को बाबा साहेब अंबेडकर अस्पताल में भर्ती कराया गया। पूछताछ में पता चला कि हर्षदीप दसवीं तक पढ़ा है। वह सोशल मीडिया के माध्यम से गैंगस्टर वेंकट गर्ग के संपर्क में आया। वैंकट ने उसे विदेश में नौकरी का झांसा देकर गैंग में शामिल किया। कपिल उर्फ नंदू ने उसे वैंकट गर्ग की मदद से रियल एस्टेट डेवलपर के फार्म हाउस पर गोलीबारी का काम सौंपा था। वहीं आरोपी नवीन धीमान पानीपत के एक कॉलेज से कंप्यूटर साइंस की...

title: White clothes won't turn dull and yellow if washed with 1 food essential in your fridge
creator: Sophie Harris,Ketsuda Phoutinane
content: Keeping whites white can prove challenging given they're prone to turning discoloured, yellow and stained — stubbornly so. Whilst there are many tricks used to restore brightness to whites, one expert has revealed a "straightforward" and "budget-friendly" remedy costing merely 69p. Better still, this solution is likely already sitting in your kitchen cupboard. Thomas Bird, textiles specialist and proprietor of Fabric Online, explained: " Lemon juice is a natural and affordable solution to making your whites even whiter. Lemons contain citric acid, a natural bleaching agent that effectively breaks down even the toughest stains. "Unlike chemical whiteners, such as bleach, it lifts stains from your clothes without the risk of damage, making it the perfect alternative for brightening your whites." Beyond its cleaning and stain-busting capabilities, lemon juice can also leave garments smelling wonderfully fresh, so it banishes any unpleasant odours at the same time. Whilst it "works wonders" on whites, it shouldn't be used on coloured fabrics due to its bleaching effect . To harness lemon juice for its brightening effect, begin by extracting juice from three lemons into a glass, yielding roughly half a cup. Pour the lemon juice straight into your washing machine alongside your usual laundry detergent. Programme your washing machine to its standard cycle and allow the "magic" to unfold. The expert added: "After the wash, let your clothes dry as usual, and watch the noticeable...

title: Chiếc giường trong KTX của tân sinh viên khiến cộng đồng mạng xôn xao
creator: Đông
content: Bước vào đời sống đại học, nhiều sinh viên mới tinh không chỉ phải quen với việc học tập mà còn phải đối mặt với đủ thứ bất ngờ nho nhỏ trong cuộc sống hằng ngày, từ việc chọn lớp, làm quen bạn mới đến việc sắp xếp phòng ký túc xá Mới đây, một câu chuyện về nữ sinh Trung Quốc vừa nhập học đại học đã thu hút nhiều sự quan tâm trên mạng xã hội. Trước khi vào ký túc xá, cô đã tham khảo kinh nghiệm từ các “tiền bối” và chuẩn bị một chiếc nệm vừa vặn với kích thước giường cũ đúng theo chia sẻ của đàn chị. Tuy nhiên, khi cô đặt chiếc nệm lên giường mới tại KTX, cô lập tức “sốc toàn tập”: giường mới rộng hơn nệm tới 18cm và dài hơn 22cm. Chiều dài dư ra có thể chấp nhận được, nhưng 18cm bề ngang tạo ra khoảng trống quá lớn, khiến cô cảm thấy khó chịu và lo lắng. Chiếc đệm nằm "lọt thỏm" trong chiếc giường ở KTX. Cô chụp lại hình ảnh khoảng trống này và đăng lên mạng, than thở rằng cuộc sống đại học của mình bắt đầu như một “thảm họa 18cm”. Chiếc nệm nhỏ bé nằm lạc lõng giữa giường rộng, và cô sợ rằng mình có thể rơi vào khoảng trống khi ngủ say. Trong tình huống này, nữ sinh chỉ còn hai lựa chọn một là tạm chấp nhận “sống chung với lũ”, hai là mua một...

title: Było 1:5, gdy Świątek ruszyła na Rosjankę. Niesamowity mecz w US Open
creator: Łukasz Jachimiak
content: Półtora roku temu Iga Świątek przegrała z Anną Kalinską 4:6, 4:6 w półfinale w Dubaju, a dwa tygodnie temu pokonała ją 6:3, 6:4 w ćwierćfinale w Cincinnati. Było jasne, że w trzeciej rundzie US Open 2025 naszą wiceliderkę światowego rankingu czeka trudne zadanie. Ale kto przewidział, że jeszcze trudniejsza rywalką od 29. na liście WTA Rosjanki dla Świątek będzie sama Świątek? Pierwszy gem – serwuje Świątek, wygrywa do 15. Jest dobrze, jest spokojne, pewne wejście w mecz. I nagle na korcie zaczyna się dziać coś, w co trudno uwierzyć – 1:1, 1:2, 1:3, 1:4, 1:5, a przy 2:5 aż cztery setbole dla Rosjanki. Świątek sama się przełamywała Dlaczego to się tak potoczyło? Cóż, po wygraniu pierwszego gema Świątek miała dwie piłki na 2:0. Ale breakpointów nie wykorzystała na własne życzenie. Po prostu popełniała błędy. A później było jeszcze gorzej. Na 1:2 Świątek przełamała się sama – przy stanie 30:40 popełniła podwójny błąd serwisowy. Po chwili Kalinska wygrała gema przy swoim serwisie na 3:1, a na 1:4 Świątek znów przełamała się sama. Znowu przy stanie 30:40 nie wytrzymała i popełniła podwójny błąd serwisowy. Kalinska prowadziła 4:1 z podwójnym przełamaniem, głównie dzięki temu, że z 21 punktów, jakie zdobyła, aż 12 dostała od Świątek w prezencie. Wtedy Polka miała już na koncie aż tyle niewymuszonych błędów, a Rosjanka – tylko cztery. Co gorsza, nie wyglądało na to, że Świątek w psuciu się zatrzyma. W trakcie gema...

title: Мэр Чикаго подписал указ о защите прав жителей в случае ввода в город Нацгвардии
content: Трамп заявил о готовности ввести войска Нацгвардии в Чикаго для борьбы с преступностью Москва. 31 августа. INTERFAX.RU - Мэр Чикаго (штат Иллинойс) Брэндон Джонсон подписал указ о защите конституционных прав жителей города в условиях потенциального развертывания там подразделений национальной гвардии, в воскресенье The Hill. "Город Чикаго сделает все, что в его силах, для защиты нашей демократии и наших сообществ. Этим указом мы посылаем громкий сигнал федеральному правительству: мы не нуждаемся и не хотим неконституционной и незаконной военной оккупации нашего города", - говорится в документе. Мэр уточнил: "Мы не хотим, чтобы на наших улицах были военные блокпосты или бронетехника, мы не хотим видеть, как семьи разрываются на части. Мы предпримем любые необходимые действия для защиты прав всех жителей Чикаго". В то же время президент США Дональд Трамп губернатора Иллинойса Джея Прицкера, что, если он не справится с ростом преступности в штате, этим займутся федеральные правоохранительные органы. "Шесть человек были убиты, 24 человека получили ранения в Чикаго в прошлые выходные, и Джей Прицкер, слабый и жалкий губернатор Иллинойса, только что сказал, что ему не нужна помощь в предотвращении преступности. Он сумасшедший", - написал американский президент в соцсети Truth Social. "Ему лучше бы разобраться с этим побыстрее, или мы придем", - подчеркнул Трамп.

title: Urteil schwächt laut Sahgal Verhandlungsposition der USA
creator: SDA
content: Das Urteil des US-Berufungsgerichts zu den Zöllen schwächt laut dem Chef der Schweiz-US-Handelskammer die Verhandlungsposition der US-Regierung gegenüber der Schweiz. Auf das Schweizer Angebot hat es wohl keinen direkten Einfluss mehr, wie Rahul Sahgal sagte. Teilen Merken Drucken Artikel teilen Die Schweiz habe ihr optimiertes Angebot nach Washington geschickt. «Das Ziel ist klar: Der Zoll von 39 Prozent muss möglichst rasch und stark gesenkt werden», sagte Sahgal in einem am Sonntag von der «NZZ am Sonntag» veröffentlichten Interview. Doch setze das Urteil die US-Administration unter zeitlichen Druck. «Wenn der Supreme Court die bisherige Rechtsgrundlage einschränkt oder gar für nicht anwendbar erklärt, bevor die Schweiz einen Deal mit den USA abschliesst, wird alles komplizierter für Washington», sagte er. Die US-Regierung müsste dann eine neue Rechtsgrundlage für die Zölle gegen die Schweiz finden. Zum Hintergrund: Ein Berufungsgericht in den USA sprach dem US-Präsidenten Donald Trump am Freitag (Ortszeit) die Befugnis ab, unter Berufung auf ein Notstandsgesetz weitreichende Zölle auf Importprodukte zu verhängen. Die Schweizerisch-US-amerikanische Handelskammer geht laut Sahgal davon aus, dass die Zölle auf die Schweiz im Urteil mitgemeint sind. Die Entscheidung des Berufungsgerichts tritt aber nicht vor dem 14. Oktober in Kraft. Der US-Regierung bleibt damit Zeit, vor den Obersten Gerichtshof zu ziehen. Trump kündigte an, dies tun zu wollen. Wann und...
